trait.name: Dive Attack
entries: If the aarakocra is flying and dives at least 30 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a melee weapon attack, the attack deals an extra 3 ({@dice 1d6}) damage to the target.

action.name: Talon
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +4} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 4 ({@dice 1d4+2}) kesme hasarı.

action.name: Cirit
entries: Yakın Dövüş yada Menzilli Silah Saldırısı: {@hit +4} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft. yada menzil 30/120 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 5 ({@dice 1d6+2}) delme hasarı.

action.name: Summon Air Elemental
entries: Five aarakocra within 30 feet of each other can magically summon an {@creature air elemental}. Each of the five must use its action and movement on three consecutive turns to perform an aerial dance and must maintain concentration while doing so (as if concentrating on a spell). When all five have finished their third turn of the dance, the elemental appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of them. It is friendly toward them and obeys their spoken commands. It remains for 1 hour, until it yada all its summoners die, yada until any of its summoners dismisses it as a bonus action. A summoner can't perform the dance again until it finishes a short rest. When the elemental returns to the Elemental Plane of Air, any aarakocra within 5 feet of it can return with it.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The aboleth can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Mucous Cloud
entries: While underwater, the aboleth is surrounded by transformative mucus. A creature that touches the aboleth yada that hits it with a melee attack while within 5 ft. of it must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw. On a failure, the creature is diseased for {@dice 1d4} hours. The diseased creature can breathe only underwater.

trait.name: Probing Telepathy
entries: If a creature communicates telepathically with the aboleth, the aboleth learns the creature's greatest desires if the aboleth can see the creature.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The aboleth makes three tentacle attacks.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +9} vurmak için, erişim 10 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 12 ({@dice 2d6+5}) ezme hasarı. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw yada become diseased. The disease has no effect for 1 minute and can be removed by any magic that cures disease. After 1 minute, the diseased creature's skin becomes translucent and slimy, the creature can't regain hit points unless it is underwater, and the disease can be removed only by heal yada another disease-curing spell of 6th level yada higher. When the creature is outside a body of water, it takes 6 ({@dice 1d12}) asit damage every 10 minutes unless moisture is applied to the skin before 10 minutes have passed.

action.name: Tail
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +9} vurmak için, erişim 10 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 15 ({@dice 3d6+5}) ezme hasarı.

action.name: Enslave (3/Gün)
entries: The aboleth targets tek varlık it can see within 30 ft. of it. The target must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw yada be magically charmed by the aboleth until the aboleth dies yada until it is on a different plane of existence from the target. The charmed target is under the aboleth's control and can't take reactions, and the aboleth and the target can communicate telepathically with each other over any distance.

Whenever the charmed target takes damage, the target can repeat the saving throw. On a success, the effect ends. No more than once every 24 hours, the target can also repeat the saving throw when it is at least 1 mile away from the aboleth.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The aboleth makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

legendary.name: Tail Swipe
entries: The aboleth makes one tail attack.

legendary.name: Psychic Drain (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: One creature charmed by the aboleth takes 10 ({@dice 3d6}) psişik damage, and the aboleth regains hit points equal to the damage the creature takes.

trait.name: Fear of Ateş
entries: If the yeti takes ateş damage, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The yeti has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Snow Camouflage
entries: The yeti has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in snowy terrain.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The yeti can use its Chilling Gaze and makes two claw attacks.

action.name: Pençe
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +11} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 14 ({@dice 2d6+7}) kesme hasarı artı 7 ({@dice 2d6}) soğuk damage.

action.name: Chilling Gaze
entries: The yeti targets tek varlık it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see the yeti, the target must succeed on a DC 18 Constitution saving throw against this magic yada take 21 ({@dice 6d6}) soğuk damage and then be paralyzed for 1 minute, unless it is immune to soğuk damage. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If the target's saving throw is successful, yada if the effect ends on it, the target is immune to this yeti's gaze for 1 hour.

action.name: Cold Breath (Recharge 6)
entries: The yeti exhales a 30-foot cone of frigid air. Each creature in that area must make a DC 18 Constitution saving throw, taking 45 ({@dice 10d8}) soğuk damage on a failed save, yada half as much damage on a successful one.

monster.name: Acolyte

action.name: Sopa
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +2} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 2 ({@dice 1d4}) ezme hasarı.

monster.description: Acolytes are junior members of the clergy, genellikle answerable to a priest. They perform a variety of functions in a temple and are granted minor spellcasting power by their deities.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The acolyte is a 1st-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell kurtulma zarı DC'si 12, {@hit 4} büyü saldırıları ile vurmak için). The acolyte has following cleric spells prepared:

monster.name: Adult Black Dragon
monster.senses: kör görüş 60 ft., gece görüşü 120 ft.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The dragon can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Gün)
entries: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The dragon can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +11} vurmak için, erişim 10 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 17 ({@dice 2d10+6}) delme hasarı artı 4 ({@dice 1d8}) asit damage.

action.name: Pençe
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +11} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 13 ({@dice 2d6+6}) kesme hasarı.

action.name: Tail
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +11} vurmak için, erişim 15 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 15 ({@dice 2d8+6}) ezme hasarı.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw yada become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful yada the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Acid Breath (Recharge 5—6)
entries: The dragon exhales asit in a 60-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw, taking 54 ({@dice 12d8}) asit damage on a failed save, yada half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The dragon makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

legendary.name: Tail Attack
entries: The dragon makes a tail attack.

legendary.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 10 ft. of the dragon must succeed on a DC 19 Dexterity saving throw yada take 13 ({@dice 2d6+6}) ezme hasarı and be knocked prone. The dragon can then uçma up to half its flying speed.

entries: The dracolich exhales yıldırım in a 90-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw, taking 66 ({@dice 12d10}) yıldırım damage on a failed save, yada half as much damage on a successful one.

entries: The dracolich beats its tattered wings. Each creature within 10 ft. of the dracolich must succeed on a DC 21 Dexterity saving throw yada take 14 ({@dice 2d6+7}) ezme hasarı and be knocked prone. After beating its wings this way, the dracolich can uçma up to half its flying speed.

action.name: Change Shape
entries: The dragon magically polymorphs into a insansı yada hayvan that has a challenge rating no higher than its own, yada back into its true form. It reverts to its true form if it dies. Any equipment it is wearing yada carrying is absorbed yada borne by the new form (the dragon's choice).

In a new form, the dragon retains its alignment, hit points, Vurunca Dice, ability to speak, proficiencies, Legendary Resistance, lair actions, and Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores, as well as this action. Its statistics and capabilities are otherwise replaced by those of the new form, except any class features yada legendary actions of that form.

action.name: Change Shape
entries: The dragon magically polymorphs into a insansı yada hayvan that has a challenge rating no higher than its own, yada back into its true form. It reverts to its true form if it dies. Any equipment it is wearing yada carrying is absorbed yada borne by the new form (the dragon's choice).

In a new form, the dragon retains its alignment, hit points, Vurunca Dice, ability to speak, proficiencies, Legendary Resistance, lair actions, and Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores, as well as this action. Its statistics and capabilities are otherwise replaced by those of the new form, except any class features yada legendary actions of that form.

entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +8} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 14 ({@dice 2d8+5}) ezme hasarı.

action.name: Whirlwind (Recharge 4—6)
entries: Each creature in the elemental's space must make a DC 13 Strength saving throw. On a failure, a target takes 15 ({@dice 3d8+2}) ezme hasarı and is flung up 20 feet away from the elemental in a random direction and knocked prone. If a thrown target strikes an object, such as a wall yada floor, the target takes 3 ({@dice 1d6}) ezme hasarı for every 10 feet it was thrown. If the target is thrown at another creature, that creature must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw yada take the same damage and be knocked prone.
If the saving throw is successful, the target takes half the ezme hasarı and isn't flung away yada knocked prone.

trait.name: Pounce
entries: If the allosaurus moves at least 30 ft. straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw yada be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the allosaurus can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

action.name: Change Shape
entries: The dragon magically polymorphs into a insansı yada hayvan that has a challenge rating no higher than its own, yada back into its true form. It reverts to its true form if it dies. Any equipment it is wearing yada carrying is absorbed yada borne by the new form (the dragon's choice).

In a new form, the dragon retains its alignment, hit points, Vurunca Dice, ability to speak, proficiencies, Legendary Resistance, lair actions, and Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores, as well as this action. Its statistics and capabilities are otherwise replaced by those of the new form, except any class features yada legendary actions of that form.

immune.note: from nonmagical attacks

trait.name: Inscrutable
entries: The sphinx is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions yada read its thoughts, as well as any divination spell that it refuses. Wisdom (Insight) checks made to ascertain the sphinx's intentions yada sincerity have disadvantage.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The sphinx's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The sphinx makes two claw attacks.

action.name: Pençe
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +12} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 17 ({@dice 2d10+6}) kesme hasarı.

action.name: Roar (3/Gün)
entries: The sphinx emits a magical roar. Each time it roars before finishing a long rest, the roar is louder and the effect is different, as detailed below. Each creature within 500 feet of the sphinx and able to hear the roar must make a saving throw.

First Roar. Each creature that fails a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw is frightened for 1 minute. A frightened creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Second Roar. Each creature that fails a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw is deafened and frightened for 1 minute. A frightened creature is paralyzed and can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Third Roar. Each creature makes a DC 18 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 44 ({@dice 8d10}) ses damage and is knocked prone. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't knocked prone.

legendary.name: Pençe Attack
entries: The sphinx makes one claw attack.

legendary.name: Teleport (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The sphinx magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing yada carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The sphinx casts a spell from its list of prepared spells, using a spell slot as normal.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The sphinx is a 12th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell kurtulma zarı DC'si 18, {@hit 10} büyü saldırıları ile vurmak için). It requires no material components to cast its spells. The sphinx has the following cleric spells prepared:

monster.name: Animated Armor
monster.senses: kör görüş 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius)

trait.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
entries: The armor is incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the armor must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell kurtulma zarı DC'si yada fall unconscious for 1 minute.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the armor remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal suit of armor.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The armor makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +4} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 5 ({@dice 1d6+2}) ezme hasarı.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +5} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 10 ({@dice 2d6+3}) kesme hasarı artı 3 ({@dice 1d6}) asit damage. If the target is a Large yada smaller creature, it is grappled (escape DC 13). Until this grapple ends, the ankheg can bite only the grappled creature and has advantage on attack rolls to do so.

action.name: Acid Spray (Recharge 6)
entries: The ankheg spits asit in a line that is 30 ft. long and 5 ft. wide, provided that it has no creature grappled. Each creature in that line must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 10 ({@dice 3d6}) asit damage on a failed save, yada half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Tail
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +7} vurmak için, erişim 10 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 18 ({@dice 4d6+4}) ezme hasarı. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw yada be knocked prone.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The ape makes two fist attacks.

action.name: Fist
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +5} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 6 ({@dice 1d6+3}) ezme hasarı.

action.name: Rock
entries: Menzilli Silah Saldırısı: {@hit +5} vurmak için, menzil 25/50 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 6 ({@dice 1d6+3}) ezme hasarı.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The arcanaloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The arcanaloth's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Pençeler
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +7} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 8 ({@dice 2d4+3}) kesme hasarı. The target must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw, taking 10 ({@dice 3d6}) zehir damage on a failed save, yada half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Teleport
entries: The arcanaloth magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing yada carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

variant.name: Yugoloth Summoning
entries: Some yugoloths have an action option that allows them to summon other yugoloths.

entries.name: Summon Yugoloth (1/Gün)
entries: The yugoloth attempts a magical summoning.
An arcanaloth has a {@chance 40|40 percent|40% summoning chance} chance of summoning one arcanaloth.

A summoned yugoloth appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner, does as it pleases, and can't summon other yugoloths. The summoned yugoloth remains for 1 minute, until it yada its summoner dies, yada until its summoner takes a bonus action to dismiss it.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The arcanaloth's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell kurtulma zarı DC'si 15). The arcanaloth can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The arcanaloth is a 16th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell kurtulma zarı DC'si 17, {@hit 9} büyü saldırıları ile vurmak için). The arcanaloth has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The archmage has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Dagger
entries: Yakın Dövüş yada Menzilli Silah Saldırısı: {@hit +6} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft. yada menzil 20/60 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 4 ({@dice 1d4+2}) delme hasarı.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The archmage is an 18th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell kurtulma zarı DC'si 17, {@hit 9} büyü saldırıları ile vurmak için). The archmage can cast disguise self and invisibility at will and has the following wizard spells prepared:
footerEntries: * The archmage casts these spells on itself before combat.

monster.name: Assassin
monster.languages: Thieves' cant artı herhangi iki dil

trait.name: Assassinate
entries: During its first turn, the assassin has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn. Any hit the assassin scores against a surprised creature is a critical hit.

trait.name: Evasion
entries: If the assassin is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the assassin instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: The assassin deals an extra 13 ({@dice 4d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, yada when the target is within 5 ft. of an ally of the assassin that isn't incapacitated and the assassin doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The assassin makes two shortsword attacks.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +6} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 6 ({@dice 1d6+3}) delme hasarı, and the target must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 24 ({@dice 7d6}) zehir damage on a failed save, yada half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Light Crossbow
entries: Menzilli Silah Saldırısı: {@hit +6} vurmak için, menzil 80/320 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 7 ({@dice 1d8+3}) delme hasarı, and the target must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 24 ({@dice 7d6}) zehir damage on a failed save, yada half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Yanıltıcı Görünüş
entries: Uyanmış çalı hareketsiz kaldığı sürece normal bir çalıdan ayırt edilemez.

action.name: Tırmalama
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +1} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 1 ({@dice 1d4-1}) kesme hasarı.

monster.name: Awakened Tree
monster.languages: one language known by its creator

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the tree remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal tree.

action.name: Slam
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +6} vurmak için, erişim 10 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 14 ({@dice 3d6+4}) ezme hasarı.

action.name: Gaga
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +4} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 6 ({@dice 1d8+2}) kesme hasarı.

trait.name: Heated Body
entries: A creature that touches the azer yada hits it with a melee attack while within 5 ft. of it takes 5 ({@dice 1d10}) ateş damage.

trait.name: Heated Weapons
entries: When the azer hits with a metal melee weapon, it deals an extra 3 ({@dice 1d6}) ateş damage (included in the attack).

trait.name: Illumination
entries: The azer sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 ft..

action.name: Warhammer
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +5} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 7 ({@dice 1d8+3}) ezme hasarı, yada 8 ({@dice 1d10+3}) ezme hasarı eğer iki el ile kullanıldıysa to make a melee attack, artı 3 ({@dice 1d6}) ateş damage.

trait.name: Sürü Taktiği
entries: Eğer babunun bir dostu düşmanın 5 ft. yanında ise dostu ile saldırı avantajına sahip olur.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +1} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 1 ({@dice 1d4-1}) delme hasarı.

trait.name: Keskin Koklama
entries: Porsuk koklamaya bağlı Akıl (Algılama) zarlarında avantajlıdır.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +2} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 1 delme hasarı.

trait.name: Death Throes
entries: When the balor dies, it explodes, and each creature within 30 feet of it must make a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw, taking 70 ({@dice 20d6}) ateş damage on a failed save, yada half as much damage on a successful one. The explosion ignites flammable objects in that area that aren't being worn yada carried, and it destroys the balor's weapons.

trait.name: ateş Aura
entries: At the start of each of the balor's turns, each creature within 5 feet of it takes 10 ({@dice 3d6}) ateş damage, and flammable objects in the aura that aren't being worn yada carried ignite. A creature that touches the balor yada hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 10 ({@dice 3d6}) ateş damage.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The balor has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The balor's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The balor makes two attacks: one with its longsword and one with its whip.

action.name: Longsword
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +14} vurmak için, erişim 10 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 21 ({@dice 3d8+8}) kesme hasarı artı 13 ({@dice 3d8}) yıldırım damage. If the balor scores a critical hit, it rolls damage dice three times, instead of twice.

action.name: Whip
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +14} vurmak için, erişim 30 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 15 ({@dice 2d6+8}) kesme hasarı artı 10 ({@dice 3d6}) ateş damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 20 Strength saving throw yada be pulled up to 25 feet toward the balor.

action.name: Teleport
entries: The balor magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing yada carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

action.name: Variant: Summon Demon (1/Gün)
entries: The demon chooses what to summon and attempts a magical summoning.

A balor has a {@chance 50|50 percent|50% summoning chance} chance of summoning {@dice 1d8} {@creature vrock}s, {@dice 1d6} {@creature hezrou}s, {@dice 1d4} {@creature glabrezu}s, {@dice 1d3} {@creature nalfeshnee}s, {@dice 1d2} {@creature marilith}s, yada one {@creature goristro}.

A summoned demon appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other demons. It remains for 1 minute, until it yada its summoner dies, yada until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

action.name: Pala
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +3} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 4 ({@dice 1d6+1}) kesme hasarı.

action.name: Hafif Arbalet
entries: Menzilli Silah Saldırısı: {@hit +3} vurmak için, menzil 80 ft./320 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 5 ({@dice 1d8+1}) delme hasarı.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The captain makes three melee attacks: two with its scimitar and one with its dagger. Or the captain makes two ranged attacks with its daggers.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +5} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 6 ({@dice 1d6+3}) kesme hasarı.

action.name: Dagger
entries: Yakın Dövüş yada Menzilli Silah Saldırısı: {@hit +5} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft. yada menzil 20/60 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 5 ({@dice 1d4+3}) delme hasarı.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The captain adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the captain must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

trait.name: Detect Life
entries: The banshee can magically sense the presence of living creatures up to 5 miles away that aren't undead yada constructs. She knows the general direction they're in but not their exact locations.

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The banshee can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. She takes 5 ({@dice 1d10}) güç hasarı if she ends her turn inside an object.

action.name: Corrupting Touch
entries: Melee Spell Attack: {@hit +4} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 12 ({@dice 3d6+2}) nekrotik damage.

action.name: Horrifying Visage
entries: Each non-undead creature within 60 ft. of the banshee that can see her must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw yada be frightened for 1 minute. A frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if the banshee is within line of sight, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful yada the effect ends for it, the target is immune to the banshee's Horrifying Visage for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Wail (1/Gün)
entries: The banshee releases a mournful wail, provided that she isn't in sunlight. This wail has no effect on constructs and undead. All other creatures within 30 ft. of her that can hear her must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw. On a failure, a creature drops to 0 hit points. On a success, a creature takes 10 ({@dice 3d6}) psişik damage.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

trait.name: Barbed Hide
entries: At the start of each of its turns, the barbed devil deals 5 ({@dice 1d10}) delme hasarı to any creature grappling it.

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's gece görüşü.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The devil makes three melee attacks: one with its tail and two with its claws. Alternatively, it can use Hurl Flame twice.

action.name: Pençe
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +6} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 6 ({@dice 1d6+3}) delme hasarı.

action.name: Tail
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +6} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 10 ({@dice 2d6+3}) delme hasarı.

action.name: Hurl Flame
entries: Ranged Spell Attack: {@hit +5} vurmak için, menzil 150 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 10 ({@dice 3d6}) ateş damage. If the target is a flammable object that isn't being worn yada carried, it also catches ateş.

monster.name: Barlgura
monster.senses: kör görüş 30 ft., gece görüşü 120 ft.

trait.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of its turn, the barlgura can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls it makes during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Running Leap
entries: The barlgura's long jump is up to 40 feet and its high jump is up to 20 feet when it has a running start.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The barlgura makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its fists.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +7} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 11 ({@dice 2d6+4}) delme hasarı.

action.name: Fist
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +7} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 9 ({@dice 1d10+4}) ezme hasarı.

action.name: Variant: Summon Demon (1/Gün)
entries: The demon chooses what to summon and attempts a magical summoning.
A barlgura has a {@chance 30|30 percent|30% summoning chance} chance of summoning one barlgura.

A summoned demon appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other demons. It remains for 1 minute, until it yada its summoner dies, yada until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The barlgura's spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell kurtulma zarı DC'si 13). The barlgura can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Petrifying Gaze
entries: If a creature starts its turn within 30 ft. of the basilisk and the two of them can see each other, the basilisk can force the creature to make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw if the basilisk isn't incapacitated. On a failed save, the creature magically begins to turn to stone and is restrained. It must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends. On a failure, the creature is petrified until freed by the greater restoration spell yada other magic.

A creature that isn't surprised can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If it does so, it can't see the basilisk until the start of its next turn, when it can avert its eyes again. If it looks at the basilisk in the meantime, it must immediately make the save.
If the basilisk sees its reflection within 30 ft. of it in bright light, it mistakes itself for a rival and targets itself with its gaze.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +5} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 10 ({@dice 2d6+3}) delme hasarı artı 7 ({@dice 2d6}) zehir damage.

trait.name: Ekolokasyon
entries: Yarasa sağır olduğu zaman körgörüşü kullanamaz.

trait.name: Keskin Duyma
entries: Yarasa duymaya bağlı Akıl (Algılama) zarlarında avantajlıdır.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +0} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek varlık. Vurunca: 1 delme hasarı.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's gece görüşü.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Steadfast
entries: The devil can't be frightened while it can see an allied creature within 30 feet of it.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The devil makes two attacks: one with its beard and one with its glaive.

action.name: Beard
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +5} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek varlık. Vurunca: 6 ({@dice 1d8+2}) delme hasarı, and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw yada be poisoned for 1 minute. While poisoned in this way, the target can't regain hit points. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Glaive
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +5} vurmak için, erişim 10 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 8 ({@dice 1d10+3}) kesme hasarı. If the target is a creature other than an undead yada a construct, it must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw yada lose 5 ({@dice 1d10}) hit points at the start of each of its turns due to an infernal wound. Each time the devil hits the wounded target with this attack, the damage dealt by the wound increases by 5 ({@dice 1d10}). Any creature can take an action to stanch the wound with a successful DC 12 Wisdom (Medicine) check. The wound also closes if the target receives magical healing.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The behir makes two attacks: one with its bite and one to constrict.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +10} vurmak için, erişim 10 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 22 ({@dice 3d10+6}) delme hasarı.

action.name: Constrict
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +10} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., one Large yada smaller creature. Vurunca: 17 ({@dice 2d10+6}) ezme hasarı artı 17 ({@dice 2d10+6}) kesme hasarı. The target is grappled (escape DC 16) if the behir isn't already constricting a creature, and the target is restrained until this grapple ends.

action.name: Lightning Breath (Recharge 5—6)
entries: The behir exhales a line of yıldırım that is 20 ft. long and 5 ft. wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw, taking 66 ({@dice 12d10}) yıldırım damage on a failed save, yada half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Swallow
entries: The behir makes one bite attack against a Medium yada smaller target it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target is also swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the target is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the behir, and it takes 21 ({@dice 6d6}) asit damage at the start of each of the behir's turns. A behir can have only tek varlık swallowed at a time.

If the behir takes 30 damage yada more on a single turn from the swallowed creature, the behir must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn yada regurgitate the creature, which falls prone in a space within 10 ft. of the behir. If the behir dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse by using 15 ft. of movement, exiting prone.

trait.name: Antimagic Cone
entries: The beholder's central eye creates an area of antimagic, as in the antimagic field spell, in a 150-foot cone. At the start of each of its turns, the beholder decides which way the cone faces and whether the cone is active. The area works against the beholder's own eye rays.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +5} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 14 ({@dice 4d6}) delme hasarı.

action.name: Eye Rays
entries: The beholder shoots three of the following magical eye rays at random (reroll duplicates), choosing one to three targets it can see within 120 ft. of it:
1. Charm Ray. The targeted creature must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw yada be charmed by the beholder for 1 hour, yada until the beholder harms the creature.

2. Paralyzing Ray. The targeted creature must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw yada be paralyzed for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

3. Fear Ray. The targeted creature must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw yada be frightened for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

4. Slowing Ray. The targeted creature must succeed on a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target's speed is halved for 1 minute. In addition, the creature can't take reactions, and it can take either an action yada a bonus action on its turn, not both. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
5. Enervation Ray. The targeted creature must make a DC 16 Constitution saving throw, taking 36 ({@dice 8d8}) nekrotik damage on a failed save, yada half as much damage on a successful one.

6. Telekinetic Ray. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw yada the beholder moves it up to 30 ft. in any direction. It is restrained by the ray's telekinetic grip until the start of the beholder's next turn yada until the beholder is incapacitated.

If the target is an object weighing 300 pounds yada less that isn't being worn yada carried, it is moved up to 30 ft. in any direction. The beholder can also exert fine control on objects with this ray, such as manipulating a simple tool yada opening a door yada a container.

7. Sleep Ray. The targeted creature must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw yada fall asleep and remain unconscious for 1 minute. The target awakens if it takes damage yada another creature takes an action to wake it. This ray has no effect on constructs and undead.

8. Petrification Ray. The targeted creature must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature begins to turn to stone and is restrained. It must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends. On a failure, the creature is petrified until freed by the greater restoration spell yada other magic.

9. Disintegration Ray. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw yada take 45 ({@dice 10d8}) güç hasarı. If this damage reduces the creature to 0 hit points, its body becomes a pile of fine gray dust.

If the target is a Large yada smaller nonmagical object yada creation of magical force, it is disintegrated without a saving throw. If the target is a Huge yada larger object yada creation of magical force, this ray disintegrates a 10-foot cube of it.
10. Death Ray. The targeted creature must succeed on a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw yada take 55 ({@dice 10d10}) nekrotik damage. The target dies if the ray reduces it to 0 hit points.

legendary.name: Eye Ray
entries: The beholder uses one random eye ray.

monster.name: Beholder Zombie
monster.languages: understands Deep Speech and Undercommon but can't speak

trait.name: Undead Fortitude
entries: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5+the damage taken, unless the damage is radyant yada from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +3} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 14 ({@dice 4d6}) delme hasarı.

action.name: Eye Ray
entries: The zombie uses a random magical eye ray, choosing a target that it can see within 60 feet of it.

1. Paralyzing Ray. The targeted creature must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw yada be paralyzed for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

2. Fear Ray. The targeted creature must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw yada be frightened for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
3. Enervation Ray. The targeted creature must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw, taking 36 ({@dice 8d8}) nekrotik damage on a failed save, yada half as much damage on a successful one.

4. Disintegration Ray. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw yada take 45 ({@dice 10d8}) güç hasarı. If this damage reduces the creature to 0 hit points, its body becomes a pile of fine gray dust.

If the target is a Large yada smaller nonmagical object yada creation of magical force, it is disintegrated without a saving throw. If the target is a Huge yada larger nonmagical object yada creation of magical force, this ray disintegrates a 10-foot cube of it.

trait.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of its turn, the berserker can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +5} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 9 ({@dice 1d12+3}) kesme hasarı.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The bear has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı

action.name: Pençeler
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +3} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 7 ({@dice 2d4+2}) kesme hasarı.

monster.senses: kör görüş 10 ft., gece görüşü 60 ft.

entries: The dragon can breathe air and water.

action.name: Acid Breath (Recharge 5—6)
entries: The dragon exhales asit in a 15-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 11 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 ({@dice 5d8}) asit damage on a failed save, yada half as much damage on a successful one.

monster.name: Black Pudding
monster.senses: kör görüş 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius)

trait.name: Amorphous
entries: The pudding can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Corrosive Form
entries: A creature that touches the pudding yada hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 4 ({@dice 1d8}) asit damage. Any nonmagical weapon made of metal yada wood that hits the pudding corrodes. After dealing damage, the weapon takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to damage rolls. If its penalty drops to -5, the weapon is destroyed. Nonmagical ammunition made of metal yada wood that hits the pudding is destroyed after dealing damage. The pudding can eat through 2-inch-thick, nonmagical wood yada metal in 1 round.

trait.name: Örümcek Climb
entries: The pudding can tırmanma difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Pseudopod
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +5} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 6 ({@dice 1d6+3}) ezme hasarı artı 18 ({@dice 4d8}) asit damage. In addition, nonmagical armor worn by the target is partly dissolved and takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to the AC it offers. The armor is destroyed if the penalty reduces its AC to 10.

reaction.name: Split
entries: When a pudding that is Medium yada larger is subjected to yıldırım yada kesme hasarı, it splits into two new puddings if it has at least 10 hit points. Each new pudding has hit points equal to half the original pudding's, rounded down. New puddings are one size smaller than the original pudding.

monster.languages: Blink Dog, understands Sylvan but can't speak it

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The dog has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing yada smell.

action.name: Isırma

action.name: Teleport (Recharge 4—6)
entries: The dog magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing yada carrying, up to 40 ft. to an unoccupied space it can see. Before yada after teleporting, the dog can make one bite attack.

trait.name: Keskin Görüş
entries: Şahin görüşe bağlı Akıl (Algılama) zarlarında avantaja sahiptir.

trait.name: Sürü Taktiği
entries: Eğer şahinin bir dostu düşmanın 5 ft. yanında ise dostu ile saldırı avantajına sahip olur.

action.name: Gaga
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +4} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 4 ({@dice 1d4+2}) delme hasarı.

action.name: Lightning Breath (Recharge 5—6)
entries: The dragon exhales yıldırım in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 ({@dice 4d10}) yıldırım damage on a failed save, yada half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The slaad has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The slaad regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point.

trait.name: Variant: Control Gem
entries: Implanted in the slaad's brain is a magic control gem. The slaad must obey whoever possesses the gem and is immune to being charmed while so controlled.

Certain spells can be used to acquire the gem. If the slaad fails its saving throw against imprisonment, the spell can transfer the gem to the spellcaster's open hand, instead of imprisoning the slaad. A wish spell, if cast in the slaad's presence, can be worded to acquire the gem.
A greater restoration spell cast on the slaad destroys the gem without harming the slaad.

Someone who is proficient in Wisdom (Medicine) can remove the gem from an incapacitated slaad. Each try requires 1 minute of uninterrupted work and a successful DC 20 Wisdom (Medicine) check. Each failed attempt deals 22 ({@dice 4d10}) psişik damage to the slaad.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The slaad makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +8} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 12 ({@dice 2d6+5}) delme hasarı.

action.name: Pençe
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +8} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 12 ({@dice 2d6+5}) kesme hasarı. If the target is a insansı, it must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw yada be infected with a disease called chaos phage. While infected, the target can't regain hit points, and its hit point maximum is reduced by 10 ({@dice 3d6}) every 24 hours. If the disease reduces the target's hit point maximum to 0, the target instantly transforms into a red slaad yada, if it has the ability to cast spells of 3rd level yada higher, a green slaad. Only a wish spell can reverse the transformation.

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the boar moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a tusk attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 3 ({@dice 1d6}) kesme hasarı. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 11 Strength saving throw yada be knocked prone.

trait.name: Relentless (Recharges after a Short yada Long Rest)
entries: If the boar takes 7 damage yada less that would reduce it to 0 hit points, it is reduced to 1 hit point instead.

action.name: Tusk
