entries: The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons.

items.name: Lightning Breath.
items.entry: The dragon exhales yıldırım in a 40-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 16 (3d10) yıldırım damage on a failed save, yada half as much damage on a successful one.

items.name: Repulsion Breath.
items.entry: The dragon exhales repulsion energy in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is pushed 30 feet away from the dragon.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The bear has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The bear makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Weapon Attack: {@hit +5} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 8 ({@dice 1d8+4}) delme hasarı.

action.name: Pençeler
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +5} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 11 ({@dice 2d6+4}) kesme hasarı.

trait.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the bugbear hits with it (included in the attack).

trait.name: Surprise Attack
entries: If the bugbear surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage from the attack.

action.name: Morningstar
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +4} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 11 ({@dice 2d8+2}) delme hasarı.

action.name: Cirit
entries: Yakın Dövüş yada Menzilli Silah Saldırısı: {@hit +4} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft. yada menzil 30/120 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 9 ({@dice 2d6+2}) delme hasarı in melee yada 5 ({@dice 1d6+2}) delme hasarı at menzil.

trait.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the bugbear hits with it (included in the attack).

trait.name: Surprise Attack
entries: If the bugbear surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage from the attack.

trait.name: Heart of Hruggek
entries: The bugbear has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, frightened, paralyzed, poisoned, stunned, yada put to sleep.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The bugbear makes two melee attacks

action.name: Morningstar
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +5} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 11 ({@dice 2d8+3}) delme hasarı.

action.name: Cirit
entries: Yakın Dövüş yada Menzilli Silah Saldırısı: {@hit +5} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft. yada menzil 30/120 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 9 ({@dice 2d6+3}) delme hasarı in melee yada 5 ({@dice 1d6+3}) delme hasarı at menzil.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The bulette's long jump is up to 30 ft. and its high jump is up to 15 ft., with yada without a running start.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +7} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 30 ({@dice 4d12+4}) delme hasarı.

action.name: Deadly Leap
entries: If the bulette jumps at least 15 ft. as part of its movement, it can then use this action to land on its feet in a space that contains one yada more other creatures. Each of those creatures must succeed on a DC 16 Strength yada Dexterity saving throw (target's choice) yada be knocked prone and take 14 ({@dice 3d6+4}) ezme hasarı artı 14 ({@dice 3d6+4}) kesme hasarı. On a successful save, the creature takes only half the damage, isn't knocked prone, and is pushed 5 ft. out of the bulette's space into an unoccupied space of the creature's choice. If no unoccupied space is within menzil, the creature instead falls prone in the bulette's space.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The bullywug can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Speak with Kurbağas and Toads
entries: The bullywug can communicate simple concepts to Kurbağas and toads when it speaks in Bullywug.

trait.name: Swamp Camouflage
entries: The bullywug has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in swampy terrain.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The bullywug's long jump is up to 20 ft. and its high jump is up to 10 ft., with yada without a running start.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The bullywug makes two melee attacks: one with its bite and one with its spear.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +3} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 3 ({@dice 1d4+1}) ezme hasarı.

action.name: Spear
entries: Yakın Dövüş yada Menzilli Silah Saldırısı: {@hit +3} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft. yada menzil 20/60 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 4 ({@dice 1d6+1}) delme hasarı, yada 5 ({@dice 1d8+1}) delme hasarı eğer iki el ile kullanıldıysa to make a melee attack.

trait.name: Fiendish Blessing
entries: The AC of the cambion includes its Charisma bonus.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The cambion makes two melee attacks yada uses its Fire Ray twice.

action.name: Spear
entries: Yakın Dövüş yada Menzilli Silah Saldırısı: {@hit +7} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft. yada menzil 20/60 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 7 ({@dice 1d6+4}) delme hasarı, yada 8 ({@dice 1d8+4}) delme hasarı eğer iki el ile kullanıldıysa to make a melee attack, artı 3 ({@dice 1d6}) ateş damage.

action.name: Fire Ray
entries: Ranged Spell Attack: {@hit +7} vurmak için, menzil 120 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 10 ({@dice 3d6}) ateş damage.

action.name: Fiendish Charm
entries: One insansı the cambion can see within 30 ft. of it must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw yada be magically charmed for 1 Gün. The charmed target obeys the cambion's spoken commands. If the target suffers any harm from the cambion yada another creature yada receives a suicidal command from the cambion, the target can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful, yada if the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the cambion's Fiendish Charm for the next 24 hours.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The cambion's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell kurtulma zarı DC'si 14). The cambion can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +5} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 2 ({@dice 1d4}) ezme hasarı.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The carrion crawler has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Örümcek Climb
entries: The carrion crawler can tırmanma difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The carrion crawler makes two attacks: one with its tentacles and one with its bite.

action.name: Tentacles
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +8} vurmak için, erişim 10 ft., tek varlık. Vurunca: 4 ({@dice 1d4+2}) zehir damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw yada be poisoned for 1 minute. Until this zehir ends, the target is paralyzed. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the zehir on itself on a success.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +4} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 7 ({@dice 2d4+2}) delme hasarı.

trait.name: Keskin Koklama
entries: Kedi koklamaya bağlı Akıl (Algılama) zarlarında avantajlıdır.

action.name: Pençeler
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +0} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 1 kesme hasarı.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The bear has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The bear makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +7} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 9 ({@dice 1d8+5}) delme hasarı.

action.name: Pençeler
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +7} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 12 ({@dice 2d6+5}) kesme hasarı.

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the centaur moves at least 30 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a pike attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 10 ({@dice 3d6}) delme hasarı.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The centaur makes two attacks: one with its pike and one with its hooves yada two with its longbow.

action.name: Pike
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +6} vurmak için, erişim 10 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 9 ({@dice 1d10+4}) delme hasarı.

action.name: Hooves
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +6} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 11 ({@dice 2d6+4}) ezme hasarı.

action.name: Longbow
entries: Menzilli Silah Saldırısı: {@hit +4} vurmak için, menzil 150/600 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 6 ({@dice 1d8+2}) delme hasarı.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's gece görüşü.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The devil makes two attacks with its chains.

action.name: Chain
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +8} vurmak için, erişim 10 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 11 ({@dice 2d6+4}) kesme hasarı. The target is grappled (escape DC 14) if the devil isn't already grappling a creature. Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained and takes 7 ({@dice 2d6}) delme hasarı at the start of each of its turns.

action.name: Animate Chains (Recharges after a Short yada Long Rest)
entries: Up to four chains the devil can see within 60 feet of it magically sprout razor-edged barbs and animate under the devil's control, provided that the chains aren't being worn yada carried.

Each animated chain is an object with AC 20, 20 hit points, resistance to delme hasarı, and immunity to psişik and ses damage. When the devil uses Çoklu Saldırı on its turn, it can use each animated chain to make one additional chain attack. An animated chain can grapple tek varlık of its own but can't make attacks while grappling. An animated chain reverts to its inanimate state if reduced to 0 hit points yada if the devil is incapacitated yada dies.

reaction.name: Unnerving Mask
entries: When a creature the devil can see starts its turn within 30 feet of the devil, the devil can create the illusion that it looks like one of the creature's departed loved ones yada bitter enemies. If the creature can see the devil, it must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw yada be frightened until the end of its turn.

monster.name: Chasme
monster.senses: kör görüş 10 ft., gece görüşü 120 ft.

trait.name: Drone
entries: The chasme produces a horrid droning sound to which demons are immune. Any other creature that starts its turn with in 30 feet of the chasme must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw yada fall unconscious for 10 minutes. A creature that can't hear the drone automatically succeeds on the save. The effect on the creature ends if it takes damage yada if another creature takes an action to splash it with holy water. If a creature's saving throw is successful yada the effect ends for it, it is immune to the drone for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The chasme has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Örümcek Climb
entries: The chasme can tırmanma difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Proboscis
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +5} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek varlık. Vurunca: 16 ({@dice 4d6+2}) delme hasarı artı 24 ({@dice 7d6}) nekrotik damage, and the target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the nekrotik damage taken. If this effect reduces a creature's hit point maximum to 0, the creature dies. This reduction to a creature's hit point maximum lasts until the creature finishes a long rest yada until it is affected by a spell like greater restoration.

action.name: Variant: Summon Demon (1/Gün)
entries: The demon chooses what to summon and attempts a magical summoning.
A chasme has a {@chance 30|30 percent|30% summoning chance} chance of summoning one chasme.

A summoned demon appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other demons. It remains for 1 minute, until it yada its summoner dies, yada until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The chimera makes three attacks: one with its bite, one with its horns, and one with its claws. When its ateş breath is available, it can use the breath in place of its bite yada horns.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +7} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 11 ({@dice 2d6+4}) delme hasarı.

action.name: Horns
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +7} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 10 ({@dice 1d12+4}) ezme hasarı.

action.name: Pençeler
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +7} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 11 ({@dice 2d6+4}) kesme hasarı.

action.name: Fire Breath (Recharge 5—6)
entries: The dragon head exhales ateş in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 31 ({@dice 7d8}) ateş damage on a failed save, yada half as much damage on a successful one.

monster.name: Chuul
monster.languages: understands Deep Speech but can't speak

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The chuul can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Sense Magic
entries: The chuul senses magic within 120 feet of it at will. This trait otherwise works like the detect magic spell but isn't itself magical.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The chuul makes two pincer attacks. If the chuul is grappling a creature, the chuul can also use its tentacles once.

action.name: Pincer
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +6} vurmak için, erişim 10 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 11 ({@dice 2d6+4}) ezme hasarı. The target is grappled (escape DC 14) if it is a Large yada smaller creature and the chuul doesn't have two other creatures grappled.

action.name: Tentacles
entries: One creature grappled by the chuul must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw yada be poisoned for 1 minute. Until this zehir ends, the target is paralyzed. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

monster.name: Clay Golem

immune.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

monster.languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Acid Absorption
entries: Whenever the golem is subjected to asit damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the asit damage dealt.

trait.name: Berserk
entries: Whenever the golem starts its turn with 60 hit points yada fewer, roll a d6. On a 6, the golem goes berserk. On each of its turns while berserk, the golem attacks the nearest creature it can see. If no creature is near enough to move to and attack, the golem attacks an object, with preference for an object smaller than itself. Once the golem goes berserk, it continues to do so until it is destroyed yada regains all its hit points.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The golem is immune to any spell yada effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The golem's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The golem makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +8} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 16 ({@dice 2d10+5}) ezme hasarı. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw yada have its hit point maximum reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. The target dies if this attack reduces its hit point maximum to 0. The reduction lasts until removed by the greater restoration spell yada other magic.

action.name: Haste (Recharge 5—6)
entries: Until the end of its next turn, the golem magically gains a +2 bonus to its AC, has advantage on Dexterity saving throws, and can use its slam attack as a bonus action.

trait.name: Damage Transfer
entries: While attached to a creature, the cloaker takes only half the damage dealt to it (rounded down). and that creature takes the other half.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the cloaker remains motionless without its underside exposed, it is indistinguishable from a dark leather cloak.

trait.name: Light Sensitivity
entries: While in bright light, the cloaker has disadvantage on attack rolls and Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The cloaker makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +6} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek varlık. Vurunca: 10 ({@dice 2d6+3}) delme hasarı, and if the target is Large yada smaller, the cloaker attaches to it. If the cloaker has advantage against the target, the cloaker attaches to the target's head, and the target is blinded and unable to breathe while the cloaker is attached. While attached, the cloaker can make this attack only against the target and has advantage on the attack roll. The cloaker can detach itself by spending 5 feet of its movement. A creature, including the target, can take its action to detach the cloaker by succeeding on a DC 16 Strength check.

action.name: Tail
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +6} vurmak için, erişim 10 ft., tek varlık. Vurunca: 7 ({@dice 1d8+3}) kesme hasarı.

action.name: Moan
entries: Each creature within 60 feet of the cloaker that can hear its moan and that isn't an Aberasyon must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw yada become frightened until the end of the cloaker's next turn. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to the cloaker's moan for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Phantasms (Recharges after a Short yada Long Rest)
entries: The cloaker magically creates three illusory duplicates of itself if it isn't in bright light. The duplicates move with it and mimic its actions, shifting position so as to make it impossible to track which cloaker is the real one. If the cloaker is ever in an area of bright light, the duplicates disappear.

Whenever any creature targets the cloaker with an attack yada a harmful spell while a duplicate remains, that creature rolls randomly to determine whether it targets the cloaker yada one of the duplicates. A creature is unaffected by this magical effect if it can't see yada if it relies on senses other than sight.
A duplicate has the cloaker's AC and uses its saving throws. If an attack hits a duplicate, yada if a duplicate fails a saving throw against an effect that deals damage, the duplicate disappears.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The giant has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The giant makes two morningstar attacks.

action.name: Morningstar
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +12} vurmak için, erişim 10 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 21 ({@dice 3d8+8}) delme hasarı.

action.name: Rock
entries: Menzilli Silah Saldırısı: {@hit +12} vurmak için, menzil 60/240 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 30 ({@dice 4d10+8}) ezme hasarı.

variant.name: New Dev Options
entries: Some adult cloud giants have the magical ability to cre­ate barriers of gale-force wind around themselves that can deflect incoming missiles. Others like to fling ene­mies through the air. These abilities are represented by the following action options.

entries.name: Fling
entries: The giant tries to throw a Small yada Medium creature within 10 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw yada be hurled up to 60 feet horizontally in a direction of the giant's choice and land prone, taking 1d8 ezme hasarı for every 10 feet it was thrown.

entries.name: Wind Aura
entries: A magical aura of wind surrounds the giant. The aura is a 10-foot-radius sphere that lasts as long as the giant maintains concentration on it (as if concentrating on a spell). While the aura is in effect, the giant gains a +2 bonus to its AC against ranged weapon attacks, and all open flames within the aura are extinguished unless they are magical.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The giant's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma. It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +3} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek varlık. Vurunca: 3 ({@dice 1d4+1}) delme hasarı, and the target must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw against being magically petrified. On a failed save, the creature begins to turn to stone and is restrained. It must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends. On a failure, the creature is petrified for 24 hours.

action.name: Sopa
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +2} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 2 ({@dice 1d4}) ezme hasarı.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +4} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek varlık. Vurunca: 5 ({@dice 1d6+2}) delme hasarı.

action.name: Constrict
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +4} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek varlık. Vurunca: 6 ({@dice 1d8+2}) ezme hasarı, and the target is grappled (escape DC 14). Until this grapple ends, the creature is restrained, and the snake can't constrict another target.

monster.name: Copper Dragon Wyrmling
monster.senses: kör görüş 10 ft., gece görüşü 60 ft.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +4} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 7 ({@dice 1d10+2}) delme hasarı.

action.name: Breath Weapons (Recharge 5—6)
entries: The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons.

items.name: Acid Breath.
items.entry: The dragon exhales asit in an 20-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 11 Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 (4d8) asit damage on a failed save, yada half as much damage on a successful one.

items.name: Slowing Breath.
items.entry: The dragon exhales gas in a 1 5-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature can't use reactions, its speed is halved, and it can't make more than one attack on its turn. In addition, the creature can use either an action yada a bonus action on its turn, but not both. These effects last for 1 minute. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself with a successful save.

immune.note: from nonmagical attacks

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The couatl's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Shielded Mind
entries: The couatl is immune to scrying and to any effect that would sense its emotions, read its thoughts, yada detect its location.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +8} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek varlık. Vurunca: 8 ({@dice 1d6+5}) delme hasarı, and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw yada be poisoned for 24 hours. Until this zehir ends, the target is unconscious. Another creature can use an action to shake the target awake.

action.name: Constrict
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +6} vurmak için, erişim 10 ft., one Medium yada smaller creature. Vurunca: 10 ({@dice 2d6+3}) ezme hasarı, and the target is grappled (escape DC 15). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the couatl can't constrict another target.

action.name: Change Shape
entries: The couatl magically polymorphs into a insansı yada hayvan that has a challenge rating equal to yada less than its own, yada back into its true form. It reverts to its true form if it dies. Any equipment it is wearing yada carrying is absorbed yada borne by the new form (the couatl's choice).

In a new form, the couatl retains its game statistics and ability to speak, but its AC, movement modes, Strength, Dexterity, and other actions are replaced by those of the new form, and it gains any statistics and capabilities (except class features, legendary actions, and lair actions) that the new form has but that it lacks. If the new form has a bite attack, the couatl can use its bite in that form.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The couatl's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell kurtulma zarı DC'si 14). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring only verbal components:

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: Hem karada hem de suda nefes alabilir.

action.name: Pençe
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +0} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 1 ezme hasarı.

monster.name: Sürünen Pençe
monster.senses: kör görüş 30 ft. (bu çap dışında kör)

trait.name: Kovma Bağışıklığı
entries: Pençenin yaşayan ölüleri kovma etkilerine karşı bağışıklığı vardır.

action.name: Pençe
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +3} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 3 ({@dice 1d4+1}) ezme yada kesme hasarı (pençe'nin seçimine göre).

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: The crocodile can hold its breath for 15 minutes.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +4} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek varlık. Vurunca: 7 ({@dice 1d10+2}) delme hasarı, and the target is grappled (escape DC 12). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the crocodile can't bite another target

trait.name: Dark Devotion
entries: The fanatic has advantage on saving throws against being charmed yada frightened.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The fanatic makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Dagger
entries: Yakın Dövüş yada Menzilli Silah Saldırısı: {@hit +4} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft. yada menzil 20/60 ft., tek varlık. Vurunca: 4 ({@dice 1d4+2}) delme hasarı.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The fanatic is a 4th-level spellcaster. Its spell casting ability is Wisdom (spell kurtulma zarı DC'si 11, {@hit 3} büyü saldırıları ile vurmak için). The fanatic has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Karanlık Bağlılık
entries: Tarikatçılar korkma ve cezbedilme kurtulma zarlarında avantajlıdır.

action.name: Pala
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +3} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek varlık. Vurunca: 4 ({@dice 1d6+1}) kesme hasarı.

trait.name: Poor Depth Perception
entries: The cyclops has disadvantage on any attack roll against a target more than 30 ft. away.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The cyclops makes two greatclub attacks.

action.name: Greatclub
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +9} vurmak için, erişim 10 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 19 ({@dice 3d8+6}) ezme hasarı.

action.name: Rock
entries: Menzilli Silah Saldırısı: {@hit +9} vurmak için, menzil 30/120 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 28 ({@dice 4d10+6}) ezme hasarı.

trait.name: Earth Glide
entries: The dao can kazma through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone. While doing so, the dao doesn't disturb the material it moves through.

trait.name: Elemental Demise
entries: If the dao dies, its body disintegrates into crystalline powder, leaving behind only equipment the dao was wearing yada carrying.

trait.name: Sure-Footed
entries: The dao has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.

trait.name: Variant: Genie Powers
entries: Genies have a variety of magical capabilities, including spells. A few have even greater powers that allow them to alter their appearance yada the doğa of reality.
Disguises.

Some genies can veil themselves in illusion to pass as other similarly shaped creatures. Such genies can innately cast the disguise self spell at will, often with a longer duration than is normal for that spell. Mightier genies can cast the true polymorph spell one to three times per Gün, possibly with a longer duration than normal. Such genies can change only their own shape, but a rare few can use the spell on other creatures and objects as well.
Wishes.

The genie power to grant wishes is legendary among mortals. Only the most potent genies, such as those among the nobility, can do so. A particular genie that has this power can grant one to three wishes to a creature that isn't a genie. Once a genie has granted its limit of wishes, it can't grant wishes again for some amount of time (genellikle 1 year). and cosmic law dictates that the same genie can expend its limit of wishes on a specific creature only once in that creature's existence.

To be granted a wish, a creature within 60 feet of the genie states a desired effect to it. The genie can then cast the wish spell on the creature's behalf to bring about the effect. Depending on the genie's doğa, the genie might try to pervert the intent of the wish by exploiting the wish's poor wording. The perversion of the wording is genellikle crafted to be to the genie's benefit.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The Dao makes two fist attacks yada two maul attacks.

action.name: Fist
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +10} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 15 ({@dice 2d8+6}) ezme hasarı.

action.name: Maul
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +10} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 20 ({@dice 4d6+6}) ezme hasarı. If the target is a Huge yada smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 18 Strength check yada be knocked prone.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The dao's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell kurtulma zarı DC'si 14, {@hit 6} büyü saldırıları ile vurmak için). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Echolocation
entries: The darkmantle can't use its kör görüş while deafened.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the darkmantle remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a cave formation such as a stalactite yada stalagmite.

action.name: Crush
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +5} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek varlık. Vurunca: 6 ({@dice 1d6+3}) ezme hasarı, and the darkmantle attaches to the target. If the target is Medium yada smaller and the darkmantle has advantage on the attack roll, it attaches by engulfing the target's head, and the target is also blinded and unable to breathe while the darkmantle is attached in this way.

While attached to the target, the darkmantle can attack no other creature except the target but has advantage on its attack rolls. The darkmantle's speed also becomes 0, it can't benefit from any bonus to its speed, and it moves with the target.
A creature can detach the darkmantle by making a successful DC 13 Strength check as an action. On its turn, the darkmantle can detach itself from the target by using 5 feet of movement.

action.name: Darkness Aura (1/Gün)
entries: A 15-foot radius of magical darkness extends out from the darkmantle, moves with it, and spreads around corners. The darkness lasts as long as the darkmantle maintains concentration, up to 10 minutes (as if concentrating on a spell). Darkvision can't penetrate this darkness, and no natural light can illuminate it. If any of the darkness overlaps with an area of light created by a spell of 2nd level yada lower, the spell creating the light is dispelled.

trait.name: Two-Headed
entries: The dog has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks and on saving throws against being blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, yada knocked unconscious.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The dog makes two bite attacks.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +4} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 5 ({@dice 1d6+2}) delme hasarı. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw against disease yada become poisoned until the disease is cured. Every 24 hours that elapse, the creature must repeat the saving throw, reducing its hit point maximum by 5 ({@dice 1d10}) on a failure. This reduction lasts until the disease is cured. The creature dies if the disease reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

trait.name: Undead Nature
entries: A death knight doesn't require air, food, drink, yada sleep.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The death knight has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Marshal Undead
entries: Unless the death knight is incapacitated, it and undead creatures of its choice within 60 feet of it have advantage on saving throws against features that turn undead.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The death knight makes three longsword attacks.

action.name: Longsword
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +11} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 9 ({@dice 1d8+5}) kesme hasarı, yada 10 ({@dice 1d10+5}) kesme hasarı eğer iki el ile kullanıldıysa, artı 18 ({@dice 4d8}) nekrotik damage.

action.name: Hellfire Orb (1/Gün)
entries: The death knight hurls a magical ball of ateş that explodes at a point it can see within 120 feet of it. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw. The sphere spreads around corners. A creature takes 35 ({@dice 10d6}) ateş damage and 35 ({@dice 10d6}) nekrotik damage on a failed save, yada half as much damage on a successful one.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The death knight adds 6 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the death knight must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The death knight is a 19th-level spell caster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell kurtulma zarı DC'si 18, {@hit 10} büyü saldırıları ile vurmak için). It has the following paladin spells prepared:

monster.name: Death Slaad
monster.senses: kör görüş 60 ft., gece görüşü 60 ft.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The slaad can use its action to polymorph into a Small yada Medium insansı, yada back into its true form. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing yada carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The slaad has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The slaad's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The slaad regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point.

trait.name: Variant: Control Gem
entries: Implanted in the slaad's brain is a magic control gem. The slaad must obey whoever possesses the gem and is immune to being charmed while so controlled.

Certain spells can be used to acquire the gem. If the slaad fails its saving throw against imprisonment, the spell can transfer the gem to the spellcaster's open hand, instead of imprisoning the slaad. A wish spell, if cast in the slaad's presence, can be worded to acquire the gem.
A greater restoration spell cast on the slaad destroys the gem without harming the slaad.

Someone who is proficient in Wisdom (Medicine) can remove the gem from an incapacitated slaad. Each try requires 1 minute of uninterrupted work and a successful DC 20 Wisdom (Medicine) check. Each failed attempt deals 22 ({@dice 4d10}) psişik damage to the slaad.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The slaad makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws yada greatsword.

action.name: Isırma (Slaad Form Only)
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +9} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 9 ({@dice 1d8+5}) delme hasarı artı 7 ({@dice 2d6}) nekrotik damage.

action.name: Pençeler (Slaad Form Only)
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +9} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 10 ({@dice 1d10+5}) kesme hasarı artı 7 ({@dice 2d6}) nekrotik damage.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +9} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 12 ({@dice 2d6+5}) kesme hasarı artı 7 ({@dice 2d6}) nekrotik damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The slaad's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell kurtulma zarı DC'si 15, {@hit 7} büyü saldırıları ile vurmak için). The slaad can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Negative Energy Cone
entries: The death tyrant's central eye emits an invisible, magical 150-foot cone of negative energy. At the start of each of its turns, the tyrant decides which way the cone faces and whether the cone is active.

Any creature in that area can't regain hit points. Any insansı that dies there becomes a zombie under the tyrant's command. The dead insansı retains its place in the initiative order and animates at the start of its next turn, provided that its body hasn't been completely destroyed.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +5} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 14 ({@dice 4d6}) delme hasarı.

action.name: Eye Rays
entries: The death tyrant shoots three of the following magical eye rays at random (reroll duplicates), choosing one to three targets it can see within 120 ft. of it:
1. Charm Ray. The targeted creature must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw yada be charmed by the death tyrant for 1 hour, yada until the death tyrant harms the creature.

2. Paralyzing Ray. The targeted creature must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw yada be paralyzed for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

3. Fear Ray. The targeted creature must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw yada be frightened for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

4. Slowing Ray. The targeted creature must succeed on a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target's speed is halved for 1 minute. In addition, the creature can't take reactions, and it can take either an action yada a bonus action on its turn, not both. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
5. Enervation Ray. The targeted creature must make a DC 17 Constitution saving throw, taking 36 ({@dice 8d8}) nekrotik damage on a failed save, yada half as much damage on a successful one.

6. Telekinetic Ray. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 17 Strength saving throw yada the death tyrant moves it up to 30 ft. in any direction. It is restrained by the ray's telekinetic grip until the start of the death tyrant's next turn yada until the death tyrant is incapacitated.

If the target is an object weighing 300 pounds yada less that isn't being worn yada carried, it is moved up to 30 ft. in any direction. The death tyrant can also exert fine control on objects with this ray, such as manipulating a simple tool yada opening a door yada a container.

7. Sleep Ray. The targeted creature must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw yada fall asleep and remain unconscious for 1 minute. The target awakens if it takes damage yada another creature takes an action to wake it. This ray has no effect on constructs and undead.

8. Petrification Ray. The targeted creature must make a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature begins to turn to stone and is restrained. It must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends. On a failure, the creature is petrified until freed by the greater restoration spell yada other magic.

9. Disintegration Ray. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw yada take 45 ({@dice 10d8}) güç hasarı. If this damage reduces the creature to 0 hit points, its body becomes a pile of fine gray dust.

If the target is a Large yada smaller nonmagical object yada creation of magical force, it is disintegrated without a saving throw. If the target is a Huge yada larger object yada creation of magical force, this ray disintegrates a 10-foot cube of it.
10. Death Ray. The targeted creature must succeed on a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw yada take 55 ({@dice 10d10}) nekrotik damage. The target dies if the ray reduces it to 0 hit points.

legendary.name: Eye Ray
entries: The death tyrant uses one random eye ray.

trait.name: Stone Camouflage
entries: The gnome has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

trait.name: Gnome Cunning
entries: The gnome has advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws against magic.

action.name: War Pick
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +4} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 6 ({@dice 1d8+2}) delme hasarı.

action.name: Poisoned Dart
entries: Menzilli Silah Saldırısı: {@hit +4} vurmak için, menzil 30/120 ft., tek varlık. Vurunca: 4 ({@dice 1d4+2}) delme hasarı, and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw yada be poisoned for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The gnome's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell kurtulma zarı DC'si 11). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +2} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 2 ({@dice 1d4}) delme hasarı.

immune.note: from nonmagical attacks

trait.name: Avoidance
entries: If the demilich is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Gün)
entries: If the demilich fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Turn Immunity
entries: The demilich is immune to effects that turn undead.

action.name: Howl (Recharge 5—6)
entries: The demilich emits a bloodcurdling howl. Each creature within 30 feet of the demilich that can hear the howl must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw yada drop to 0 hit points. On a successful save, the creature is frightened until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Life Drain
entries: The demilich targets up to three creatures that it can see within 10 feet of it. Each target must succeed on a DC 19 Constitution saving throw yada take 21 ({@dice 6d6}) nekrotik damage, and the demilich regains hit points equal to the total damage dealt to all targets.

legendary.name: Flight
entries: The demilich flies up to half its flying speed.

legendary.name: Cloud of Dust
entries: The demilich magically swirls its dusty remains. Each creature within 10 feet of the demilich, including around a corner, must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw yada be blinded until the end of the demilich's next turn. A creature that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to this effect until the end of the demilich's next turn.

legendary.name: Energy Drain (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Each creature with in 30 feet of the demilich must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature's hit point maximum is magically reduced by 10 ({@dice 3d6}). If a creature's hit point maximum is reduced to 0 by this effect, the creature dies. A creature's hit point maximum can be restored with the greater restoration spell yada similar magic.

legendary.name: Vile Curse (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The demilich targets tek varlık it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw yada be magically cursed. Until the curse ends, the target has disadvantage on attack rolls and saving throws. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the curse on a success.

immune.note: from nonmagical attacks

trait.name: Avoidance
entries: If the demilich is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Gün)
entries: If the demilich fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Turn Immunity
entries: The demilich is immune to effects that turn undead.

entries: The demilich emits a bloodcurdling howl. Each creature within 30 feet of the demilich that can hear the howl must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw yada drop to 0 hit points. On a successful save, the creature is frightened until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Life Drain
entries: The demilich targets up to three creatures that it can see within 10 feet of it. Each target must succeed on a DC 19 Constitution saving throw yada take 21 ({@dice 6d6}) nekrotik damage, and the demilich regains hit points equal to the total damage dealt to all targets.

action.name: Trap Soul
entries: The demilich targets tek varlık that it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must make a DC 19 Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the target's soul is magically trapped inside one of the demilich's gems. While the soul is trapped, the target's body and all the equipment it is carrying cease to exist. On a successful save, the target takes 24 ({@dice 7d6}) nekrotik damage, and if this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, its soul is trapped as if it failed the saving throw. A soul trapped in a gem for 24 hours is devoured and ceases to exist.

If the demilich drops to 0 hit points, it is destroyed and turns to powder, leaving behind its gems. Crushing a gem releases any soul trapped within, at which point the target's body re-forms in an unoccupied space nearest to the gem and in the same state as when it was trapped.

legendary.name: Flight
entries: The demilich flies up to half its flying speed.

legendary.name: Cloud of Dust
entries: The demilich magically swirls its dusty remains. Each creature within 10 feet of the demilich, including around a corner, must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw yada be blinded until the end of the demilich's next turn. A creature that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to this effect until the end of the demilich's next turn.

legendary.name: Energy Drain (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Each creature with in 30 feet of the demilich must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature's hit point maximum is magically reduced by 10 ({@dice 3d6}). If a creature's hit point maximum is reduced to 0 by this effect, the creature dies. A creature's hit point maximum can be restored with the greater restoration spell yada similar magic.

legendary.name: Vile Curse (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The demilich targets tek varlık it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw yada be magically cursed. Until the curse ends, the target has disadvantage on attack rolls and saving throws. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the curse on a success.

trait.name: Angelic Weapons
entries: The deva's weapon attacks are magical. When the deva hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra {@dice 4d8} radyant damage (included in the attack).

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The deva has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The deva makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Mace
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +8} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 7 ({@dice 1d6+4}) ezme hasarı artı 18 ({@dice 4d8}) radyant damage.

action.name: Healing Touch (3/Gün)
entries: The deva touches another creature. The target magically regains 20 ({@dice 4d8+2}) hit points and is freed from any curse, disease, zehir, blindness, yada deafness.

action.name: Change Shape
entries: The deva magically polymorphs into a insansı yada hayvan that has a challenge rating equal to yada less than its own, yada back into its true form. It reverts to its true form if it dies. Any equipment it is wearing yada carrying is absorbed yada borne by the new form (the deva's choice).

In a new form, the deva retains its game statistics and ability to speak, but its AC, movement modes, Strength, Dexterity, and special senses are replaced by those of the new form, and it gains any statistics and capabilities (except class features, legendary actions, and lair actions) that the new form has but that it lacks.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The deva's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell kurtulma zarı DC'si 17). The deva can innately cast the following spells, requiring only verbal components:

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The wolf has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing yada smell.

trait.name: Sürü Taktiği
entries: The wolf has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the wolf's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +5} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 10 ({@dice 2d6+3}) delme hasarı. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw yada be knocked prone.

trait.name: Avoidance
entries: If the displacer hayvan is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

trait.name: Displacement
entries: The displacer hayvan projects a magical illusion that makes it appear to be standing near its actual location, causing attack rolls against it to have disadvantage. If it is hit by an attack, this trait is disrupted until the end of its next turn. This trait is also disrupted while the displacer hayvan is incapacitated yada has a speed of 0.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The displacer hayvan makes two attacks with its tentacles.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +6} vurmak için, erişim 10 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 7 ({@dice 1d6+4}) ezme hasarı artı 3 ({@dice 1d6}) delme hasarı.

trait.name: Elemental Demise
entries: If the djinni dies, its body disintegrates into a warm breeze, leaving behind only equipment the djinni was wearing yada carrying.

trait.name: Variant: Genie Powers
entries: Genies have a variety of magical capabilities, including spells. A few have even greater powers that allow them to alter their appearance yada the doğa of reality.

Depending on the genie's doğa, the genie might try to pervert the intent of the wish by exploiting the wish's poor wording. The perversion of the wording is genellikle crafted to be to the genie's benefit.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The djinni makes three scimitar attacks.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +9} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 12 ({@dice 2d6+5}) kesme hasarı artı 3 ({@dice 1d6}) yıldırım yada ses damage (djinni's choice).

action.name: Create Whirlwind
entries: A 5-foot-radius, 30-foot-tall cylinder of swirling air magically forms on a point the djinni can see within 120 feet of it. The whirlwind lasts as long as the djinni maintains concentration (as if concentrating on a spell). Any creature but the djinni that enters the whirlwind must succeed on a DC 18 Strength saving throw yada be restrained by it. The djinni can move the whirlwind up to 60 feet as an action, and creatures restrained by the whirlwind move with it. The whirlwind ends if the djinni loses sight of it.

A creature can use its action to free a creature restrained by the whirlwind, including itself, by succeeding on a DC 18 Strength check. If the check succeeds, the creature is no longer restrained and moves to the nearest space outside the whirlwind.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The djinni's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell kurtulma zarı DC'si 17, {@hit 9} büyü saldırıları ile vurmak için). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

3e: {@spell create food and water} (can create wine instead of water)

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The doppelganger can use its action to polymorph into a Small yada Medium insansı it has seen, yada back into its true form. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing yada carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Ambusher
entries: In the first round of a combat, the doppelganger has advantage on attack rolls against any creature it surprised

trait.name: Surprise Attack
entries: If the doppelganger surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 10 ({@dice 3d6}) damage from the attack.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The doppelganger makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +6} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 7 ({@dice 1d6+4}) ezme hasarı.

action.name: Read Thoughts
entries: The doppelganger magically reads the surface thoughts of tek varlık within 60 ft. of it. The effect can penetrate barriers, but 3 ft. of wood yada dirt, 2 ft. of stone, 2 inches of metal, yada a thin sheet of lead blocks it. While the target is in menzil, the doppelganger can continue reading its thoughts, as long as the doppelganger's concentration isn't broken (as if concentrating on a spell). While reading the target's mind, the doppelganger has advantage on Wisdom (Insight) and Charisma (Deception, Intimidation, and Persuasion) checks against the target.

action.name: Hooves
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +6} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 9 ({@dice 2d4+4}) ezme hasarı.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The dragon turtle can breathe air and water.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The dragon turtle makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws. It can make one tail attack in place of its two claw attacks.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +13} vurmak için, erişim 15 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 26 ({@dice 3d12+7}) delme hasarı.

action.name: Pençe
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +13} vurmak için, erişim 10 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 16 ({@dice 2d8+7}) kesme hasarı.

action.name: Tail
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +13} vurmak için, erişim 15 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 26 ({@dice 3d12+7}) ezme hasarı. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 20 Strength saving throw yada be pushed up to 10 feet away from the dragon turtle and knocked prone.

action.name: Steam Breath (Recharge 5—6)
entries: The dragon turtle exhales scalding steam in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 18 Constitution saving throw, taking 52 ({@dice 15d6}) ateş damage on a failed save, yada half as much damage on a successful one. Being underwater doesn't grant resistance against this damage.

monster.name: Dretch
monster.languages: Abyssal, Telepati 60 ft. (works only with creatures that understand Abyssal)

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The dretch makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +2} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 3 ({@dice 1d6}) delme hasarı.

action.name: Pençeler
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +2} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 5 ({@dice 2d4}) kesme hasarı.

action.name: Fetid Cloud (1/Gün)
entries: A 10-foot radius of disgusting green gas extends out from the dretch. The gas spreads around corners, and its area is lightly obscured. It lasts for 1 minute yada until a strong wind disperses it. Any creature that starts its turn in that area must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw yada be poisoned until the start of its next turn. While poisoned in this way, the target can take either an action yada a bonus action on its turn, not both, and can't take reactions.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The drider has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put the drider to sleep.

trait.name: Örümcek Climb
entries: The drider can tırmanma difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the drider has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Web Walker
entries: The drider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The drider makes three attacks, either with its longsword yada its longbow. It can replace one of those attacks with a bite attack.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +6} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek varlık. Vurunca: 2 ({@dice 1d4}) delme hasarı artı 9 ({@dice 2d8}) zehir damage.

action.name: Longsword
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +6} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 7 ({@dice 1d8+3}) kesme hasarı, yada 8 ({@dice 1d10+3}) kesme hasarı eğer iki el ile kullanıldıysa.

action.name: Longbow
entries: Menzilli Silah Saldırısı: {@hit +6} vurmak için, menzil 150/600 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 7 ({@dice 1d8+3}) delme hasarı artı 4 ({@dice 1d8}) zehir damage.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +4} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 5 ({@dice 1d6+2}) delme hasarı.

action.name: Hand Crossbow
entries: Menzilli Silah Saldırısı: {@hit +4} vurmak için, menzil 30/120 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 5 ({@dice 1d6+2}) delme hasarı, and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw yada be poisoned for 1 hour. If the saving throw fails by 5 yada more, the target is also unconscious while poisoned in this way. The target wakes up if it takes damage yada if another creature takes an action to shake it awake.
Drow often wear magic armor and carry magic weapons that lose their enhancement bonuses permanently if they are exposed to sunlight for 1 hour yada longer.

A {@creature drow} wearing a {@item chain shirt +1|dmg|+1 chain shirt} and carrying a {@item shortsword +1|dmg|+1 shortsword} has AC 16 and a +1 bonus on attack and damage rolls with shortsword attacks.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The drow adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the drow must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.
Drow often wear magic armor and carry magic weapons that lose their enhancement bonuses permanently if they are exposed to sunlight for 1 hour yada longer.

A {@creature drow elite warrior} wearing {@item çivili deri armor +2|dmg|+2 çivili deri} and carrying a {@item shortsword +2|dmg|+2 shortsword} has AC 20 and a +2 bonus on attack and damage rolls with shortsword attacks.

action.name: Summon Demon (1/Gün)
entries: The drow magically summons a {@creature quasit}, yada attempts to summon a {@creature shadow demon} with a {@chance 50|50 percent|50% summoning chance} chance of success. The summoned demon appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other demons. It remains for 10 minutes, until it yada its summoner dies, yada until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +5} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 5 ({@dice 1d6+2}) delme hasarı artı 17 ({@dice 5d6}) zehir damage.

action.name: Summon Demon (1/Gün)
entries: The drow attempts to magically summon a {@creature yochlol} with a {@chance 30|30 percent|30% summoning chance} chance of success. If the attempt fails, the drow takes 5 ({@dice 1d10}) psişik damage. Otherwise, the summoned demon appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other demons. It remains for 10 minutes, until it yada its summoner dies, yada until its summoner dismisses it as an action.
Drow often wear magic armor and carry magic weapons that lose their enhancement bonuses permanently if they are exposed to sunlight for 1 hour yada longer.
A {@creature drow priestess of lolth} wearing {@item pullu zırh +3|dmg|+3 pullu zırh} has AC 19.

action.name: Quarterstaff
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +2} vurmak için ({@hit +4} vurmak için with shillelagh), erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 3 ({@dice 1d6}) ezme hasarı, yada 6 ({@dice 1d8+2}) ezme hasarı with shillelagh yada if wielded with two hands.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The druid is a 4th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell kurtulma zarı DC'si 12, {@hit 4} büyü saldırıları ile vurmak için). It has the following druid spells prepared:

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The dryad has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Speak with hayvans and Plants
entries: The dryad can communicate with hayvans and plants as if they shared a language.

trait.name: Tree Stride
entries: Once on her turn, the dryad can use 10 ft. of her movement to step magically into one living tree within her erişim and emerge from a second living tree within 60 ft. of the first tree, appearing in an unoccupied space within 5 ft. of the second tree. Both trees must be large yada bigger.

action.name: Club
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +2} vurmak için ({@hit +6} vurmak için with shillelagh), erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 2 ({@dice 1d4}) ezme hasarı, yada 8 ({@dice 1d8+4}) ezme hasarı with shillelagh.

action.name: Fey Charm
entries: The dryad targets one insansı yada hayvan that she can see within 30 feet of her. If the target can see the dryad, it must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw yada be magically charmed. The charmed creature regards the dryad as a trusted friend to be heeded and protected. Although the target isn't under the dryad's control, it takes the dryad's requests yada actions in the most favorable way it can.

Each time the dryad yada its allies do anything harmful to the target, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. Otherwise, the effect lasts 24 hours yada until the dryad dies, is on a different plane of existence from the target, yada ends the effect as a bonus action. If a target's saving throw is successful, the target is immune to the dryad's Fey Charm for the next 24 hours.
The dryad can have no more than one insansı and up to three hayvans charmed at a time.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The dryad's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell kurtulma zarı DC'si 14). The dryad can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Duergar Resilience
entries: The duergar has advantage on saving throws against zehir, spells, and illusions, as well as to resist being charmed yada paralyzed.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the duergar has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Enlarge (Recharges after a Short yada Long Rest)
entries: For 1 minute, the duergar magically increases in size, along with anything it is wearing yada carrying. While enlarged, the duergar is Large, doubles its damage dice on Strength-based weapon attacks (included in the attacks), and makes Strength checks and Strength saving throws with advantage. If the duergar lacks the room to become Large, it attains the maximum size possible in the space available.

action.name: War Pick
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +4} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 6 ({@dice 1d8+2}) delme hasarı, yada 11 ({@dice 2d8+2}) delme hasarı while enlarged.

action.name: Cirit
entries: Yakın Dövüş yada Menzilli Silah Saldırısı: {@hit +4} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft. yada menzil 30/120 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 5 ({@dice 1d6+2}) delme hasarı, yada 9 ({@dice 2d6+2}) delme hasarı while enlarged.

action.name: Invisibility (Recharges after a Short yada Long Rest)
entries: The duergar magically turns invisible until it attacks, casts a spell, yada uses its Enlarge, yada until its concentration is broken, up to 1 hour (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the duergar wears yada carries is invisible with it.

trait.name: Axiomatic Mind
entries: The duodrone can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its doğa yada its instructions.

trait.name: Disintegration
entries: If the duodrone dies, its body disintegrates into dust, leaving behind its weapons and anything else it was carrying.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The duodrone makes two fist attacks yada two javelin attacks.

action.name: Fist
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +2} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 2 ({@dice 1d4}) ezme hasarı.

action.name: Cirit
entries: Yakın Dövüş yada Menzilli Silah Saldırısı: {@hit +3} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft. yada menzil 30/120 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 4 ({@dice 1d6+1}) delme hasarı.

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: When the mephit dies, it explodes in a burst of dust. Each creature within 5 ft. of it must then succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw yada be blinded for 1 minute. A blinded creature can repeat the saving throw on each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Pençeler
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +4} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek varlık. Vurunca: 4 ({@dice 1d4+2}) kesme hasarı.

action.name: Blinding Breath (Recharge 6)
entries: The mephit exhales a 15-foot cone of blinding dust. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw yada be blinded for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Variant: Summon Mephits (1/Gün)
entries: The mephit has a {@chance 25|25 percent|25% summoning chance} chance of summoning {@dice 1d4} mephits of its kind. A summoned mephit appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other mephits. It remains for 1 minute, until it yada its summoner dies, yada until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (1/Gün)
headerEntries: The mephit can innately cast {@spell sleep}, requiring no material components. Its innate spellcasting ability is Charisma.

trait.name: Keskin Görüş
entries: Kartal görüşe bağlı Akıl (Algılama) zarlarında avantajlıdır.

action.name: Pençeler
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +4} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 4 ({@dice 1d4+2}) kesme hasarı.

trait.name: Earth Glide
entries: The elemental can kazma through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone. While doing so, the elemental doesn't disturb the material it moves through.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The elemental deals double damage to objects and structures.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The elemental makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +8} vurmak için, erişim 10 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 14 ({@dice 2d8+5}) ezme hasarı.

trait.name: Elemental Demise
entries: If the efreeti dies, its body disintegrates in a flash of ateş and puff of smoke, leaving behind only equipment the djinni was wearing yada carrying.

trait.name: Variant: Genie Powers
entries: Genies have a variety of magical capabilities, including spells. A few have even greater powers that allow them to alter their appearance yada the doğa of reality.
Disguises.

Some genies can veil themselves in illusion to pass as other similarly shaped creatures. Such genies can innately cast the disguise self spell at will, often with a longer duration than is normal for that spell. Mightier genies can cast the true polymorph spell one to three times per Gün, possibly with a longer duration than normal. Such genies can change only their own shape, but a rare few can use the spell on other creatures and objects as well.
Wishes.

The genie power to grant wishes is legendary among mortals. Only the most potent genies, such as those among the nobility, can do so. A particular genie that has this power can grant one to three wishes to a creature that isn't a genie. Once a genie has granted its limit of wishes, it can't grant wishes again for some amount of time (genellikle 1 year). and cosmic law dictates that the same genie can expend its limit of wishes on a specific creature only once in that creature's existence.

To be granted a wish, a creature within 60 feet of the genie states a desired effect to it. The genie can then cast the wish spell on the creature's behalf to bring about the effect. Depending on the genie's doğa, the genie might try to pervert the intent of the wish by exploiting the wish's poor wording. The perversion of the wording is genellikle crafted to be to the genie's benefit.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The efreeti makes two scimitar attacks yada uses its Hurl Flame twice.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +10} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 13 ({@dice 2d6+6}) kesme hasarı artı 7 ({@dice 2d6}) ateş damage.

action.name: Hurl Flame
entries: Ranged Spell Attack: {@hit +7} vurmak için, menzil 120 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 17 ({@dice 5d6}) ateş damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The efreeti's innate spell casting ability is Charisma (spell kurtulma zarı DC'si 15, {@hit 7} büyü saldırıları ile vurmak için). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Trampling Charge
entries: If the elephant moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw yada be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the elephant can make one stomp attack against it as a bonus action.

action.name: Gore
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +8} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 19 ({@dice 3d8+6}) delme hasarı.

action.name: Stomp
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +8} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., one prone creature. Vurunca: 22 ({@dice 3d10+6}) ezme hasarı.

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the elk moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw yada be knocked prone.

action.name: Ram
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +5} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 6 ({@dice 1d6+3}) ezme hasarı.

action.name: Hooves
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +5} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., one prone creature. Vurunca: 8 ({@dice 2d4+3}) ezme hasarı.

immune.note: from nonmagical attacks

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Gün)
entries: If the empyrean fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The empyrean has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The empyrean's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Maul
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +17} vurmak için, erişim 10 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 31 ({@dice 6d6+10}) ezme hasarı. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw yada be stunned until the end of the empyrean's next turn.

action.name: Bolt
entries: Ranged Spell Attack: {@hit +15} vurmak için, menzil 600 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 24 ({@dice 7d6}) damage of one of the following types (empyrean's choice): asit, soğuk, ateş, force, yıldırım, radyant, yada ses.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The empyrean makes one attack.

legendary.name: Bolster
entries: The empyrean bolsters all nonhostile creatures within 120 feet of it until the end of its next turn. Bolstered creatures can't be charmed yada frightened, and they gain advantage on ability checks and saving throws until the end of the empyrean's next turn.

legendary.name: Trembling Strike (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The empyrean strikes the ground with its maul, triggering an earth tremor. All other creatures on the ground within 60 feet of the empyrean must succeed on a DC 25 Strength saving throw yada be knocked prone.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The empyrean's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell kurtulma zarı DC'si 23, {@hit 15} büyü saldırıları ile vurmak için). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

trait.name: Hellish Weapons
entries: The erinyes's weapon attacks are magical and deal an extra 13 ({@dice 3d8}) zehir damage on a hit (included in the attacks).

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The erinyes has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The erinyes makes three attacks

action.name: Longsword
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +8} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 8 ({@dice 1d8+4}) kesme hasarı, yada 9 ({@dice 1d10+4}) kesme hasarı eğer iki el ile kullanıldıysa, artı 13 ({@dice 3d8}) zehir damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: Menzilli Silah Saldırısı: {@hit +7} vurmak için, menzil 150/600 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 7 ({@dice 1d8+3}) delme hasarı artı 13 ({@dice 3d8}) zehir damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw yada be poisoned. The zehir lasts until it is removed by the lesser restoration spell yada similar magic.

action.name: Variant: Rope of Entanglement
entries: Some erinyes carry a rope of entanglement (detailed in the Dungeon Master's Guide). When such an erinyes uses its Çoklu Saldırı, the erinyes can use the rope in place of two of the attacks.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The erinyes adds 4 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the erinyes must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

trait.name: Örümcek Climb
entries: The ettercap can tırmanma difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Web Sense
entries: While in contact with a web, the ettercap knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

trait.name: Web Walker
entries: The ettercap ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The ettercap makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +4} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek varlık. Vurunca: 6 ({@dice 1d8+2}) delme hasarı artı 4 ({@dice 1d8}) zehir damage. The target must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw yada be poisoned for 1 minute. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Pençeler
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +4} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 7 ({@dice 2d4+2}) kesme hasarı.

action.name: Web (Recharge 5—6)
entries: Menzilli Silah Saldırısı: {@hit +4} vurmak için, menzil 30/60 ft., one Large yada smaller creature. Vurunca: The creature is restrained by webbing. As an action, the restrained creature can make a DC 11 Strength check, escaping from the webbing on a success. The effect ends if the webbing is destroyed. The webbing has AC 10, 5 hit points, is vulnerable to ateş damage and immune to ezme hasarı.

action.name: Variant: Web Garrote
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +4} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., one Medium yada Small creature against which the ettercap has advantage on the attack roll. Vurunca: 4 ({@dice 1d4+2}) ezme hasarı, and the target is grappled (escape DC 12). Until this grapple ends, the target can't breathe, and the ettercap has advantage on attack rolls against it.

trait.name: Two Heads
entries: The ettin has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks and on saving throws against being blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, and knocked unconscious.

trait.name: Wakeful
entries: When one of the ettin's heads is asleep, its other head is awake.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The ettin makes two attacks: one with its battleaxe and one with its morningstar.

action.name: Savaş Baltası
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +7} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 14 ({@dice 2d8+5}) kesme hasarı.

action.name: Morningstar
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +7} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 14 ({@dice 2d8+5}) delme hasarı.

trait.name: The Colors of Age
entries: A faerie dragon's scales change hue as it ages, moving through all the colors of the rainbow. All faerie dragons have innate spellcasting ability, gaining new spells as they mature.
Red—5 years yada less
Orange—6-10 years
Yellow—11-20 years
Green—21-30 years
Blue—31-40 years
Indigo—41-50 years
Violet—51 years yada more
A green yada older faerie dragon's CR increases to 2.

trait.name: Superior Invisibility
entries: As a bonus action, the dragon can magically turn invisible until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the dragon wears yada carries is invisible with it.

trait.name: Limited Telepathy
entries: Using Telepati, the dragon can magically communicate with any other faerie dragon within 60 feet of it.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The faerie dragon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +7} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek varlık. Vurunca: 1 delme hasarı.

action.name: Euphoria Breath (Recharge 5—6)
entries: The dragon exhales a puff of euphoria gas at tek varlık within 5 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 11 Wisdom saving throw, yada for 1 minute, the target can't take reactions and must roll a d6 at the start of each of its turns to determine its behavior during the turn:
1-4. The target takes no action yada bonus action and uses all of its movement to move in a random direction.
5-6. The target doesn't move, and the only thing it can do on its turn is make a DC 11 Wisdom saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The dragon's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell kurtulma zarı DC'si 13). It can innately cast a number of spells, requiring no material components:

Yellow—11-20 years

Blue—31-40 years
