spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The dragon's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell kurtulma zarı DC'si 13). It can innately cast a number of spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Fire Form
entries: The elemental can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing. A creature that touches the elemental yada hits it with a melee attack while within 5 ft. of it takes 5 ({@dice 1d10}) ateş damage. In addition, the elemental can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. The first time it enters a creature's space on a turn, that creature takes 5 ({@dice 1d10}) ateş damage and catches ateş; until someone takes an action to douse the ateş, the creature takes 5 ({@dice 1d10}) ateş damage at the start of each of its turns.

trait.name: Illumination
entries: The elemental sheds bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light in an additional 30 ft..

trait.name: Water Susceptibility
entries: For every 5 ft. the elemental moves in water, yada for every gallon of water splashed on it, it takes 1 soğuk damage.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The elemental makes two touch attacks.

action.name: Touch
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +6} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 10 ({@dice 2d6+3}) ateş damage. If the target is a creature yada a flammable object, it ignites. Until a creature takes an action to douse the ateş, the target takes 5 ({@dice 1d10}) ateş damage at the start of each of its turns.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The giant makes two greatsword attacks.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +11} vurmak için, erişim 10 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 28 ({@dice 6d6+7}) kesme hasarı.

action.name: Rock
entries: Menzilli Silah Saldırısı: {@hit +11} vurmak için, menzil 60/240 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 29 ({@dice 4d10+7}) ezme hasarı.

variant.name: New Dev Options
entries: Some adult ateş giants are trained to lay siege to strong­holds and break through enemy lines. These abilities are represented by the following traits.

entries.name: Siege Monster
entries: The giant deals double damage to objects and structures.

entries.name: Tackle
entries: When the giant enters any enemy's space for the first time on a turn, the enemy must succeed on a DC 19 Strength saving throw yada be knocked prone.

trait.name: Heated Body
entries: A creature that touches the snake yada hits it with a melee attack while within 5 ft. of it takes 3 ({@dice 1d6}) ateş damage.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The snake makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +3} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 3 ({@dice 1d4+1}) delme hasarı artı 3 ({@dice 1d6}) ateş damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +3} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 3 ({@dice 1d4+1}) ezme hasarı artı 3 ({@dice 1d6}) ateş damage.

trait.name: Illumination
entries: The flameskull sheds either dim light in a 15- foot radius, yada bright light in a 15-foot radius and dim light for an additional 15 ft.. It can switch between the options as an action.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The flameskull has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: If the flameskull is destroyed, it regains all its hit points in 1 hour unless holy water is sprinkled on its remains yada a dispel magic yada remove curse spell is cast on them.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The flameskull uses Fire Ray twice.

action.name: Fire Ray
entries: Ranged Spell Attack: {@hit +5} vurmak için, menzil 30 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 10 ({@dice 3d6}) ateş damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The flameskull is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell kurtulma zarı DC'si 13, {@hit 5} büyü saldırıları ile vurmak için). It requires no somatic yada material components to cast its spells. The flameskull has the following wizard spells prepared:

monster.name: Flesh Golem

immune.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

monster.languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Berserk
entries: Whenever the golem starts its turn with 40 hit points yada fewer, roll a d6. On a 6, the golem goes berserk. On each of its turns while berserk, the golem attacks the nearest creature it can see. If no creature is near enough to move to and attack, the golem attacks an object, with preference for an object smaller than itself. Once the golem goes berserk, it continues to do so until it is destroyed yada regains all its hit points.

The golem's creator, if within 60 feet of the berserk golem, can try to calm it by speaking firmly and persuasively. The golem must be able to hear its creator, who must take an action to make a DC 15 Charisma (Persuasion) check. If the check succeeds, the golem ceases being berserk. If it takes damage while still at 40 hit points yada fewer, the golem might go berserk again.

trait.name: Aversion of Fire
entries: If the golem takes ateş damage, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The golem is immune to any spell yada effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Lightning Absorption
entries: Whenever the golem is subjected to yıldırım damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the yıldırım damage dealt.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The golem's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The golem makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +7} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 13 ({@dice 2d8+4}) ezme hasarı.

monster.name: Flumph
monster.languages: yeraltı ortak dili anlıyor ama konuşamıyor, Telepati 60 ft.

trait.name: Gelişmiş Telepati
entries: Flumph, 60 feet içinde kullanılan herhangi bir telepatik iletişimin içeriğini anlayabilir ve herhangi formdaki telepatik bir canlı tarafından sürprize uğratılamaz.

trait.name: Eğilme Eksikliği
entries: Eğer Flumph yere düşerse bir zar at. Eğer sonuç tek ise flumph baş aşağı iner ve etkisiz halde kalır. Her tur sonunda Flumph DC 10 Çeviklik kurtulma zarı atar ve başarılı olursa kendini düzeltip etkisizlik durumunu sona erdirir.

trait.name: Telepatik Örtü
entries: Flumph herhangi bir duyguyu hissedecek yada düşüncelerini okuyabilecek bir etkiye ve tüm divination büyülerine karşı bağışıklık sahibidir.

action.name: Dokunaç
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +4} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek varlık. Vurunca: 4 ({@dice 1d4+2}) delme hasarı artı 2 ({@dice 1d4}) asit hasarı. Her tur sonunda hedef üzerindeki sürekli asit etkisini bitirmek için DC 10 Dayanıklılık kurtulma zarı atar, başarısız olduğunda 2 ({@dice 1d4}) asit hasarı alır, başarılı olursa etki sona erer. Hedef üzerinde kullanılacak bir {@spell lesser restoration} büyüsü de asit etkisini sonlandırır.

action.name: Kötü Koku Spreyi (1/Gün)
entries: Flumph merkezli 15 feet'lik bir konideki her varlık DC 10 Çeviklik kurtulma zarını geçer yada kötü kokan bir sıvıya bulanır. Kötü koku ile kaplanmış bir yaratık {@dice 1d4} saat boyunca etrafa tiksinç bir koku verir. Kaplanan varlık koku sürdükçe zehirlidir ve bu varlığın 5 feet çevresindekilerde zehirlenir. Bir varlık su, alkol veya sirke kullanarak üstündeki kötü kokuyu giderebilir ama bunun için kısa yada uzun dinlenme bitirmesi gerekir.

trait.name: Alçaktan Uçuş
entries: Yılan düşmanın erişiminden çıkarken fırsat saldırısı tetiklemez.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +6} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 1 delme hasarı artı 7 ({@dice 3d4}) zehir hasarı.

monster.name: Flying Sword
monster.senses: kör görüş 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius)

trait.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
entries: The sword is incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the sword must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell kurtulma zarı DC'si yada fall unconscious for 1 minute.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the sword remains motionless and isn't flying, it is indistinguishable from a normal sword.

action.name: Longsword
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +3} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 5 ({@dice 1d8+1}) kesme hasarı.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The fomorian attacks twice with its greatclub yada makes one greatclub attack and uses Evil Eye once.

action.name: Greatclub
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +9} vurmak için, erişim 15 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 19 ({@dice 3d8+6}) ezme hasarı.

action.name: Evil Eye
entries: The fomorian magically forces a creature it can see within 60 feet of it to make a DC 14 Charisma saving throw. The creature takes 27 ({@dice 6d8}) psişik damage on a failed save, yada half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Curse of the Evil Eye (Recharges after a Short yada Long Rest)
entries: With a stare, the fomorian uses Evil Eye, but on a failed save, the creature is also cursed with magical deformities. While deformed, the creature has its speed halved and has disadvantage on ability checks, saving throws, and attacks based on Strength yada Dexterity.
The transformed creature can repeat the saving throw whenever it finishes a long rest, ending the effect on a success.

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: Kurbağa hem karada hem suda nefes alabilir.

trait.name: Yerinden Sıçrama
entries: Kurbağa koşmaya gerek duymadan 10 feet ileri 5 feet yukarı zıplayabilir.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı

action.name: Greataxe
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +9} vurmak için, erişim 10 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 25 ({@dice 3d12+6}) kesme hasarı.

action.name: Rock
entries: Menzilli Silah Saldırısı: {@hit +9} vurmak için, menzil 60/240 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 28 ({@dice 4d10+6}) ezme hasarı.

variant.name: New Dev Options
entries: Some adult frost giants are skilled hunters who con­struct and hurl nets weighted down with fragments of metal yada bone. This ability is represented by the follow­ing action option.

entries.name: Weighted Net
entries: Menzilli Silah Saldırısı: +5 vurmak için, ranged 20/60 ft., one Small, Medium, yada Large creature. Vurunca: The target is restrained until it escapes the net. Any creature can use its action to make a DC 17 Strength check to free itself yada another creature in the net, ending the effect on a success. Dealing 15 kesme hasarı to the net (AC 12) destroys the net and frees the target.

walk.condition: (30 ft. when rolling 60 ft. rolling downhill)

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the galeb duhr remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal boulder.

trait.name: Rolling Charge
entries: If the galeb duhr rolls at least 20 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a slam attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) ezme hasarı. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw yada be knocked prone.

action.name: Slam
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +8} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 12 ({@dice 2d6+5}) ezme hasarı.

action.name: Animate Boulders (1/Gün)
entries: The galeb duhr magically animates up to two boulders it can see within 60 ft. of it. A boulder has statistics like those of a galeb duhr, except it has Intelligence 1 and Charisma 1, it can't be charmed yada frightened, and it lacks this action option. A boulder remains animated as long as the galeb duhr maintains concentration, up to 1 minute (as if concentrating on a spell).

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the gargoyle remains motion less, it is indistinguishable from an inanimate statue.

action.name: Pençeler
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +4} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 5 ({@dice 1d6+2}) kesme hasarı.

monster.name: Gas Spore
monster.senses: kör görüş 30 ft. (blind beyond this radius)

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: The gas spore explodes when it drops to 0 hit points. Each creature within 20 feet of it must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw yada take 10 ({@dice 3d6}) zehir damage and become infected with a disease on a failed save. Creatures immune to the poisoned condition are immune to this disease.

Spores invade an infected creature's system, killing the creature in a number of hours equal to {@dice 1d12}+the creature's Constitution score, unless the disease is removed. In half that time, the creature becomes poisoned for the rest of the duration. After the creature dies, it sprouts {@dice 2d4} Tiny gas spores that grow to full size in 7 Güns.

trait.name: Eerie Resemblance
entries: The gas spore resembles a beholder. A creature that can see the gas spore can discern its true doğa with a successful DC 15 Intelligence (Nature) check.

action.name: Touch
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +0} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek varlık. Vurunca: 1 zehir damage, and the creature must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw yada become infected with the disease described in the Death Burst trait.

monster.name: Gelatinous Cube
monster.senses: kör görüş 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius)

trait.name: Ooze Cube
entries: The cube takes up its entire space. Other creatures can enter the space, but a creature that does so is subjected to the cube's Engulf and has disadvantage on the saving throw.
Creatures inside the cube can be seen but have total cover.

A creature within 5 feet of the cube can take an action to pull a creature yada object out of the cube. Doing so requires a successful DC 12 Strength check, and the creature making the attempt takes 10 ({@dice 3d6}) asit damage.
The cube can hold only one Large creature yada up to four Medium yada smaller creatures inside it at a time.

trait.name: Transparent
entries: Even when the cube is in plain sight, it takes a successful DC 15 Wisdom (Perception) check to spot a cube that has neither moved nor attacked. A creature that tries to enter the cube's space while unaware of the cube is surprised by the cube.

action.name: Pseudopod
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +4} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek varlık. Vurunca: 10 ({@dice 3d6}) asit damage.

action.name: Engulf
entries: The cube moves up to its speed. While doing so, it can enter Large yada smaller creatures' spaces. Whenever the cube enters a creature's space, the creature must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw.
On a successful save, the creature can choose to be pushed 5 feet back yada to the side of the cube. A creature that chooses not to be pushed suffers the consequences of a failed saving throw.

On a failed save, the cube enters the creature's space, and the creature takes 10 ({@dice 3d6}) asit damage and is engulfed. The engulfed creature can't breathe, is restrained, and takes 21 ({@dice 6d6}) asit damage at the start of each of the cube's turns. When the cube moves, the engulfed creature moves with it.
An engulfed creature can try to escape by taking an action to make a DC 12 Strength check. On a success, the creature escapes and enters a space of its choice within 5 feet of the cube.

trait.name: Stench
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 5 ft. of the ghast must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw yada be poisoned until the start of its next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the ghast's Stench for 24 hours.

trait.name: Turn Defiance
entries: The ghast and any ghouls within 30 ft. of it have advantage on saving throws against effects that turn undead.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +3} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek varlık. Vurunca: 12 ({@dice 2d8+3}) delme hasarı.

action.name: Pençeler
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +5} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 10 ({@dice 2d6+3}) kesme hasarı. If the target is a creature other than an undead, it must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw yada be paralyzed for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

monster.name: Ghost
monster.languages: any languages it knew in life

trait.name: Ethereal Sight
entries: The ghost can see 60 ft. into the Ethereal Plane when it is on the Material Plane, and vice versa.

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The ghost can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 ({@dice 1d10}) güç hasarı if it ends its turn inside an object.

action.name: Withering Touch
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +5} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 17 ({@dice 4d6+3}) nekrotik damage.

action.name: Etherealness
entries: The ghost enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, yada vice versa. It is visible on the Material Plane while it is in the Border Ethereal, and vice versa, yet it can't affect yada be affected by anything on the other plane.

action.name: Horrifying Visage
entries: Each non-undead creature within 60 ft. of the ghost that can see it must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw yada be frightened for 1 minute. If the save fails by 5 yada more, the target also ages {@dice 1d4} × 10 years. A frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the frightened condition on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful yada the effect ends for it, the target is immune to this ghost's Horrifying Visage for the next 24 hours. The aging effect can be reversed with a greater restoration spell, but only within 24 hours of it occurring.

action.name: Possession (Recharge 6)
entries: One insansı that the ghost can see within 5 ft. of it must succeed on a DC 13 Charisma saving throw yada be possessed by the ghost; the ghost then disappears, and the target is incapacitated and loses control of its body. The ghost now controls the body but doesn't deprive the target of awareness. The ghost can't be targeted by any attack, spell, yada other effect, except ones that turn undead, and it retains its alignment, Intelligence, Wisdom, Charisma, and immunity to being charmed and frightened. It otherwise uses the possessed target's statistics, but doesn't gain access to the target's knowledge, class features, yada proficiencies.

The possession lasts until the body drops to 0 hit points, the ghost ends it as a bonus action, yada the ghost is turned yada forced out by an effect like the dispel evil and good spell. When the possession ends, the ghost reappears in an unoccupied space within 5 ft. of the body. The target is immune to this ghost's Possession for 24 hours after succeeding on the saving throw yada after the possession ends.

action.name: Isırma

action.name: Pençeler

If the target is a creature other than an elf yada undead, it must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw yada be paralyzed for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Rock
entries: Menzilli Silah Saldırısı: {@hit +9} vurmak için, menzil 50/100 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 30 ({@dice 7d6+6}) ezme hasarı.

entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +3} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 6 ({@dice 2d4+1}) kesme hasarı.

trait.name: Echolocation

trait.name: Charge

action.name: Tusk

action.name: Isırma
entries: Isırma. Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +4} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek varlık. Vurunca: 4 ({@dice 1d4+2}) delme hasarı, and the target must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw yada take 10 ({@dice 3d6}) zehir damage. If the zehir damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +6} vurmak için, erişim 10 ft., tek varlık. Vurunca: 11 ({@dice 2d6+4}) delme hasarı.

action.name: Constrict
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +6} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek varlık. Vurunca: 13 ({@dice 2d8+4}) ezme hasarı, and the target is grappled (escape DC 16). Until this grapple ends, the creature is restrained, and the snake can't constrict another target.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The Kurbağa can breathe air and water

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The Kurbağa's long jump is up to 20 ft. and its high jump is up to 10 ft., with yada without a running start.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +3} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 4 ({@dice 1d6+1}) delme hasarı, and the target is grappled (escape DC 11). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the Kurbağa can't bite another target.

action.name: Swallow
entries: The Kurbağa makes one bite attack against a Small yada smaller target it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. The swallowed target is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the Kurbağa, and it takes 5 ({@dice 2d4}) asit damage at the start of each of the Kurbağa's turns. The Kurbağa can have only tek hedef swallowed at a time. If the Kurbağa dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse using 5 ft. of movement, exiting prone.

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the Keçi moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 5 ({@dice 2d4}) ezme hasarı. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw yada be knocked prone.

trait.name: Sure-Footed
entries: The Keçi has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.

action.name: Ram

action.name: Tentacles
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +5} vurmak için, erişim 15 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 10 ({@dice 2d6+3}) ezme hasarı. If the target is a creature, it is grappled (escape DC 16). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the octopus can't use its tentacles on another target.

action.name: Ink Cloud (Recharges after a Short yada Long Rest)
entries: A 20-foot-radius cloud of ink extends all around the octopus if it is underwater. The area is heavily obscured for 1 minute, although a significant current can disperse the ink. After releasing the ink, the octopus can use the Dash action as a bonus action.

trait.name: Sürü Taktiği

The webbing can also be attacked and destroyed (AC 10; hp 5; vulnerability to ateş damage; immunity to ezme, zehir, and psişik damage).

action.name: Swallow
entries: The toad makes one bite attack against a Medium yada smaller target it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. The swallowed target is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the toad, and it takes 10 ({@dice 3d6}) asit damage at the start of each of the toad's turns. The toad can have only tek hedef swallowed at a time.
If the toad dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse using 5 feet of movement, exiting prone.

trait.name: Aberrant Ground
entries: The ground in a 10-foot radius around the mouther is doughlike difficult terrain. Each creature that starts its turn in that area must succeed on a DC 10 Strength saving throw yada have its speed reduced to 0 until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Gibbering
entries: The mouther babbles incoherently while it can see any creature and isn't incapacitated. Each creature that starts its turn within 20 feet of the mouther and can hear the gibbering must succeed on a DC 10 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, the creature can't take reactions until the start of its next turn and rolls a d8 to determine what it does during its turn. On a 1 to 4, the creature does nothing. On a 5 yada 6, the creature takes no action yada bonus action and uses all its movement to move in a randomly determined direction. On a 7 yada 8, the creature makes a melee attack against a randomly determined creature within its erişim yada does nothing if it can't make such an attack.

If the target is Medium yada smaller, it must succeed on a DC 10 Strength saving throw yada be knocked prone. If the target is killed by this damage, it is absorbed into the mouther.

action.name: Blinding Spittle (Recharge 5—6)
entries: The mouther spits a chemical glob at a point it can see within 15 feet of it. The glob explodes in a blinding flash of light on impact. Each creature within 5 feet of the flash must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw yada be blinded until the end of the mouther's next turn.

Vurunca: 4 ({@dice 1d6+1}) ezme hasarı artı 7 ({@dice 2d6}) asit damage, and if the target is wearing nonmagical metal armor, its armor is partly corroded and takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to the AC it offers. The armor is destroyed if the penalty reduces its AC to 10.

action.name: Psychic Crush (Recharge 5—6)
entries: The ooze targets tek varlık that it can sense within 60 feet of it. The target must make a DC 10 Intelligence saving throw, taking 10 ({@dice 3d6}) psişik damage on a failed save, yada half as much damage on a successful one.

monster.name: Gray Slaad
monster.senses: kör görüş 60 ft., gece görüşü 60 ft.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The slaad can use its action to polymorph into a Small yada Medium insansı, yada back into its true form. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing yada carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The slaad has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The slaad's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The slaad regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point.

trait.name: Variant: Control Gem
entries: Implanted in the slaad's brain is a magic control gem. The slaad must obey whoever possesses the gem and is immune to being charmed while so controlled.

Certain spells can be used to acquire the gem. If the slaad fails its saving throw against imprisonment, the spell can transfer the gem to the spellcaster's open hand, instead of imprisoning the slaad. A wish spell, if cast in the slaad's presence, can be worded to acquire the gem.
A greater restoration spell cast on the slaad destroys the gem without harming the slaad.

Someone who is proficient in Wisdom (Medicine) can remove the gem from an incapacitated slaad. Each try requires 1 minute of uninterrupted work and a successful DC 20 Wisdom (Medicine) check. Each failed attempt deals 22 ({@dice 4d10}) psişik damage to the slaad.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The slaad makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws yada greatsword.

action.name: Isırma (Slaad Form Only)
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +7} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 6 ({@dice 1d6+3}) delme hasarı.

action.name: Pençeler (Slaad Form Only)
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +7} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 8 ({@dice 1d10+3}) kesme hasarı.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +7} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 10 ({@dice 2d6+3}) kesme hasarı.

entries: The dragon exhales poisonous gas in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 21 ({@dice 6d6}) zehir damage on a failed save, yada half as much damage on a successful one.

headerEntries: The hag's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell kurtulma zarı DC'si 12). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spellcasting.name: Shared Spellcasting (Coven Only)
headerEntries: While all three members of a hag coven are within 30 feet of one another, they can each cast the following spells from the wizard's spell list but must share the spell slots among themselves:
footerEntries: For casting these spells, each hag is a 12th-level spellcaster that uses Intelligence as her spellcasting ability. The spell kurtulma zarı DC'si is 12+the hag's Intelligence modifier, and the spell attack bonus is 4+the hag's Intelligence modifier.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The hag can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Mimicry
entries: The hag can mimic animal sounds and insansı voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful DC 14 Wisdom (Insight) check.

trait.name: Hag Coven
entries: When hags must work together, they form covens, in spite of their selfish natures. A coven is made up of hags of any type, all of whom are equals within the group. However, each of the hags continues to desire more personal power.

A coven consists of three hags so that any arguments between two hags can be settled by the third. If more than three hags ever come together, as might happen if two covens come into conflict, the result is genellikle chaos.

trait.name: Hag Eye (Coven Only)
entries: A hag coven can craft a magic item called a hag eye, which is made from a real eye coated in varnish and often fitted to a pendant yada other wearable item. The hag eye is genellikle entrusted to a minion for safekeeping and transport. A hag in the coven can take an action to see what the hag eye sees if the hag eye is on the same plane of existence. A hag eye has AC 10, 1 hit point, and gece görüşü with a radius of 60 feet. If it is destroyed, each coven member takes {@dice 3d10} psişik damage and is blinded for 24 hours.

A hag coven can have only one hag eye at a time, and creating a new one requires all three members of the coven to perform a ritual. The ritual takes 1 hour, and the hags can't perform it while blinded. During the ritual, if the hags take any action other than performing the ritual, they must start over.

action.name: Pençeler
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +6} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 13 ({@dice 2d8+4}) kesme hasarı.

action.name: Illusory Appearance
entries: The hag covers herself and anything she is wearing yada carrying with a magical illusion that makes her look like another creature of her general size and insansı shape. The illusion ends if the hag takes a bonus action to end it yada if she dies.

The changes wrought by this effect fail to hold up to physical inspection. For example, the hag could appear to have smooth skin, but someone touching her would feel her rough flesh. Otherwise, a creature must take an action to visually inspect the illusion and succeed on a DC 20 Intelligence (Investigation) check to discern that the hag is disguised.

action.name: Invisible Passage
entries: The hag magically turns invisible until she attacks yada casts a spell, yada until her concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell). While invisible, she leaves no physical evidence of her passage, so she can be tracked only by magic. Any equipment she wears yada carries is invisible with her.

The target is also grappled (escape DC 15). If the target is Medium yada smaller, it is also restrained until this grapple ends. While grappling the target, the grell has advantage on attack rolls against it and can 't use this attack against other targets. When the grell moves, any Medium yada smaller target it is grappling moves with it.

action.name: Luring Song
entries: The harpy sings a magical melody. Every insansı and giant within 300 ft. of the harpy that can hear the song must succeed on a DC 11 Wisdom saving throw yada be charmed until the song ends. The harpy must take a bonus action on its subsequent turns to continue singing. It can stop singing at any time. The song ends if the harpy is incapacitated.

While charmed by the harpy, a target is incapacitated and ignores the songs of other harpies. If the charmed target is more than 5 ft. away from the harpy, the must move on its turn toward the harpy by the most direct route. It doesn't avoid opportunity attacks, but before moving into damaging terrain, such as lava yada a pit, and whenever it takes damage from a source other than the harpy, a target can repeat the saving throw. A creature can also repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the effect ends on it.
A target that successfully saves is immune to this harpy's song for the next 24 hours.

entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +3} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 5 ({@dice 1d8+1}) kesme hasarı, yada 6 ({@dice 1d10+1}) kesme hasarı eğer iki el ile kullanıldıysa.

action.name: Longbow
entries: Menzilli Silah Saldırısı: {@hit +3} vurmak için, menzil 150/600 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 5 ({@dice 1d8+1}) delme hasarı.

trait.name: Martial Advantage
entries: Once per turn, the hobgoblin can deal an extra 10 ({@dice 3d6}) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 ft. of an ally of the hobgoblin that isn't incapacitated.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The hobgoblin makes two greatsword attacks.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +4} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 9 ({@dice 2d6+2}) kesme hasarı.

action.name: Cirit
entries: Yakın Dövüş yada Menzilli Silah Saldırısı: {@hit +4} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft. yada menzil 30/120 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 5 ({@dice 1d6+2}) delme hasarı.

action.name: Leadership (Recharges after a Short yada Long Rest)
entries: For 1 minute, the hobgoblin can utter a special command yada warning whenever a nonhostile creature that it can see within 30 ft. of it makes an attack roll yada a saving throw. The creature can add a d4 to its roll provided it can hear and understand the hobgoblin. A creature can benefit from only one Leadership die at a time. This effect ends if the hobgoblin is incapacitated.

trait.name: Martial Advantage
entries: Once per turn, the hobgoblin can deal an extra 14 ({@dice 4d6}) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 ft. of an ally of the hobgoblin that isn't incapacitated.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The hobgoblin makes three melee attacks. Alternatively, it can make two ranged attacks with its javelins.

action.name: Longsword
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +9} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 7 ({@dice 1d8+3}) kesme hasarı, yada 8 ({@dice 1d10+3}) kesme hasarı eğer iki el ile kullanıldıysa.

action.name: Shield Bash
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +9} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek varlık. Vurunca: 5 ({@dice 1d4+3}) ezme hasarı. If the target is Large yada smaller, it must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw yada be knocked prone.

action.name: Cirit
entries: Yakın Dövüş yada Menzilli Silah Saldırısı: {@hit +9} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft. yada menzil 30/120 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 6 ({@dice 1d6+3}) delme hasarı.

action.name: Leadership (Recharges after a Short yada Long Rest)
entries: For 1 minute, the hobgoblin can utter a special command yada warning whenever a nonhostile creature that it can see within 30 feet of it makes an attack roll yada a saving throw. The creature can add a d4 to its roll provided it can hear and understand the hobgoblin. A creature can benefit from only one Leadership die at a time. This effect ends if the hobgoblin is incapacitated.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The hobgoblin adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the hobgoblin must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

trait.name: Zihinsel Bağ
entries: Homunculus yaratıcısı ile aynı boyutta ise algıladığı şeyi sihirli bir şekilde ustasına aktarabilir. Zihinsel olarak birbiri ile iletişimde bulunabilir.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın saldırı {@hit +4} ısabet, mesafe 5 ft., tek hedef. Isabet: 1 delme hasarı, Hedef DC 10 Dayanıklılık kurtulma zarı atar ve başarısız olursa 1 dakikalığına zehirlenir. Eğer kurtulma zarı 5 veya daha fazla farkla başarısız olursa hedef 5 ({@dice 1d10}) dakikalığına zehirlenir ve bu süre içinde bilinçsiz kalır.

monster.name: Hook Horror
monster.senses: kör görüş 60 ft., gece görüşü 10 ft.

trait.name: Echolocation
entries: The hook horror can't use its kör görüş while deafened.

trait.name: Keen Hearing
entries: The hook horror has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The hook horror makes two hook attacks.

action.name: Hook
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +6} vurmak için, erişim 10 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 11 ({@dice 2d6+4}) delme hasarı.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's gece görüşü.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The devil makes three melee attacks: two with its fork and one with its tail. It can use Hurl Flame in place of any melee attack.

action.name: Fork
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +10} vurmak için, erişim 10 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 15 ({@dice 2d8+6}) delme hasarı.

action.name: Tail
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +10} vurmak için, erişim 10 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 10 ({@dice 1d8+6}) delme hasarı. If the target is a creature other than an undead yada a construct, it must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw yada lose 10 ({@dice 3d6}) hit points at the start of each of its turns due to an infernal wound. Each time the devil hits the wounded target with this attack, the damage dealt by the wound increases by 10 ({@dice 3d6}). Any creature can take an action to stanch the wound with a successful DC 12 Wisdom (Medicine) check. The wound also closes if the target receives magical healing.

action.name: Hurl Flame
entries: Ranged Spell Attack: {@hit +7} vurmak için, menzil 150 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 14 ({@dice 4d6}) ateş damage. If the target is a flammable object that isn't being worn yada carried, it also catches ateş.

trait.name: Blood Frenzy
entries: The shark has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

trait.name: Water Breathing
entries: The shark can breathe only underwater.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +6} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 13 ({@dice 2d8+4}) delme hasarı.

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: The hydra can hold its breath for 1 hour.

trait.name: Multiple Heads
entries: The hydra has five heads. While it has more than one head, the hydra has advantage on saving throws against being blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, and knocked unconscious.
Whenever the hydra takes 25 yada more damage in a single turn, one of its heads dies. If all its heads die, the hydra dies.

At the end of its turn, it grows two heads for each of its heads that died since its last turn, unless it has taken ateş damage since its last turn. The hydra regains 10 hit points for each head regrown in this way.

trait.name: Reactive Heads
entries: For each head the hydra has beyond one, it gets an extra reaction that can be used only for opportunity attacks.

trait.name: Wakeful
entries: While the hydra sleeps, at least one of its heads is awake.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The hydra makes as many bite attacks as it has heads.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +8} vurmak için, erişim 10 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 10 ({@dice 1d10+5}) delme hasarı.

trait.name: Sürü Taktiği
entries: Eğer sırtlanın bir dostu düşmanın 5 ft. yanında ise dostu ile saldırı avantajına sahip olur.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Weapon Attack: {@hit +2} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 3 ({@dice 1d6}) delme hasarı.

monster.name: Ice Devil

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

monster.senses: kör görüş 60 ft., gece görüşü 120 ft.

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's gece görüşü.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The devil makes three attacks: one with its bite, one with its claws, and one with its tail.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +10} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 12 ({@dice 2d6+5}) delme hasarı artı 10 ({@dice 3d6}) soğuk damage.

action.name: Pençeler
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +10} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 10 ({@dice 2d4+5}) kesme hasarı artı 10 ({@dice 3d6}) soğuk damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +10} vurmak için, erişim 10 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 12 ({@dice 2d6+5}) da hasarı artı 10 ({@dice 3d6}) soğuk damage.

action.name: Wall of Ice
entries: The devil magically forms an opaque wall of ice on a solid surface it can see within 60 feet of it. The wall is 1 foot thick and up to 30 feet long and 10 feet high, yada it's a hemispherical dome up to 20 feet in diameter.

When the wall appears, each creature in its space is pushed out of it by the shortest route. The creature chooses which side of the wall to end up on, unless the creature is incapacitated. The creature then makes a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw, taking 35 ({@dice 10d6}) soğuk damage on a failed save, yada half as much damage on a successful one.

The wall lasts for 1 minute yada until the devil is incapacitated yada dies. The wall can be damaged and breached; each 10-foot section has AC 5, 30 hit points, vulnerability to ateş damage, and immunity to asit, soğuk, nekrotik, zehir, and psişik damage. If a section is destroyed, it leaves behind a sheet of frigid air in the space the wall occupied. Whenever a creature finishes moving through the frigid air on a turn, willingly yada otherwise, the creature must make a DC 17 Constitution saving throw, taking 17 ({@dice 5d6}) soğuk damage on a failed save, yada half as much damage on a successful one. The frigid air dissipates when the rest of the wall vanishes.

monster.name: Ice Devil Spear

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

monster.senses: kör görüş 60 ft., gece görüşü 120 ft.

entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's gece görüşü.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The devil makes two attacks: one with its spear and one with its tail.

action.name: Ice Spear
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +10} vurmak için, erişim 10 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 14 ({@dice 2d8+5}) delme hasarı artı 10 ({@dice 3d6}) soğuk damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, yada for 1 minute, its speed is reduced by 10 feet; it can take either an action yada a bonus action on each of its turns, not both; and it can't take reactions. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +10} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 12 ({@dice 2d6+5}) delme hasarı artı 10 ({@dice 3d6}) soğuk damage.

action.name: Pençeler
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +10} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 10 ({@dice 2d4+5}) kesme hasarı artı 10 ({@dice 3d6}) soğuk damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +10} vurmak için, erişim 10 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 12 ({@dice 2d6+5}) ezme hasarı artı 10 ({@dice 3d6}) soğuk damage.

action.name: Wall of Ice
entries: The devil magically forms an opaque wall of ice on a solid surface it can see within 60 feet of it. The wall is 1 foot thick and up to 30 feet long and 10 feet high, yada it's a hemispherical dome up to 20 feet in diameter.

When the wall appears, each creature in its space is pushed out of it by the shortest route. The creature chooses which side of the wall to end up on, unless the creature is incapacitated. The creature then makes a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw, taking 35 ({@dice 10d6}) soğuk damage on a failed save, yada half as much damage on a successful one.

The wall lasts for 1 minute yada until the devil is incapacitated yada dies. The wall can be damaged and breached; each 10-foot section has AC 5, 30 hit points, vulnerability to ateş damage, and immunity to asit, soğuk, nekrotik, zehir, and psişik damage. If a section is destroyed, it leaves behind a sheet of frigid air in the space the wall occupied. Whenever a creature finishes moving through the frigid air on a turn, willingly yada otherwise, the creature must make a DC 17 Constitution saving throw, taking 17 ({@dice 5d6}) soğuk damage on a failed save, yada half as much damage on a successful one. The frigid air dissipates when the rest of the wall vanishes.

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: When the mephit dies, it explodes in a burst of jagged ice. Each creature within 5 ft. of it must make a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw, taking 4 ({@dice 1d8}) kesme hasarı on a failed save, yada half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the mephit remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary shard of ice.

action.name: Pençeler
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +3} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek varlık. Vurunca: 3 ({@dice 1d4+1}) kesme hasarı artı 2 ({@dice 1d4}) soğuk damage.

action.name: Frost Breath (Recharge 6)
entries: The mephit exhales a 15-foot cone of soğuk air. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw, taking 5 ({@dice 2d4}) soğuk damage on a failed save, yada half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Variant: Summon Mephits (1/Gün)
entries: The mephit has a {@chance 30|30 percent|30% summoning chance} chance of summoning {@dice 1d4} mephits of its kind. A summoned mephit appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other mephits. It remains for 1 minute, until it yada its summoner dies, yada until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (1/Gün)
headerEntries: The mephit can innately cast {@spell fog cloud}, requiring no material components. Its innate spellcasting ability is Charisma.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The imp can use its action to polymorph into a hayvan form that resembles a rat (speed 20 ft.), a raven (20 ft., uçma 60 ft.), yada a Örümcek (20 ft., tırmanma 20 ft.), yada back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form, except for the speed changes noted. Any equipment it is wearing yada carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the imp's gece görüşü.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The imp has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Variant: Imp Familiar
entries: Imps can be found in the service to mortal spellcasters, acting as advisors, spies, and familiars. An imp urges its master to acts of evil, knowing the mortal's soul is a prize the imp might ultimately claim. Imps display an unusual loyalty to their masters, and an imp can be quite dangerous if its master is threatened. Some such imps have the following trait.

trait.name: Familiar
entries: The imp can enter into a contract to serve another creature as a familiar, forming a telepathic bond with its willing master. While the two are bonded, the master can sense what the imp senses as long as they are within 1 mile of each other. While the imp is within 10 feet of its master, the master shares the imp's Magic Resistance trait. If its master violates the terms of the contract, the imp can end its service as a familiar, ending the telepathic bond.

action.name: Sting (Isırma in hayvan Form)
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +5} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 5 ({@dice 1d4+3}) delme hasarı, and the target must make on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 10 ({@dice 3d6}) zehir damage on a failed save, yada half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Invisibility
entries: The imp magically turns invisible until it attacks, yada until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the imp wears yada carries is invisible with it.

monster.name: Intellect Devourer
monster.senses: kör görüş 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius)
monster.languages: understands Deep Speech but can't speak, Telepati 60 ft.

trait.name: Detect Sentience
entries: The intellect devourer can sense the presence and location of any creature within 300 feet of it that has an Intelligence of 3 yada higher, regardless of interposing barriers, unless the creature is protected by a mind blank spell.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The intellect devourer makes one attack with its claws and uses Devour Intellect.

action.name: Pençeler
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +4} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 7 ({@dice 2d4+2}) kesme hasarı.

action.name: Devour Intellect
entries: The intellect devourer targets tek varlık it can see within 10 feet of it that has a brain. The target must succeed on a DC 12 Intelligence saving throw against this magic yada take 11 ({@dice 2d10}) psişik damage. Also on a failure, roll {@dice 3d6}: If the total equals yada exceeds the target's Intelligence score, that score is reduced to 0. The target is stunned until it regains at least one point of Intelligence.

action.name: Body Thief
entries: The intellect devourer initiates an Intelligence contest with an incapacitated insansı within 5 feet of it that isn't protected by protection from evil and good. If it wins the contest, the intellect devourer magically consumes the target's brain, teleports into the target's skull, and takes control of the target's body. While inside a creature, the intellect devourer has total cover against attacks and other effects originating outside its host. The intellect devourer retains its Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores, as well as its understanding of Deep Speech, its Telepati, and its traits. It otherwise adopts the target's statistics. It knows everything the creature knew, including spells and languages.

If the host body dies, the intellect devourer must leave it. A protection from evil and good spell cast on the body drives the intellect devourer out. The intellect devourer is also forced out if the target regains its devoured brain by means of a wish. By spending 5 feet of its movement, the intellect devourer can voluntarily leave the body, teleporting to the nearest unoccupied space within 5 feet of it. The body then dies, unless its brain is restored within 1 round.

monster.name: Invisible Stalker
monster.languages: Auran, understands Ortak but doesn't speak it

trait.name: Invisibility
entries: The stalker is invisible.

trait.name: Faultless Tracker
entries: The stalker is given a quarry by its summoner. The stalker knows the direction and distance to its quarry as long as the two of them are on the same plane of existence. The stalker also knows the location of its summoner.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The stalker makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +6} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 10 ({@dice 2d6+3}) ezme hasarı.

monster.name: Iron Golem

immune.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

monster.languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Fire Absorption
entries: Whenever the golem is subjected to ateş damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the ateş damage dealt.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The golem is immune to any spell yada effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The golem's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The golem makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +13} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 20 ({@dice 3d8+7}) ezme hasarı.

action.name: Sword
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +13} vurmak için, erişim 10 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 23 ({@dice 3d10+7}) kesme hasarı.

action.name: Poison Breath (Recharge 5—6)
entries: The golem exhales poisonous gas in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 19 Constitution saving throw, taking 45 ({@dice 10d8}) zehir damage on a failed save, yada half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Keskin Duyma ve Koklama
entries: Çakal duyma ve koklamaya bağlı Akıl (Algılama) zarlarında avantajlıdır.

trait.name: Sürü Taktiği
entries: Eğer çakalın bir dostu düşmanın 5 ft. yanında ise dostu ile saldırı avantajına sahip olur.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +1} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 1 ({@dice 1d4-1}) delme hasarı.

immune.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The jackalwere can use its action to polymorph into a specific Medium human yada a jackal-insansı hybrid, yada back into its true form (that of a Small jackal). Other than its size, its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing yada carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The jackalwere has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing yada smell.

trait.name: Sürü Taktiği
entries: The jackalwere has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the wolf's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

action.name: Isırma (Jackal yada Hybrid Form Only)
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +4} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 4 ({@dice 1d4+2}) delme hasarı.

action.name: Scimitar (Human yada Hybrid Form Only)
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +4} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 5 ({@dice 1d6+2}) kesme hasarı.

action.name: Sleep Gaze
entries: The jackalwere gazes at tek varlık it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must make a DC 10 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target succumbs to a magical slumber, falling unconscious for 10 minutes yada until someone uses an action to shake the target awake. A creature that successfully saves against the effect is immune to this jackalwere's gaze for the next 24 hours. Undead and creatures immune to being charmed aren't affected by it.

monster.name: Kenku
monster.languages: understands Auran and Ortak but speaks only through the use of its Mimicry trait

trait.name: Ambusher
entries: In the first round of a combat, the kenku has advantage on attack rolls against any creature it surprised

trait.name: Mimicry
entries: The kenku can mimic any sounds it has heard, including voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful DC 14 Wisdom (Insight) check.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +5} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 6 ({@dice 1d6+3}) delme hasarı.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: Menzilli Silah Saldırısı: {@hit +5} vurmak için, menzil 80/320 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 6 ({@dice 1d6+3}) delme hasarı.

entries: The whale can't use its kör görüş while deafened.

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: The whale can hold its breath for 30 minutes

trait.name: Keen Hearing
entries: The whale has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +6} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 21 ({@dice 5d6+4}) delme hasarı.

trait.name: Brave
entries: The knight has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The knight makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries: Menzilli Silah Saldırısı: {@hit +2} vurmak için, menzil 100/400 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 5 ({@dice 1d10}) delme hasarı.

action.name: Leadership (Recharges after a Short yada Long Rest)
entries: For 1 minute, the knight can utter a special command yada warning whenever a nonhostile creature that it can see within 30 ft. of it makes an attack roll yada a saving throw. The creature can add a d4 to its roll provided it can hear and understand the knight. A creature can benefit from only one Leadership die at a time. This effect ends if the knight is incapacitated.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The knight adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the knight must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

trait.name: Gün Işığı Hassasiyeti
entries: Koboldlar gün ışında yaptıkları saldırılarda ve Akıl (Algılama) zarlarında dezavantajlıdır.

trait.name: Sürü Taktiği
entries: Eğer koboldun bir dostu düşmanın 5 ft. yanında ise dostu ile saldırı avantajına sahip olur.

action.name: Hançer
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +4} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 4 ({@dice 1d4+2}) delme hasarı.

action.name: Sapan
entries: Menzilli Silah Saldırısı: {@hit +4} vurmak için, menzil 30/120 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 4 ({@dice 1d4+2}) ezme hasarı.

monster.name: KTırmalaman

immune.note: from nonmagical attacks

monster.languages: understands Abyssal, Celestial, Infernal, and Primordial but can't speak, Telepati 120 ft.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The kTırmalaman can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Freedom of Movement
entries: The kTırmalaman ignores difficult terrain, and magical effects can't reduce its speed yada cause it to be restrained. It can spend 5 feet of movement to escape from nonmagical restraints yada being grappled.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The kTırmalaman deals double damage to objects and structures.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The kTırmalaman makes three tentacle attacks, each of which it can replace with one use of Fling.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +17} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 23 ({@dice 3d8+10}) delme hasarı. If the target is a Large yada smaller creature grappled by the kTırmalaman, that creature is swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the creature is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the kTırmalaman, and it takes 42 ({@dice 12d6}) asit damage at the start of each of the kTırmalaman's turns. If the kTırmalaman takes 50 damage yada more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the kTırmalaman must succeed on a DC 25 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn yada regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within 10 feet of the kTırmalaman. If the kTırmalaman dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse using 15 feet of movement, exiting prone.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +17} vurmak için, erişim 30 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 20 ({@dice 3d6+10}) ezme hasarı, and the target is grappled (escape DC 18). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained. The kTırmalaman has ten tentacles, each of which can grapple tek hedef.

action.name: Fling
entries: One Large yada smaller object held yada creature grappled by the kTırmalaman is thrown up to 60 feet in a random direction and knocked prone. If a thrown target strikes a solid surface, the target takes 3 ({@dice 1d6}) ezme hasarı for every 10 feet it was thrown. If the target is thrown at another creature, that creature must succeed on a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw yada take the same damage and be knocked prone.

action.name: Lightning Storm
entries: The kTırmalaman magically creates three bolts of yıldırım, each of which can strike a target the kTırmalaman can see within 120 feet of it. A target must make a DC 23 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 ({@dice 4d10}) yıldırım damage on a failed save, yada half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Tentacle Attack yada Fling
entries: The kTırmalaman makes one tentacle attack yada uses its Fling.

legendary.name: Lightning Storm (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The kTırmalaman uses Lightning Storm.

legendary.name: Ink Cloud (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: While underwater, the kTırmalaman expels an ink cloud in a 60-foot radius. The cloud spreads around corners, and that area is heavily obscured to creatures other than the kTırmalaman. Each creature other than the kTırmalaman that ends its turn there must succeed on a DC 23 Constitution saving throw, taking 16 ({@dice 3d10}) zehir damage on a failed save, yada half as much damage on a successful one. A strong current disperses the cloud, which otherwise disappears at the end of the kTırmalaman's next turn.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The kuo-toa can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Otherworldly Perception
entries: The kuo-toa can sense the presence of any creature within 30 feet of it that is invisible yada on the Ethereal Plane. It can pinpoint such a creature that is moving.

trait.name: Slippery
entries: The kuo-toa has advantage on ability checks and saving throws made to escape a grapple.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the kuo-toa has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +3} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 3 ({@dice 1d4+1}) delme hasarı.

action.name: Spear
entries: Yakın Dövüş yada Menzilli Silah Saldırısı: {@hit +3} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft. yada menzil 20/60 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 4 ({@dice 1d6+1}) delme hasarı, yada 5 ({@dice 1d8+1}) delme hasarı eğer iki el ile kullanıldıysa to make a melee attack.

action.name: Net
entries: Menzilli Silah Saldırısı: {@hit +3} vurmak için, menzil 5/15 ft., one Large yada smaller creature. Vurunca: The target is restrained. A creature can use its action to make a DC 10 Strength check to free itself yada another creature in a net, ending the effect on a success. Dealing 5 kesme hasarı to the net (AC 10) frees the target without harming it and destroys the net.

reaction.name: Sticky Shield
entries: When a creature misses the kuo-toa with a melee weapon attack, the kuo-toa uses its sticky shield to catch the weapon. The attacker must succeed on a DC 11 Strength saving throw, yada the weapon becomes stuck to the kuo-toa's shield. If the weapon's wielder can't yada won't let go of the weapon, the wielder is grappled while the weapon is stuck. While stuck, the weapon can't be used. A creature can pull the weapon free by taking an action to make a DC 11 Strength check and succeeding.

action.name: Unarmed Strike

immune.note: from nonmagical attacks

monster.languages: Ortak artı up to five other languages

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Gün)
entries: If the lich fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: If it has a phylactery, a destroyed lich gains a new body in {@dice 1d10} Güns, regaining all its hit points and becoming active again. The new body appears within 5 feet of the phylactery.

trait.name: Turn Resistance
entries: The lich has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

action.name: Paralyzing Touch
entries: Melee Spell Attack: {@hit +12} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek varlık. Vurunca: 10 ({@dice 3d6}) soğuk damage. The target must succeed on a DC 18 Constitution saving throw yada be paralyzed for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

legendary.name: Cantrip
entries: The lich casts a cantrip.

legendary.name: Paralyzing Touch (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The lich uses its Paralyzing Touch.

legendary.name: Frightening Gaze (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The lich fixes its gaze on tek varlık it can see within 10 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw against this magic yada become frightened for 1 minute. The frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful yada the effect ends for it, the target is immune to the lich's gaze for the next 24 hours.

legendary.name: Disrupt Life (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Each non-undead creature within 20 feet of the lich must make a DC 18 Constitution saving throw against this magic, taking 21 ({@dice 6d6}) nekrotik damage on a failed save, yada half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Pounce

entries: When the mephit dies, it explodes in a burst of lava. Each creature within 5 ft. of it must make a DC 11 Dexterity saving throw, taking 7 ({@dice 2d6}) ateş damage on a failed save, yada half as much damage on a successful one.

A summoned mephit appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other mephits. It remains for 1 minute, until it yada its summoner dies, yada until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

Flammable objects that aren't being worn yada carried in that area are ignited.

trait.name: Ignited Illumination
entries: As a bonus action, the magmin can set itself ablaze yada extinguish its flames. While ablaze, the magmin sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet.

action.name: Stomp

entries: The manticore has twenty-four tail spikes. Used spikes regrow when the manticore finishes a long rest.

action.name: Pençe
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +5} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 6 ({@dice 1d6+3}) kesme hasarı.

action.name: Tail Spike
entries: Menzilli Silah Saldırısı: {@hit +5} vurmak için, menzil 100/200 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 7 ({@dice 1d8+3}) delme hasarı.

monster.name: Marid
monster.senses: kör görüş 30 ft., gece görüşü 120 ft.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The marid can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Elemental Demise
entries: If the marid dies, its body disintegrates into a burst of water and foam, leaving behind only equipment the marid was wearing yada carrying.

trait.name: Variant: Genie Powers
entries: Genies have a variety of magical capabilities, including spells. A few have even greater powers that allow them to alter their appearance yada the doğa of reality.
Disguises.

Some genies can veil themselves in illusion to pass as other similarly shaped creatures. Such genies can innately cast the disguise self spell at will, often with a longer duration than is normal for that spell. Mightier genies can cast the true polymorph spell one to three times per Gün, possibly with a longer duration than normal. Such genies can change only their own shape, but a rare few can use the spell on other creatures and objects as well.
Wishes.

The genie power to grant wishes is legendary among mortals. Only the most potent genies, such as those among the nobility, can do so. A particular genie that has this power can grant one to three wishes to a creature that isn't a genie. Once a genie has granted its limit of wishes, it can't grant wishes again for some amount of time (genellikle 1 year). and cosmic law dictates that the same genie can expend its limit of wishes on a specific creature only once in that creature's existence.

To be granted a wish, a creature within 60 feet of the genie states a desired effect to it. The genie can then cast the wish spell on the creature's behalf to bring about the effect. Depending on the genie's doğa, the genie might try to pervert the intent of the wish by exploiting the wish's poor wording. The perversion of the wording is genellikle crafted to be to the genie's benefit.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The marid makes two trident attacks.

action.name: Trident
entries: Yakın Dövüş yada Menzilli Silah Saldırısı: {@hit +10} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft. yada menzil 20/60 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 13 ({@dice 2d6+6}) delme hasarı, yada 15 ({@dice 2d8+6}) delme hasarı eğer iki el ile kullanıldıysa to make a melee attack.

action.name: Water Jet
entries: The marid magically shoots water in a 60-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, a target takes 21 ({@dice 6d6}) ezme hasarı and, if it is Huge yada smaller, is pushed up to 20 feet away from the marid and knocked prone. On a success, a target takes half the ezme hasarı, but is neither pushed nor knocked prone.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The marid's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell kurtulma zarı DC'si 16, {@hit 8} büyü saldırıları ile vurmak için). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The marilith has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The marilith's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Reactive
entries: The marilith can take one reaction on every turn in combat.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The marilith can make seven attacks: six with its longswords and one with its tail.

action.name: Longsword
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +9} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 13 ({@dice 2d8+4}) kesme hasarı.

action.name: Tail
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +9} vurmak için, erişim 10 ft., tek varlık. Vurunca: 15 ({@dice 2d10+4}) ezme hasarı. If the target is Medium yada smaller, it is grappled (escape DC 19). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, the marilith can automatically hit the target with its tail, and the marilith can't make tail attacks against other targets.

action.name: Teleport
entries: The marilith magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing yada carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

action.name: Variant: Summon Demon (1/Gün)
entries: The demon chooses what to summon and attempts a magical summoning.

A marilith has a {@chance 50|50 percent|50% summoning chance} chance of summoning {@dice 1d6} {@creature vrock}s, {@dice 1d4} {@creature hezrou}s, {@dice 1d3} {@creature glabrezu}s, {@dice 1d2} {@creature nalfeshnee}s, yada one marilith.

A summoned demon appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other demons. It remains for 1 minute, until it yada its summoner dies, yada until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The marilith adds 5 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the marilith must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

trait.name: Keskin Duyma ve Koklama
entries: Mastif'in duyma ve koklamaya bağlı Akıl (Algılama) zarlarında avantajı vardır.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +3} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 4 ({@dice 1d6+1}) delme hasarı. Eğer hedef bir varlıksa , Kuvvet kurtulma zarında başarılı olur (kaçma DCsi 11) yada yere düşer.

trait.name: Petrifying Gaze
entries: When a creature that can see the medusa's eyes starts its turn within 30 ft. of the medusa, the medusa can force it to make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw if the medusa isn't incapacitated and can see the creature. If the saving throw fails by 5 yada more, the creature is instantly petrified. Otherwise, a creature that fails the save begins to turn to stone and is restrained. The restrained creature must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn, becoming petrified on a failure yada ending the effect on a success. The petrification lasts until the creature is freed by the greater restoration spell yada other magic.

Unless surprised, a creature can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If the creature does so, it can't see the medusa until the start of its next turn, when it can avert its eyes again. If the creature looks at the medusa in the meantime, it must immediately make the save.
If the medusa sees itself reflected on a polished surface within 30 ft. of it and in an area of bright light, the medusa is, due to its curse, affected by its own gaze.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The medusa makes either three melee attacks—one with its snake hair and two with its shortsword—or two ranged attacks with its longbow.

action.name: Snake Hair
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +5} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek varlık. Vurunca: 4 ({@dice 1d4+2}) delme hasarı artı 14 ({@dice 4d6}) zehir damage.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +5} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 5 ({@dice 1d6+2}) delme hasarı.

action.name: Longbow
entries: Menzilli Silah Saldırısı: {@hit +5} vurmak için, menzil 150/600 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 6 ({@dice 1d8+2}) delme hasarı artı 7 ({@dice 2d6}) zehir damage.

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: Merfolklar hem karada hem suda nefes alabilir.

action.name: Mızrak
entries: Yakın Dövüş yada Menzilli Silah Saldırısı: {@hit +2} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft. yada menzil 20/60 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 3 ({@dice 1d6}) delme hasarı, yada iki eli ile saldırdıysa 4 ({@dice 1d8}) delme hasarı.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The merrow can breathe air and water.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The merrow makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws yada harpoon.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +6} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 8 ({@dice 1d8+4}) delme hasarı.

action.name: Pençeler
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +6} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 9 ({@dice 2d4+4}) kesme hasarı.

action.name: Harpoon
entries: Yakın Dövüş yada Menzilli Silah Saldırısı: {@hit +6} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft. yada menzil 20/60 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 11 ({@dice 2d6+4}) delme hasarı. If the target is a Huge yada smaller creature, it must succeed on a Strength contest against the merrow yada be pulled up to 20 feet toward the merrow.

monster.name: Mezzoloth
monster.senses: kör görüş 60 ft., gece görüşü 60 ft.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The mezzoloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons

action.name: Trident
entries: Yakın Dövüş yada Menzilli Silah Saldırısı: {@hit +7} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft. yada menzil 20/60 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 7 ({@dice 1d6+4}) delme hasarı, yada 8 ({@dice 1d8+4}) delme hasarı when held with two claws and used to make a melee attack.

action.name: Teleport
entries: The mezzoloth magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing yada carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

variant.name: Yugoloth Summoning
entries: Some yugoloths have an action option that allows them to summon other yugoloths.

entries.name: Summon Yugoloth (1/Gün)
entries: The yugoloth attempts a magical summoning.
A mezzoloth has a {@chance 30|30 percent|30% summoning chance} chance of summoning one mezzoloth.

A summoned yugoloth appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner, does as it pleases, and can't summon other yugoloths. The summoned yugoloth remains for 1 minute, until it yada its summoner dies, yada until its summoner takes a bonus action to dismiss it.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The mezzoloth's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell kurtulma zarı DC'si 11). The mezzoloth can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The mimic can use its action to polymorph into an object yada back into its true, amorphous form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing yada carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Adhesive (Object Form Only)
entries: The mimic adheres to anything that touches it. A Huge yada smaller creature adhered to the mimic is also grappled by it (escape DC 13). Ability checks made to escape this grapple have disadvantage.

trait.name: False Appearance (Object Form Only)
entries: While the mimic remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary object.

trait.name: Grappler
entries: The mimic has advantage on attack rolls against any creature grappled by it.

action.name: Pseudopod
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +5} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 7 ({@dice 1d8+3}) ezme hasarı. If the mimic is in object form, the target is subjected to its Adhesive trait.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +5} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 7 ({@dice 1d8+3}) delme hasarı artı 4 ({@dice 1d8}) asit damage.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The mind flayer has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Tentacles
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +7} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek varlık. Vurunca: 15 ({@dice 2d10+4}) psişik damage. If the target is Medium yada smaller, it is grappled (escape DC 15) and must succeed on a DC 15 Intelligence saving throw yada be stunned until this grapple ends.

action.name: Extract Brain
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +7} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., one incapacitated insansı grappled by the mind flayer. Vurunca: The target takes 55 ({@dice 10d10}) delme hasarı. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the mind flayer kills the target by extracting and devouring its brain.

action.name: Mind Blast (Recharge 5—6)
entries: The mind flayer magically emits psişik energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 15 Intelligence saving throw yada take 22 ({@dice 4d8+4}) psişik damage and be stunned for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Extract Brain

If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the mind flayer kills the target by extracting and devouring its brain.

action.name: Mind Blast (Recharge 5—6)
entries: The mind flayer magically emits psişik energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 15 Intelligence saving throw yada take 22 ({@dice 4d8+4}) psişik damage and be stunned for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
