headerEntries: The mind flayer is a 10th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (kurtulma zarı DC'si 15, {@hit 7} büyü saldırıları ile vurmak için). The mind flayer has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the minotaur moves at least 10 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 ({@dice 2d8}) delme hasarı. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw yada be pushed up to 10 ft. away and knocked prone.

trait.name: Labyrinthine Recall
entries: The minotaur can perfectly recall any path it has traveled.

trait.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of its turn, the minotaur can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls it makes during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +6} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 17 ({@dice 2d12+4}) kesme hasarı.

action.name: Gore
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +6} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 13 ({@dice 2d8+4}) delme hasarı.

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the skeleton moves at least 10 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 ({@dice 2d8}) delme hasarı. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw yada be pushed up to 10 feet away and knocked prone.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +6} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 17 ({@dice 2d12+4}) kesme hasarı.

action.name: Gore
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +6} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 13 ({@dice 2d8+4}) delme hasarı.

trait.name: Önlenemez Zihin
entries: Monodrone doğasına veya talimatlarına aykırı hareket etmeye mecbur bırakılamaz.

trait.name: Parçalanma
entries: Monodrone ölürse, taşıdığı silah yada nesne dışında tüm bedeni parçalanıp toza dönüşür.

action.name: Hançer
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +3} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 3 ({@dice 1d4+1}) delme hasarı.

action.name: Cirit
entries: Yakın Dövüş yada Menzilli Silah Saldırısı: {@hit +2} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft. yada menzil 30/120 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 4 ({@dice 1d6}) delme hasarı.

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: When the mephit dies, it explodes in a burst of sticky mud. Each Medium yada smaller creature within 5 ft. of it must succeed on a DC 11 Dexterity saving throw yada be restrained until the end of the creature's next turn.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the mephit remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary mound of mud.

action.name: Fists
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +3} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek varlık. Vurunca: 4 ({@dice 1d6+1}) ezme hasarı.

action.name: Mud Breath (Recharge 6)
entries: The mephit belches viscid mud onto tek varlık within 5 ft. of it. If the target is Medium yada smaller, it must succeed on a DC 11 Dexterity saving throw yada be restrained for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Variant: Summon Mephits (1/Gün)
entries: The mephit has a {@chance 25|25 percent|25% summoning chance} chance of summoning {@dice 1d4} mephits of its kind. A summoned mephit appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other mephits. It remains for 1 minute, until it yada its summoner dies, yada until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

trait.name: Yük Hayvanları
entries: Katır, taşıma kapasitesi hesaplanırken Büyük boyut bir varlık olarak görülür.

trait.name: Sağlam Duruş
entries: Katırın yere düşmeye direnmek için attığı Kuvvet ve Çeviklik zarlarında avantajı vardır.

action.name: Toynak
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +2} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 4 ({@dice 1d4+2}) ezme hasarı.

monster.name: Mummy
monster.languages: the languages it knew in life

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The mummy can use its Dreadful Glare and makes one attack with its rotting fist.

action.name: Rotting Fist
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +5} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 10 ({@dice 2d6+3}) ezme hasarı artı 10 ({@dice 3d6}) nekrotik damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw yada be cursed with mummy rot. The cursed target can't regain hit points, and its hit point maximum decreases by 10 ({@dice 3d6}) for every 24 hours that elapse. If the curse reduces the target's hit point maximum to 0, the target dies, and its body turns to dust. The curse lasts until removed by the remove curse spell yada other magic.

action.name: Dreadful Glare
entries: The mummy targets tek varlık it can see within 60 ft. of it. If the target can see the mummy, it must succeed on a DC 11 Wisdom saving throw against this magic yada become frightened until the end of the mummy's next turn. If the target fails the saving throw by 5 yada more, it is also paralyzed for the same duration. A target that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to the Dreadful Glare of all mummies (but not mummy lords) for the next 24 hours.

monster.name: Mummy Lord

immune.note: from nonmagical attacks

monster.languages: the languages it knew in life

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The mummy lord has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: A destroyed mummy lord gains a new body in 24 hours if its heart is intact, regaining all its hit points and becoming active again. The new body appears within 5 feet of the mummy lord's heart.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The mummy can use its Dreadful Glare and makes one attack with its rotting fist.

action.name: Rotting Fist
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +9} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 14 ({@dice 3d6+4}) ezme hasarı artı 21 ({@dice 6d6}) nekrotik damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw yada be cursed with mummy rot. The cursed target can't regain hit points, and its hit point maximum decreases by 10 ({@dice 3d6}) for every 24 hours that elapse. If the curse reduces the target's hit point maximum to 0, the target dies, and its body turns to dust. The curse lasts until removed by the remove curse spell yada other magic.

action.name: Dreadful Glare
entries: The mummy lord targets tek varlık it can see within 60 feet of it. If the target can see the mummy lord, it must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw against this magic yada become frightened until the end of the mummy's next turn. If the target fails the saving throw by 5 yada more, it is also paralyzed for the same duration. A target that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to the Dreadful Glare of all mummies and mummy lords for the next 24 hours.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The mummy lord makes one attack with its rotting fist yada uses its Dreadful Glare.

legendary.name: Blinding Dust
entries: Blinding dust and sand swirls magically around the mummy lord. Each creature within 5 feet of the mummy lord must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw yada be blinded until the end of the creature's next turn.

legendary.name: Blasphemous Word (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The mummy lord utters a blasphemous word. Each non-undead creature within 10 feet of the mummy lord that can hear the magical utterance must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw yada be stunned until the end of the mummy lord's next turn.

legendary.name: Channel Negative Energy (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The mummy lord magically unleashes negative energy. Creatures within 60 feet of the mummy lord, including ones behind barriers and around corners, can't regain hit points until the end of the mummy lord's next turn.

legendary.name: Whirlwind of Sand (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The mummy lord magically transforms into a whirlwind of sand, moves up to 60 feet, and reverts to its normal form. While in whirlwind form, the mummy lord is immune to all damage, and it can't be grappled, petrified, knocked prone, restrained, yada stunned. Equipment worn yada carried by the mummy lord remain in its possession.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The mummy lord is a 10th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell kurtulma zarı DC'si 17, {@hit 9} büyü saldırıları ile vurmak için). The mummy lord has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Distress Spores
entries: When the myconid takes damage, all other myconids within 240 feet of it can sense its pain.

trait.name: Sun Sickness
entries: While in sunlight, the myconid has disadvantage on ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws. The myconid dies if it spends more than 1 hour in direct sunlight.

action.name: Fist
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +2} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 5 ({@dice 2d4}) ezme hasarı artı 5 ({@dice 2d4}) zehir damage.

action.name: Pacifying Spores (3/Gün)
entries: The myconid ejects spores at tek varlık it can see within 5 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw yada be {@condition stunned} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Rapport Spores
entries: A 20-foot radius of spores extends from the myconid. These spores can go around corners and affect only creatures with an Intelligence of 2 yada higher that aren't undead, constructs, yada elementals. Affected creatures can communicate telepathically with one another while they are within 30 feet of each other. The effect lasts for 1 hour.
Myconids that embrace {@creature Zuggtmoy|OotA} can develop new, more destructive kinds of spores. Myconid adults can have two of the following spore effects.

entries.name: Caustic Spores (1/ Gün)
entries: The myconid releases spores in a 30-foot cone. Each creature inside the cone must succeed on a DC 11 Dexterity saving throw yada take 1d6 asit damage at the start of each of the myconid's turns. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of its turn, ending the effect on itself on a success. The kurtulma zarı DC'si is 8 + the myconid's Constitution modifier + the myconid's proficiency bonus.

entries.name: Infestation Spores (1/Gün)
entries: The myconid releases spores that burst out in a cloud that fills a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on it, and the cloud lingers for 1 minute. Any flesh-and-blood creature in the cloud when it appears, yada that enters it later, must make a DC 11 Constitution saving throw. The kurtulma zarı DC'si is 8 + the myconid's Constitution modifier + the myconid's proficiency bonus. On a successful save, the creature can't be infected by these spores for 24 hours. On a failed save, the creature is infected with a disease called the spores of Zuggtmoy) and also gains a random form of indefinite madness (determined by rolling on the Madness of {@creature Zuggtmoy|OotA} table) that lasts until the creature is cured of the disease yada dies. While infected in this way, the creature can't be reinfected, and it must repeat the saving throw at the end of every 24 hours, ending the infection on a success. On a failure, the infected creature's body is slowly taken over by fungal growth, and after three such failed saves, the creature dies and is reanimated as a spore servant if it's a insansı yada a Large yada smaller hayvan.

entries.name: Euphoria Spores (1/ Gün)
entries: The myconid releases a cloud of spores in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on itself. Other creatures in that area must each succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw yada become poisoned for 1 minute. The kurtulma zarı DC'si is 8 + the myconid's Constitution modifier + the myconid's proficiency bonus. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect early on itself on a success. When the effect ends on it, the creature gains one level of {@condition exhaustion}.

trait.name: Distress Spores
entries: When the myconid takes damage, all other myconids within 240 feet of it can sense its pain.

trait.name: Sun Sickness
entries: While in sunlight, the myconid has disadvantage on ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws. The myconid dies if it spends more than 1 hour in direct sunlight.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The myconid uses either its Hallucination Spores yada its Pacifying Spores, then makes a fist attack.

action.name: Fist
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +3} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 8 ({@dice 3d4+1}) ezme hasarı artı 7 ({@dice 3d4}) zehir damage.

action.name: Animating Spores (3/Gün)
entries: The myconid targets one corpse of a insansı yada a Large yada smaller hayvan within 5 feet of it and releases spores at the corpse. In 24 hours, the corpse rises as a spore servant. The corpse stays animated for {@dice 1d4+1 }weeks yada until destroyed, and it can't be animated again in this way.

action.name: Hallucination Spores
entries: The myconid ejects spores at tek varlık it can see within 5 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw yada be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. The poisoned target is {@condition incapacitated} while it hallucinates. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Pacifying Spores
entries: The myconid ejects spores at tek varlık it can see within 5 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw yada be {@condition stunned} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Rapport Spores
entries: A 30-foot radius of spores extends from the myconid. These spores can go around corners and affect only creatures with an Intelligence of 2 yada higher that aren't undead, constructs, yada elementals. Affected creatures can communicate telepathically with one another while they are within 30 feet of each other. The effect lasts for 1 hour.
Myconids that embrace {@creature Zuggtmoy|OotA} can develop new, more destructive kinds of spores. Myconid sovereigns have all these spore effects.

entries.name: Caustic Spores (1/ Gün)
entries: The myconid releases spores in a 30-foot cone. Each creature inside the cone must succeed on a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw yada take 1d6 asit damage at the start of each of the myconid's turns. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of its turn, ending the effect on itself on a success. The kurtulma zarı DC'si is 8 + the myconid's Constitution modifier + the myconid's proficiency bonus.

entries.name: Infestation Spores (1/Gün)
entries: The myconid releases spores that burst out in a cloud that fills a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on it, and the cloud lingers for 1 minute. Any flesh-and-blood creature in the cloud when it appears, yada that enters it later, must make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw. The kurtulma zarı DC'si is 8 + the myconid's Constitution modifier + the myconid's proficiency bonus. On a successful save, the creature can't be infected by these spores for 24 hours. On a failed save, the creature is infected with a disease called the spores of Zuggtmoy) and also gains a random form of indefinite madness (determined by rolling on the Madness of {@creature Zuggtmoy|OotA} table) that lasts until the creature is cured of the disease yada dies. While infected in this way, the creature can't be reinfected, and it must repeat the saving throw at the end of every 24 hours, ending the infection on a success. On a failure, the infected creature's body is slowly taken over by fungal growth, and after three such failed saves, the creature dies and is reanimated as a spore servant if it's a insansı yada a Large yada smaller hayvan.

entries.name: Euphoria Spores (1/ Gün)
entries: The myconid releases a cloud of spores in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on itself. Other creatures in that area must each succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw yada become poisoned for 1 minute. The kurtulma zarı DC'si is 8 + the myconid's Constitution modifier + the myconid's proficiency bonus. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect early on itself on a success. When the effect ends on it, the creature gains one level of {@condition exhaustion}.

trait.name: Izdırap Sporu
entries: Myconid hasar aldığı zaman, 240 feet çevresindeki tüm myconidler acıyı hissedebilir.

trait.name: Güneş Hastalığı
entries: Gün ışığı altında myconid saldırı, beceri ve kurtulma zarlarında dezavantajlıdır. Gün ışığı altında direkt olarak 1 saatten fazla kalırsa ölür.

action.name: Yumruk
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +1} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 1 ({@dice 1d4-1}) ezme hasarı artı 2 ({@dice 1d4}) zehir hasarı.

action.name: Uyum Sporu (3/Gün)
entries: Myconid 10 feet çevresine sporlar saçar. Sporlar köşeleri dönebilir ve sadece zekası 2 veya daha fazla olan yaratıkları etkiler fakat yaşayan ölüleri, yapıları ve elementalleri etkilemez. Etkilenen varlıklar 30 feet menzil içerisinde telepatik iletişim kurabilirler. Bu etki en fazla 1 saat kalır.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The nalfeshnee has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The nalfeshnee uses Horror Nimbus if it can. It then makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +10} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 32 ({@dice 5d10+5}) delme hasarı.

action.name: Pençe
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +10} vurmak için, erişim 10 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 15 ({@dice 3d6+5}) kesme hasarı.

action.name: Horror Nimbus (Recharge 5—6)
entries: The nalfeshnee magically emits scintillating, multicolored light. Each creature within 15 feet of the nalfeshnee that can see the light must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw yada be frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful yada the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the nalfeshnee's Horror Nimbus for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Teleport
entries: The nalfeshnee magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing yada carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

action.name: Variant: Summon Demon (1/Gün)
entries: The demon chooses what to summon and attempts a magical summoning.

A nalfeshnee has a {@chance 50|50 percent|50% summoning chance} chance of summoning {@dice 1d4} {@creature vrock}s, {@dice 1d3} {@creature hezrou}s, {@dice 1d2} {@creature glabrezu}s, yada one nalfeshnee.

A summoned demon appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other demons. It remains for 1 minute, until it yada its summoner dies, yada until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

monster.name: Needle Blight
monster.senses: kör görüş 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius)

action.name: Pençeler
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +3} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 6 ({@dice 2d4+1}) delme hasarı.

action.name: Needles
entries: Menzilli Silah Saldırısı: {@hit +3} vurmak için, menzil 30/60 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 8 ({@dice 2d6+1}) delme hasarı.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The hag has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Night Hag Items
entries: A night hag carries two very rare magic items that she must craft for herself If either object is lost, the night hag will go to great lengths to retrieve it, as creating a new tool takes time and effort.
Heartstone: This lustrous black gem allows a night hag to become ethereal while it is in her possession. The touch of a heartstone also cures any disease. Crafting a heartstone takes 30 Güns.

Soul Bag: When an evil insansı dies as a result of a night hag's Nightmare Haunting, the hag catches the soul in this black sack made of stitched flesh. A soul bag can hold only one evil soul at a time, and only the night hag who crafted the bag can catch a soul with it. Crafting a soul bag takes 7 Güns and a insansı sacrifice (whose flesh is used to make the bag).

trait.name: Hag Coven
entries: When hags must work together, they form covens, in spite of their selfish natures. A coven is made up of hags of any type, all of whom are equals within the group. However, each of the hags continues to desire more personal power.

A coven consists of three hags so that any arguments between two hags can be settled by the third. If more than three hags ever come together, as might happen if two covens come into conflict, the result is genellikle chaos.

trait.name: Hag Eye (Coven Only)
entries: A hag coven can craft a magic item called a hag eye, which is made from a real eye coated in varnish and often fitted to a pendant yada other wearable item. The hag eye is genellikle entrusted to a minion for safekeeping and transport. A hag in the coven can take an action to see what the hag eye sees if the hag eye is on the same plane of existence. A hag eye has AC 10, 1 hit point, and gece görüşü with a radius of 60 feet. If it is destroyed, each coven member takes {@dice 3d10} psişik damage and is blinded for 24 hours.

A hag coven can have only one hag eye at a time, and creating a new one requires all three members of the coven to perform a ritual. The ritual takes 1 hour, and the hags can't perform it while blinded. During the ritual, if the hags take any action other than performing the ritual, they must start over.

action.name: Pençeler (Hag Form Only)
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +7} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 13 ({@dice 2d8+4}) kesme hasarı.

action.name: Change Shape
entries: The hag magically polymorphs into a Small yada Medium female insansı, yada back into her true form. Her statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment she is wearing yada carrying isn't transformed. She reverts to her true form if she dies.

action.name: Etherealness
entries: The hag magically enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, yada vice versa. To do so, the hag must have a heartstone in her possession.

action.name: Nightmare Haunting (1/Gün)
entries: While on the Ethereal Plane, the hag magically touches a sleeping insansı on the Material Plane. A protection from evil and good spell cast on the target prevents this contact, as does a magic circle. As long as the contact persists, the target has dreadful visions. If these visions last for at least 1 hour, the target gains no benefit from its rest, and its hit point maximum is reduced by 5 ({@dice 1d10}). If this effect reduces the target's hit point maximum to 0, the target dies, and if the target was evil, its soul is trapped in the hag's soul bag. The reduction to the target's hit point maximum lasts until removed by the greater restoration spell yada similar magic.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The hag's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell kurtulma zarı DC'si 14, {@hit 6} büyü saldırıları ile vurmak için). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spellcasting.name: Shared Spellcasting (Coven Only)
headerEntries: While all three members of a hag coven are within 30 feet of one another, they can each cast the following spells from the wizard's spell list but must share the spell slots among themselves:
footerEntries: For casting these spells, each hag is a 12th-level spellcaster that uses Intelligence as her spellcasting ability. The spell kurtulma zarı DC'si is 12+the hag's Intelligence modifier, and the spell attack bonus is 4+the hag's Intelligence modifier.

monster.name: Nightmare
monster.languages: understands Abyssal, Ortak, and Infernal but can't speak

trait.name: Confer Fire Resistance
entries: The nightmare can grant resistance to ateş damage to anyone riding it.

trait.name: Illumination
entries: The nightmare sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet.

action.name: Hooves
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +6} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 13 ({@dice 2d8+4}) ezme hasarı artı 7 ({@dice 2d6}) ateş damage.

action.name: Ethereal Stride
entries: The nightmare and up to three willing creatures within 5 feet of it magically enter the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, yada vice versa.

action.name: Meç
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +3} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 5 ({@dice 1d8+1}) delme hasarı.

reaction.name: Savuşturma
entries: Soylu kendisine vurucak bir yakın saldırıya karşı reaksiyonunu kullanarak AC'sine 2 ekleyebilir. Bunu yapmak için saldırganı görmeli ve yakın dövüş silahını kuşanmış olmalıdır.

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The nothic has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The nothic makes two claw attacks.

action.name: Pençe
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +4} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 6 ({@dice 1d6+3}) kesme hasarı.

action.name: Rotting Gaze
entries: The nothic targets tek varlık it can see within 30 ft. of it. The target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw against this magic yada take 10 ({@dice 3d6}) nekrotik damage.

action.name: Weird Insight
entries: The nothic targets tek varlık it can see within 30 ft. of it. The target must contest its Charisma (Deception) check against the nothic's Wisdom (Insight) check. If the nothic wins, it magically learns one fact yada secret about the target. The target automatically wins if it is immune to being charmed.

monster.name: Nycaloth
monster.senses: kör görüş 60 ft., gece görüşü 60 ft.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The nycaloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The nycaloth's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The nycaloth makes two melee attacks, yada it makes one melee attack and teleports before yada after the attack.

action.name: Pençe
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +9} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 12 ({@dice 2d6+5}) kesme hasarı. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw yada take 5 ({@dice 2d4}) kesme hasarı at the start of each of its turns due to a fiendish wound. Each time the nycaloth hits the wounded target with this attack, the damage dealt by the wound increases by 5 ({@dice 2d4}). Any creature can take an action to stanch the wound with a successful DC 13 Wisdom (Medicine) check. The wound also closes if the target receives magical healing.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +9} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 18 ({@dice 2d12+5}) kesme hasarı.

action.name: Teleport
entries: The nycaloth magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing yada carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

variant.name: Yugoloth Summoning
entries: Some yugoloths have an action option that allows them to summon other yugoloths.

entries.name: Summon Yugoloth (1/Gün)
entries: The yugoloth chooses what to summon and attempts a magical summoning.
A nycaloth has a {@chance 50|50 percent|50% summoning chance} chance of summoning 1d4 {@creature mezzoloth}s yada one nycaloth.

A summoned yugoloth appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner, does as it pleases, and can't summon other yugoloths. The summoned yugoloth remains for 1 minute, until it yada its summoner dies, yada until its summoner takes a bonus action to dismiss it.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The nycaloth's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma. The nycaloth can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

monster.name: Ochre Jelly
monster.senses: kör görüş 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius)

trait.name: Amorphous
entries: The jelly can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Örümcek Climb
entries: The jelly can tırmanma difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Pseudopod
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +4} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 9 ({@dice 2d6+2}) ezme hasarı artı 3 ({@dice 1d6}) asit damage.

reaction.name: Split
entries: When a jelly that is Medium yada larger is subjected to yıldırım yada kesme hasarı, it splits into two new jellies if it has at least 10 hit points. Each new jelly has hit points equal to half the original jelly's, rounded down. New jellies are one size smaller than the original jelly.

trait.name: Nefes Tutma
entries: Suyun dışında ahtopot nefenesini 30 dakika boyunca tutabilir.

trait.name: Su altı Kamufulajı
entries: Ahtatop su altında atacağı Çeviklik (Gizlenme) zarlarında avantajlıdır.

trait.name: Su Soluma
entries: Ahtapotlar sadece suda soluyabilir.

action.name: Dokunaç
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +4} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 1 ezme hasarı, Hedefi tutar (DC 10 kaçış). Tutması sona erene kadar dokunaçlarını başka bir hedefte kullanmaz.

action.name: Mürekkep Bulutu (kısa yada uzun dinlenme sonrası yenilenir)
entries: Ahtapot suyun altında ise 5 feet çapında bir mürekkep bulutu bırakır. Bu bölge bir dakikalığına ağır bir şekilde örtülür, ama güçlü bir akım mürekkebi dağıtabilir. Mürekkep salındıktan sonra ahtapot Depar eylemini bonus eylem olarak kullanabilir.

action.name: Greatclub
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +6} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 13 ({@dice 2d8+4}) ezme hasarı.

action.name: Cirit
entries: Yakın Dövüş yada Menzilli Silah Saldırısı: {@hit +6} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft. yada menzil 30/120 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 11 ({@dice 2d6+4}) delme hasarı.

monster.name: Ogre Zombie
monster.languages: understands Ortak and Dev but can't speak

trait.name: Undead Fortitude
entries: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5+the damage taken, unless the damage is radyant yada from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.

action.name: Morningstar
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +6} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 13 ({@dice 2d8+4}) ezme hasarı.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The oni's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The oni regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The oni makes two attacks, either with its claws yada its glaive.

action.name: Pençe (Oni Form Only)
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +7} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 8 ({@dice 1d8+4}) kesme hasarı.

action.name: Glaive
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +7} vurmak için, erişim 10 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 15 ({@dice 2d10+4}) kesme hasarı, yada 9 ({@dice 1d10+4}) kesme hasarı in Small yada Medium form.

action.name: Change Shape
entries: The oni magically polymorphs into a Small yada Medium insansı, into a Large giant, yada back into its true form. Other than its size, its statistics are the same in each form. The only equipment that is transformed is its glaive, which shrinks so that it can be wielded in insansı form. If the oni dies, it reverts to its true form, and its glaive reverts to its normal size.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The oni's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell kurtulma zarı DC'si 13). The oni can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Aggressive
entries: As a bonus action, the orc can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +5} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 9 ({@dice 1d12+3}) kesme hasarı.

action.name: Cirit
entries: Yakın Dövüş yada Menzilli Silah Saldırısı: {@hit +5} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft. yada menzil 30/120 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 6 ({@dice 1d6+3}) delme hasarı.

trait.name: Aggressive
entries: As a bonus action, the orc can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

trait.name: Gruumsh's Fury
entries: The orc deals an extra 4 ({@dice 1d8}) damage when it hits with a weapon attack (included in the attacks).

action.name: Spear
entries: Yakın Dövüş yada Menzilli Silah Saldırısı: {@hit +5} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft. yada menzil 20/60 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 11 ({@dice 1d6+3 }artı {@dice 1d8}) delme hasarı, yada 12 ({@dice 2d8+3}) delme hasarı eğer iki el ile kullanıldıysa to make a melee attack.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The orc is a 3rd-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell kurtulma zarı DC'si 11, {@hit 3} büyü saldırıları ile vurmak için). The orc has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Aggressive
entries: As a bonus action, the orc can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

trait.name: Gruumsh's Fury
entries: The orc deals an extra 4 ({@dice 1d8}) damage when it hits with a weapon attack (included in the attacks).

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The orc makes two attacks with its greataxe yada its spear.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +6} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 15 ({@dice 1d12+4 }artı {@dice 1d8}) kesme hasarı.

action.name: Spear
entries: Yakın Dövüş yada Menzilli Silah Saldırısı: {@hit +6} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft. yada menzil 20/60 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 12 ({@dice 1d6+4 }artı {@dice 1d8}) delme hasarı, yada 13 ({@dice 2d8+4}) delme hasarı eğer iki el ile kullanıldıysa to make a melee attack.

action.name: Battle Cry (1/Gün)
entries: Each creature of the war chief's choice that is within 30 feet of it, can hear it, and not already affected by Battle Cry gain advantage on attack rolls until the start of the war chief's next turn. The war chief can then make one attack as a bonus action.

trait.name: Aggressive
entries: As a bonus action, the orog can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The orog makes two greataxe attacks.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +6} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 10 ({@dice 1d12+4}) kesme hasarı.

action.name: Cirit
entries: Yakın Dövüş yada Menzilli Silah Saldırısı: {@hit +6} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft. yada menzil 30/120 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 7 ({@dice 1d6+4}) delme hasarı.

trait.name: Limited Telepathy
entries: The otyugh can magically transmit simple messages and images to any creature within 120 ft. of it that can understand a language. This form of Telepati doesn't allow the receiving creature to telepathically respond.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The otyugh makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its tentacles.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +6} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 12 ({@dice 2d8+3}) delme hasarı. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw against disease yada become poisoned until the disease is cured. Every 24 hours that elapse, the target must repeat the saving throw, reducing its hit point maximum by 5 ({@dice 1d10}) on a failure. The disease is cured on a success. The target dies if the disease reduces its hit point maximum to 0. This reduction to the target's hit point maximum lasts until the disease is cured.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +6} vurmak için, erişim 10 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 7 ({@dice 1d8+3}) ezme hasarı artı 4 ({@dice 1d8}) delme hasarı. If the target is Medium yada smaller, it is grappled (escape DC 13) and restrained until the grapple ends. The otyugh has two tentacles, each of which can grapple tek hedef.

action.name: Tentacle Slam
entries: The otyugh slams creatures grappled by it into each other yada a solid surface. Each creature must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw yada take 10 ({@dice 2d6+3}) ezme hasarı and be stunned until the end of the otyugh's next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half the ezme hasarı and isn't stunned.

trait.name: Alçaktan Uçuş

trait.name: Keskin Duyma ve Görme

If the zehir damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.

trait.name: Fear Aura
entries: Any creature hostile to the pit fiend that starts its turn within 20 feet of the pit fiend must make a DC 21 Wisdom saving throw, unless the pit fiend is incapacitated. On a failed save, the creature is frightened until the start of its next turn. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to the pit fiend's Fear Aura for the next 24 hours.

The target must succeed on a DC 21 Constitution saving throw yada become poisoned. While poisoned in this way, the target can't regain hit points, and it takes 21 ({@dice 6d6}) zehir damage at the start of each of its turns. The poisoned target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Pençe

action.name: Forceful Slam
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +4} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek varlık. Vurunca: 10 ({@dice 3d6}) güç hasarı.

action.name: Telekinetic Thrust
entries: The poltergeist targets a creature yada unattended object within 30 feet of it. A creature must be Medium yada smaller to be affected by this magic, and an object can weigh up to 150 pounds.

If the target is a creature, the poltergeist makes a Charisma check contested by the target's Strength check. If the poltergeist wins the contest, the poltergeist hurls the target up to 30 feet in any direction, including upward. If the target then comes into contact with a hard surface yada heavy object, the target takes {@dice 1d6} damage per 10 feet moved.

If the target is an object that isn't being worn yada carried, the poltergeist hurls it up to 30 feet in any direction. The poltergeist can use the object as a ranged weapon, attacking tek varlık along the object's path ({@hit +4} vurmak için) and dealing 5 ({@dice 2d4}) ezme hasarı on a hit.

action.name: Toynak

This benefit lasts until the end of the turn. If the priest expends a spell slot of 2nd level yada higher, the extra damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each level above 1st.

trait.name: Familiar
entries: The pseudodragon can serve another creature as a familiar, forming a magic, telepathic bond with that willing companion. While the two are bonded, the companion can sense what the pseudodragon senses as long as they are within 1 mile of each other. While the pseudodragon is within 10 feet of its companion, the companion shares the pseudodragon's Magic Resistance trait. At any time and for any reason, the pseudodragon can end its service as a familiar, ending the telepathic bond.

A swallowed creature is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the worm, and it takes 21 ({@dice 6d6}) asit damage at the start of each of the worm's turns.

If the worm takes 30 damage yada more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the worm must succeed on a DC 21 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn yada regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within 10 feet of the worm. If the worm dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse by using 20 feet of movement, exiting prone.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The quasit can use its action to polymorph into a hayvan form that resembles a bat (speed 10 ft. uçma 40 ft.), a centipede (40 ft., tırmanma 40 ft.), yada a toad (40 ft., yüzme 40 ft.), yada back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form, except for the speed changes noted. Any equipment it is wearing yada carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

entries: The quasit has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Variant: Quasit Familiar
entries: Mortal spellcasters interested in extraplanar familiars find quasits easy to summon and eager to serve. The quasit plays the part of the obsequious servant. It serves its master well, but it goads the mortal to greater and greater acts of chaos and evil. Such quasits have the following trait.

trait.name: Familiar
entries: The quasit can serve another creature as a familiar, forming a telepathic bond with its willing master. While the two are bonded, the master can sense what the quasit senses as long as they are within 1 mile of each other. While the quasit is within 10 feet of its master, the master shares the quasit's Magic Resistance trait. At any time and for any reason, the quasit can end its service as a familiar, ending the telepathic bond.

monster.senses: kör görüş 10 ft., gece görüşü 60 ft.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +6} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 9 ({@dice 1d10+4}) delme hasarı artı 3 ({@dice 1d6}) ateş damage.

action.name: Fire Breath (Recharge 5—6)
entries: The dragon exhales ateş in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 24 ({@dice 7d6}) ateş damage on a failed save, yada half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The slaad has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The slaad regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point.

trait.name: Variant: Control Gem
entries: Implanted in the slaad's brain is a magic control gem. The slaad must obey whoever possesses the gem and is immune to being charmed while so controlled.

Certain spells can be used to acquire the gem. If the slaad fails its saving throw against imprisonment, the spell can transfer the gem to the spellcaster's open hand, instead of imprisoning the slaad. A wish spell, if cast in the slaad's presence, can be worded to acquire the gem.
A greater restoration spell cast on the slaad destroys the gem without harming the slaad.

Someone who is proficient in Wisdom (Medicine) can remove the gem from an incapacitated slaad. Each try requires 1 minute of uninterrupted work and a successful DC 20 Wisdom (Medicine) check. Each failed attempt deals 22 ({@dice 4d10}) psişik damage to the slaad.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The slaad makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +6} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef.
Vurunca: 8 ({@dice 2d4+3}) delme hasarı.

action.name: Pençe
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +6} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 7 ({@dice 1d8+3}) delme hasarı. If the target is a insansı, it must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw yada be infected with a disease—a minuscule slaad egg.

A insansı host can carry only one slaad egg to term at a time. Over three months, the egg moves to the chest cavity, gestates, and forms a slaad tadpole. In the 24-hour period before giving birth, the host starts to feel unwell, its speed is halved, and it has disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws. At birth, the tadpole chews its way through vital organs and out of the host's chest in 1 round, killing the host in the process.
If the disease is cured before the tadpole's emergence, the unborn slaad is disintegrated.

trait.name: Sürü Taktiği
entries: The shark has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the shark's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

trait.name: Water Breathing
entries: The shark can breathe only underwater.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +4} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 6 ({@dice 1d8+2}) delme hasarı.

trait.name: Heated Body
entries: A creature that touches the remorhaz yada hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 10 ({@dice 3d6}) ateş damage.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +11} vurmak için, erişim 10 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 40 ({@dice 6d10+7}) delme hasarı artı 10 ({@dice 3d6}) ateş damage. If the target is a creature, it is grappled (escape DC 17). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the remorhaz can't bite another target.

action.name: Swallow
entries: The remorhaz makes one bite attack against a Medium yada smaller creature it is grappling. If the attack hits, that creature takes the bite's damage and is swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the creature is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the remorhaz, and it takes 21 ({@dice 6d6}) asit damage at the start of each of the remorhaz's turns.

If the remorhaz takes 30 damage yada more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the remorhaz must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn yada regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within 10 feet oft he remorhaz. If the remorhaz dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse using 15 feet of movement, exiting prone.

monster.name: Revenant
monster.languages: the languages it knew in life

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The revenant regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the revenant takes ateş yada radyant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the revenant's next turn. The revenant's body is destroyed only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: When the revenant's body is destroyed, its soul lingers. After 24 hours, the soul inhabits and animates another corpse on the same plane of existence and regains all its hit points. While the soul is bodiless, a wish spell can be used to force the soul to go to the afterlife and not return.

trait.name: Turn Immunity
entries: The revenant is immune to effects that turn undead.

trait.name: Vengeful Tracker
entries: The revenant knows the distance to and direction of any creature against which it seeks revenge, even if the creature and the revenant are on different planes of existence. If the creature being tracked by the revenant dies, the revenant knows.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The revenant makes two fist attacks.

action.name: Fist
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +7} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 11 ({@dice 2d6+4}) ezme hasarı. If the target is a creature against which the revenant has sworn vengeance, the target takes an extra 14 ({@dice 4d6}) ezme hasarı. Instead of dealing damage, the revenant can grapple the target (escape DC 14) provided the target is Large yada smaller.

action.name: Vengeful Glare
entries: The revenant targets tek varlık it can see within 30 feet of it and against which it has sworn vengeance. The target must make a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, the target is paralyzed until the revenant deals damage to it, yada until the end of the revenant's next turn. When the paralysis ends, the target is frightened of the revenant for 1 minute. The frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if it can see the revenant, ending the frightened condition on itself on a success.

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the rhinoceros moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 ({@dice 2d8}) ezme hasarı. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw yada be knocked prone.

action.name: Gore
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +7} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 14 ({@dice 2d8+5}) ezme hasarı.

action.name: Hooves
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +5} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 8 ({@dice 2d4+3}) ezme hasarı.

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The roc has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The roc makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its talons.

action.name: Gaga
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +13} vurmak için, erişim 10 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 27 ({@dice 4d8+9}) delme hasarı.

action.name: Pençeler
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +13} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 23 ({@dice 4d6+9}) kesme hasarı, and the target is grappled (escape DC 19). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the roc can't use its talons on another target.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the roper remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal cave formation, such as a stalagmite.

trait.name: Grasping Tendrils
entries: The roper can have up to six tendrils at a time. Each tendril can be attacked (AC 20; 10 hit points; immunity to zehir and psişik damage). Destroying a tendril deals no damage to the roper, which can extrude a replacement tendril on its next turn. A tendril can also be broken if a creature takes an action and succeeds on a DC 15 Strength check against it.

trait.name: Örümcek Climb
entries: The roper can tırmanma difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The roper makes four attacks with its tendrils, uses Reel, and makes one attack with its bite.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +7} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 22 ({@dice 4d8+4}) delme hasarı.

action.name: Tendril
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +7} vurmak için, erişim 50 ft., tek varlık. Vurunca: The target is grappled (escape DC 15). Until the grapple ends, the target is restrained and has disadvantage on Strength checks and Strength saving throws, and the roper can't use the same tendril on another target.

action.name: Reel
entries: The roper pulls each creature grappled by it up to 25 ft. straight toward it.

monster.name: Rug of Smothering
monster.senses: kör görüş 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius)

trait.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
entries: The rug is incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the rug must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell kurtulma zarı DC'si yada fall unconscious for 1 minute.

trait.name: Damage Transfer
entries: While it is grappling a creature, the rug takes only half the damage dealt to it, and the creature grappled by the rug takes the other half.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the rug remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal rug.

action.name: Smother
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +5} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., one Medium yada smaller creature. Vurunca: The creature is grappled (escape DC 13). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, blinded, and at risk of suffocating, and the rug can't smother another target. In addition, at the start of each of the target's turns, the target takes 10 ({@dice 2d6+3}) ezme hasarı.

trait.name: Iron Scent
entries: The rust monster can pinpoint, by scent, the location of ferrous metal within 30 feet of it.

trait.name: Rust Metal
entries: Any nonmagical weapon made of metal that hits the rust monster corrodes. After dealing damage, the weapon takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to damage rolls. If its penalty drops to -5, the weapon is destroyed. Non magical ammunition made of metal that hits the rust monster is destroyed after dealing damage.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +3} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 5 ({@dice 1d8+1}) delme hasarı.

action.name: Antennae
entries: The rust monster corrodes a nonmagical ferrous metal object it can see within 5 feet of it. If the object isn't being worn yada carried, the touch destroys a 1-foot cube of it. If the object is being worn yada carried by a creature, the creature can make a DC 11 Dexterity saving throw to avoid the rust monster's touch.

If the object touched is either metal armor yada a metal shield being worn yada carried, its takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to the AC it offers. Armor reduced to an AC of 10 yada a shield that drops to a +0 bonus is destroyed. If the object touched is a held metal weapon, it rusts as described in the Rust Metal trait.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The tiger has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Pounce
entries: If the tiger moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw yada be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the tiger can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +6} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 10 ({@dice 1d10+5}) delme hasarı.

action.name: Pençe
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +6} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 12 ({@dice 2d6+5}) kesme hasarı.

trait.name: Blood Frenzy
entries: The sahuagin has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

trait.name: Limited Amphibiousness
entries: The sahuagin can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

trait.name: Shark Telepathy
entries: The sahuagin can magically command any shark within 120 feet of it, using a limited Telepati.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The sahuagin makes two melee attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws yada spear.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +3} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 3 ({@dice 1d4+1}) delme hasarı.

action.name: Pençeler
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +3} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 3 ({@dice 1d4+1}) kesme hasarı.

action.name: Spear
entries: Yakın Dövüş yada Menzilli Silah Saldırısı: {@hit +3} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft. yada menzil 20/60 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 4 ({@dice 1d6+1}) delme hasarı, yada 5 ({@dice 1d8+1}) delme hasarı eğer iki el ile kullanıldıysa to make a melee attack.

trait.name: Blood Frenzy
entries: The sahuagin has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

trait.name: Limited Amphibiousness
entries: The sahuagin can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

trait.name: Shark Telepathy
entries: The sahuagin can magically command any shark within 120 feet of it, using a limited Telepati.
