entries: The sahuagin makes three attacks: one with his bite and two with his claws yada trident.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +7} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 9 ({@dice 2d4+4}) delme hasarı.

action.name: Pençeler
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +7} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 11 ({@dice 2d6+4}) kesme hasarı.

action.name: Trident
entries: Yakın Dövüş yada Menzilli Silah Saldırısı: {@hit +7} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft. yada menzil 20/60 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 11 ({@dice 2d6+4}) delme hasarı, yada 13 ({@dice 2d8+4}) delme hasarı eğer iki el ile kullanıldıysa to make a melee attack.

trait.name: Blood Frenzy
entries: The sahuagin has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

trait.name: Limited Amphibiousness
entries: The sahuagin can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

trait.name: Shark Telepathy
entries: The sahuagin can magically command any shark within 120 feet of it, using a limited Telepati.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The sahuagin makes two melee attacks: one with her bite and one with her claws.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +3} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 3 ({@dice 1d4+1}) delme hasarı.

action.name: Pençeler
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +3} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 3 ({@dice 1d4+1}) kesme hasarı.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The sahuagin is a 6th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell kurtulma zarı DC'si 12, {@hit 4} büyü saldırıları ile vurmak için). She has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Heated Body
entries: A creature that touches the salamander yada hits it with a melee attack while within 5 ft. of it takes 7 ({@dice 2d6}) ateş damage.

trait.name: Heated Weapons
entries: Any metal melee weapon the salamander wields deals an extra 3 ({@dice 1d6}) ateş damage on a hit (included in the attack).

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The salamander makes two attacks: one with its spear and one with its tail.

action.name: Spear
entries: Yakın Dövüş yada Menzilli Silah Saldırısı: {@hit +7} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft. yada menzil 20/60 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 11 ({@dice 2d6+4}) delme hasarı, yada 13 ({@dice 2d8+4}) delme hasarı eğer iki el ile kullanıldıysa to make a melee attack, artı 3 ({@dice 1d6}) ateş damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +7} vurmak için, erişim 10 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 11 ({@dice 2d6+4}) ezme hasarı artı 7 ({@dice 2d6}) ateş damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 14). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, the salamander can automatically hit the target with its tail, and the salamander can't make tail attacks against other targets.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The satyr has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Ram
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +3} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 6 ({@dice 2d4+1}) ezme hasarı.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +5} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 6 ({@dice 1d6+3}) delme hasarı.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: Menzilli Silah Saldırısı: {@hit +5} vurmak için, menzil 80/320 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 6 ({@dice 1d6+3}) delme hasarı.

variant.name: Satyr Pipes
entries: A satyr might carry panpipes that it can play to create magical effects. Usually, only one satyr in a group carries such pipes. If a satyr has pipes, it gains the following additional action option.

entries.name: Panpipes
entries: The satyr plays its pipes and chooses one of the following magical effects: a charming melody, a frightening strain, yada a gentle lullaby. Any creature within 60 feet of the satyr that can hear the pipes must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw yada be affected as described below. Other satyrs and creature that can't be charmed are unaffected

An affected creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful yada the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to these panpipes for the next 24 hours.

entries.name: Charming Melody
entries: The creature is charmed by the satyr for 1 minute. If the satyr yada any of its companions harms the creature, the effect on it ends immediately.

entries.name: Frightening Strain
entries: The creature is frightened for 1 minute.

entries.name: Gentle Lullaby
entries: The creature falls asleep and is unconscious for 1 minute. The effect ends if the creature takes damage yada if someone takes an action to shake the creature awake.

monster.name: Scarecrow
monster.languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the scarecrow remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary, inanimate scarecrow.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The scarecrow makes two claw attacks.

action.name: Pençe
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +3} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 6 ({@dice 2d4+1}) kesme hasarı. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 11 Wisdom saving throw yada be frightened until the end of the scarecrow's next turn.

action.name: Terrifying Glare
entries: The scarecrow targets tek varlık it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see the scarecrow, the target must succeed on a DC 11 Wisdom saving throw yada be magically frightened until the end of the scarecrow's next turn. The frightened target is paralyzed.

action.name: İğne
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +2} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek varlık. Vurunca: 1 delme hasarı, Hedef DC 9 Çeviklik kurtulma zarı atmalıdır. Başarısız olduğu zaman 4 ({@dice 1d8}) zehir hasarı alır, başarılı olursa yarı hasar alır.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
entries: The scout has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing yada sight.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The scout makes two melee attacks yada two ranged attacks.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +4} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 5 ({@dice 1d6+2}) delme hasarı.

action.name: Longbow
entries: Menzilli Silah Saldırısı: {@hit +4} vurmak için, ranged 150/600 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 6 ({@dice 1d8+2}) delme hasarı.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The hag can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Horrific Appearance
entries: Any insansı that starts its turn within 30 feet of the hag and can see the hag's true form must make a DC 11 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if the hag is within line of sight, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful yada the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the hag's Horrific Appearance for the next 24 hours.

Unless the target is surprised yada the revelation of the hag's true form is sudden, the target can avert its eyes and avoid making the initial saving throw. Until the start of its next turn, a creature that averts its eyes has disadvantage on attack rolls against the hag.

trait.name: Hag Coven
entries: When hags must work together, they form covens, in spite of their selfish natures. A coven is made up of hags of any type, all of whom are equals within the group. However, each of the hags continues to desire more personal power.

A coven consists of three hags so that any arguments between two hags can be settled by the third. If more than three hags ever come together, as might happen if two covens come into conflict, the result is genellikle chaos.

trait.name: Hag Eye (Coven Only)
entries: A hag coven can craft a magic item called a hag eye, which is made from a real eye coated in varnish and often fitted to a pendant yada other wearable item. The hag eye is genellikle entrusted to a minion for safekeeping and transport. A hag in the coven can take an action to see what the hag eye sees if the hag eye is on the same plane of existence. A hag eye has AC 10, 1 hit point, and gece görüşü with a radius of 60 feet. If it is destroyed, each coven member takes {@dice 3d10} psişik damage and is blinded for 24 hours.

A hag coven can have only one hag eye at a time, and creating a new one requires all three members of the coven to perform a ritual. The ritual takes 1 hour, and the hags can't perform it while blinded. During the ritual, if the hags take any action other than performing the ritual, they must start over.

action.name: Pençeler
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +5} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 10 ({@dice 2d6+3}) kesme hasarı.

action.name: Death Glare
entries: The hag targets one frightened creature she can see within 30 ft. of her. If the target can see the hag, it must succeed on a DC 11 Wisdom saving throw against this magic yada drop to 0 hit points.

action.name: Illusory Appearance
entries: The hag covers herself and anything she is wearing yada carrying with a magical illusion that makes her look like an ugly creature of her general size and insansı shape. The effect ends if the hag takes a bonus action to end it yada if she dies.

The changes wrought by this effect fail to hold up to physical inspection. For example, the hag could appear to have no claws, but someone touching her hand might feel the claws. Otherwise, a creature must take an action to visually inspect the illusion and succeed on a DC 16 Intelligence (Investigation) check to discern that the hag is disguised.

spellcasting.name: Shared Spellcasting (Coven Only)
headerEntries: While all three members of a hag coven are within 30 feet of one another, they can each cast the following spells from the wizard's spell list but must share the spell slots among themselves:
footerEntries: For casting these spells, each hag is a 12th-level spellcaster that uses Intelligence as her spellcasting ability. The spell kurtulma zarı DC'si is 12+the hag's Intelligence modifier, and the spell attack bonus is 4+the hag's Intelligence modifier.

trait.name: Su Soluma
entries: Deniz Atı sadece suda soluyabilir.

trait.name: Amorphous
entries: The shadow can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Shadow Stealth
entries: While in dim light yada darkness, the shadow can take the Hide action as a bonus action. Its gizlenme bonus is also improved to +6.

trait.name: Sunlight Weakness
entries: While in sunlight, the shadow has disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws.

action.name: Strength Drain
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +4} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek varlık. Vurunca: 9 ({@dice 2d6+2}) nekrotik damage, and the target's Strength score is reduced by {@dice 1d4}. The target dies if this reduces its Strength to 0. Otherwise, the reduction lasts until the target finishes a short yada long rest.
If a non-evil insansı dies from this attack, a new shadow rises from the corpse {@dice 1d4} hours later.

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The demon can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 ({@dice 1d10}) güç hasarı if it ends its turn inside an object.

trait.name: Light Sensitivity
entries: While in bright light, the demon has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Shadow Stealth
entries: While in dim light yada darkness, the demon can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

action.name: Pençeler
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +5} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek varlık. Vurunca: 10 ({@dice 2d6+3}) psişik damage yada, if the demon had advantage on the attack roll, 17 ({@dice 4d6+3}) psişik damage.

monster.name: Shambling Mound
monster.senses: kör görüş 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius)

trait.name: Lightning Absorption
entries: Whenever the shambling mound is subjected to yıldırım damage, it takes no damage and regains a number of hit points equal to the yıldırım damage dealt.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The shambling mound makes two slam attacks. If both attacks hit a Medium yada smaller target, the target is grappled (escape DC 14), and the shambling mound uses its Engulf on it.

action.name: Slam
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +7} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 13 ({@dice 2d8+4}) ezme hasarı.

action.name: Engulf
entries: The shambling mound engulfs a Medium yada smaller creature grappled by it. The engulfed target is blinded, restrained, and unable to breathe, and it must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw at the start of each of the mound's turns yada take 13 ({@dice 2d8+4}) ezme hasarı. If the mound moves, the engulfed target moves with it. The mound can have only tek varlık engulfed at a time.

monster.name: Shield Guardian
monster.senses: kör görüş 10 ft., gece görüşü 60 ft.
monster.languages: understands commands given in any language but can't speak

trait.name: Bound
entries: The shield guardian is magically bound to an amulet. As long as the guardian and its amulet are on the same plane of existence, the amulet's wearer can telepathically call the guardian to travel to it, and the guardian knows the distance and direction to the amulet. If the guardian is within 60 feet of the amulet's wearer, half of any damage the wearer takes (rounded up) is transferred to the guardian.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The shield guardian regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point.

trait.name: Spell Storing
entries: A spellcaster who wears the shield guardian's amulet can cause the guardian to store one spell of 4th level yada lower. To do so, the wearer must cast the spell on the guardian. The spell has no effect but is stored within the guardian. When commanded to do so by the wearer yada when a situation arises that was predefined by the spellcaster, the guardian casts the stored spell with any parameters set by the original caster, requiring no components. When the spell is cast yada a new spell is stored, any previously stored spell is lost.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The guardian makes two fist attacks.

action.name: Fist
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +7} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 11 ({@dice 2d6+4}) ezme hasarı.

reaction.name: Shield
entries: When a creature makes an attack against the wearer of the guardian's amulet, the guardian grants a +2 bonus to the wearer's AC if the guardian is within 5 feet of the wearer.

monster.name: Shrieker
monster.senses: kör görüş 30 ft. (bu çapın dışında kördür)

trait.name: Yanıltıcı Görünüş
entries: Shrieker hareketsiz kaldıkça onu öbür mantarlardan ayırmanın yolu yoktur.

action.name: Çığlık
entries: Parlak bir ışık olduğu zaman yada 30 ft. yakında bir yaratık olduğu zaman çığlık atıp 300 feet çapında duyulucak bir ses çıkartır. Shieker'ı rahatsız eden şey menzil dışına çıkana kadar ve sonrasındaki {@dice 1d4} sıra boyunca çığlık atmaya devam eder.

monster.name: Silver Dragon Wyrmling
monster.senses: kör görüş 10 ft., gece görüşü 60 ft.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +6} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 9 ({@dice 1d10+4}) delme hasarı.

action.name: Breath Weapons (Recharge 5—6)
entries: The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons.

items.name: Cold Breath.
items.entry: The dragon exhales an icy blast in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw, taking 18 (4d8) soğuk damage on a failed save, yada half as much damage on a successful one.

items.name: Paralyzing Breath.
items.entry: The dragon exhales paralyzing gas in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw yada be paralyzed for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

monster.name: Skeleton
monster.languages: understands all languages it spoke in life but can't speak

action.name: Shortsword
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +4} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 5 ({@dice 1d6+2}) delme hasarı.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: Menzilli Silah Saldırısı: {@hit +4} vurmak için, menzil 80/320 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 5 ({@dice 1d6+2}) delme hasarı.

trait.name: Büyü Direnci
entries: Slaad büyü ve diğer büyüsel etkilere karşı kurtulma zarlarında avantajlıdır.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +4} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 4 ({@dice 1d4+2}) delme hasarı.

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: When the mephit dies, it leaves behind a cloud of smoke that fills a 5-foot-radius sphere centered on its space. The sphere is heavily obscured. Wind disperses the cloud, which otherwise lasts for 1 minute.

action.name: Pençeler
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +4} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek varlık. Vurunca: 4 ({@dice 1d4+2}) kesme hasarı.

action.name: Cinder Breath (Recharge 6)
entries: The mephit exhales a 15-foot cone of smoldering ash. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw yada be blinded until the end of the mephit's next turn.

action.name: Variant: Summon Mephits (1/Gün)
entries: The mephit has a {@chance 25|25 percent|25% summoning chance} chance of summoning {@dice 1d4} mephits of its kind. A summoned mephit appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other mephits. It remains for 1 minute, until it yada its summoner dies, yada until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (1/Gün)
headerEntries: The mephit can innately cast {@spell dancing lights}, requiring no material components. Its innate spellcasting ability is Charisma.

trait.name: Angelic Weapons
entries: The solar's weapon attacks are magical. When the solar hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra {@dice 6d8} radyant damage (included in the attack).

trait.name: Divine Awareness
entries: The solar knows if it hears a lie.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The solar has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The solar makes two greatsword attacks.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +15} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 22 ({@dice 4d6+8}) kesme hasarı artı 27 ({@dice 6d8}) radyant damage.

action.name: Slaying Longbow
entries: Menzilli Silah Saldırısı: {@hit +13} vurmak için, menzil 150/600 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 15 ({@dice 2d8+6}) delme hasarı artı 27 ({@dice 6d8}) radyant damage. If the target is a creature that has 100 hit points yada fewer, it must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw yada die.

action.name: Flying Sword
entries: The solar releases its greatsword to hover magically in an unoccupied space within 5 ft. of it. If the solar can see the sword, the solar can mentally command it as a bonus action to uçma up to 50 ft. and either make one attack against a target yada return to the solar's hands. If the hovering sword is targeted by any effect, the solar is considered to be holding it. The hovering sword falls if the solar dies.

action.name: Healing Touch (4/Gün)
entries: The solar touches another creature. The target magically regains 40 ({@dice 8d8+4}) hit points and is freed from any curse, disease, zehir, blindness, yada deafness.

legendary.name: Teleport
entries: The solar magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing yada carrying, up to 120 ft. to an unoccupied space it can see.

legendary.name: Searing Burst (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The solar emits magical, divine energy. Each creature of its choice in a 10-foot radius must make a DC 23 Dexterity saving throw, taking 14 ({@dice 4d6}) ateş damage artı 14 ({@dice 4d6}) radyant damage on a failed save, yada half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Blinding Gaze (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The solar targets tek varlık it can see within 30 ft. of it. If the target can see it, the target must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw yada be blinded until magic such as the lesser restoration spell removes the blindness.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The solar's spell casting ability is Charisma (spell kurtulma zarı DC'si 25). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +1} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 2 ({@dice 1d6-1}) delme hasarı.

action.name: Eye Rays
entries: The spectator shoots up to two of the following magical eye rays at one yada two creatures it can see within 90 ft. of it. It can use each ray only once on a turn.

1. Confusion Ray. The target must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw, yada it can't take reactions until the end of its next turn. On its turn, the target can't move, and it uses its action to make a melee yada ranged attack against a randomly determined creature within menzil. If the target can't attack, it does nothing on its turn.

2. Paralyzing Ray. The target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw yada be paralyzed for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

3. Fear Ray. The target must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw yada be frightened for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if the spectator is visible to the target, ending the effect on itself on a success.
4. Wounding Ray. The target must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw, taking 16 ({@dice 3d10}) nekrotik damage on a failed save, yada half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Create Food and Water
entries: The spectator magically creates enough food and water to sustain itself for 24 hours.

reaction.name: Spell Reflection
entries: If the spectator makes a successful saving throw against a spell, yada a spell attack misses it, the spectator can choose another creature (including the spellcaster) it can see within 30 ft. of it. The spell targets the chosen creature instead of the spectator. If the spell forced a saving throw, the chosen creature makes its own save. If the spell was an attack, the attack roll is rerolled against the chosen creature.

monster.name: Specter
monster.languages: understands all languages it knew in life but can't speak

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The specter can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 ({@dice 1d10}) güç hasarı if it ends its turn inside an object.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the specter has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Life Drain
entries: Melee Spell Attack: {@hit +4} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek varlık. Vurunca: 10 ({@dice 3d6}) nekrotik damage. The target must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw yada its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the creature finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

trait.name: Örümcek Tırmanışı
entries: Örümcek beceri zarı gerektirmeden dik yüzey ve tavan gibi zorlu yüzeylerde yürüyebilir.

trait.name: Ağ Hissi
entries: Ağ ile temasta olduğu sürece aynı ağda olan tüm varlıkların konumlarını bilir.

trait.name: Ağ Yürüyüşü
entries: Örümcek ağdan oluşan hareket dezavantajından etkilenmez.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +4} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek varlık. Vurunca: 1 delme hasarı, Hedef DC 9 Dayanıklılık kurtulma zarını geçer yada 2 ({@dice 1d4}) zehir hasarı alır.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's gece görüşü.

trait.name: Flyby
entries: The devil doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's erişim.

trait.name: Limited Spines
entries: The devil has twelve tail spines. Used spines regrow by the time the devil finishes a long rest.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The devil makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its fork yada two with its tail spines.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +2} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 5 ({@dice 2d4}) kesme hasarı.

action.name: Fork
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +2} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 3 ({@dice 1d6}) delme hasarı.

action.name: Tail Spine
entries: Menzilli Silah Saldırısı: {@hit +4} vurmak için, menzil 20/80 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 4 ({@dice 1d4+2}) delme hasarı artı 3 ({@dice 1d6}) ateş damage.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: If it dies, the naga returns to life in {@dice 1d6} Güns and regains all its hit points. Only a wish spell can prevent this trait from functioning.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +7} vurmak için, erişim 10 ft., tek varlık. Vurunca: 7 ({@dice 1d6+4}) delme hasarı, and the target must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw, taking 31 ({@dice 7d8}) zehir damage on a failed save, yada half as much damage on a successful one.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The naga is a 10th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell kurtulma zarı DC'si 14, {@hit 6} büyü saldırıları ile vurmak için), and it needs only verbal components to cast its spells. It has the following wizard spells prepared:

action.name: Longsword
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +2} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 1 kesme hasarı.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: Menzilli Silah Saldırısı: {@hit +6} vurmak için, menzil 40/160 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 1 delme hasarı, and the target must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw yada become poisoned for 1 minute. If its saving throw result is 5 yada lower, the poisoned target falls unconscious for the same duration, yada until it takes damage yada another creature takes an action to shake it awake.

action.name: Heart Sight
entries: The sprite touches a creature and magically knows the creature's current emotional state. If the target fails a DC 10 Charisma saving throw, the sprite also knows the creature's alignment. Celestials, fiends, and undead automatically fail the saving throw.

action.name: Invisibility
entries: The sprite magically turns invisible until it attacks yada casts a spell, yada until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the sprite wears yada carries is invisible with it.

trait.name: Cunning Action
entries: On each of its turns, the spy can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, yada Hide action.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: The spy deals an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, yada when the target is within 5 ft. of an ally of the spy that isn't incapacitated and the spy doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The spy makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +4} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 5 ({@dice 1d6+2}) delme hasarı.

action.name: Hand Crossbow
entries: Menzilli Silah Saldırısı: {@hit +4} vurmak için, menzil 30/120 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 5 ({@dice 1d6+2}) delme hasarı.

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: When the mephit dies, it explodes in a cloud of steam. Each creature within 5 ft. of the mephit must succeed on a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw yada take 4 ({@dice 1d8}) ateş damage.

action.name: Pençeler
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +2} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek varlık. Vurunca: 2 ({@dice 1d4}) kesme hasarı artı 2 ({@dice 1d4}) ateş damage.

action.name: Steam Breath (Recharge 6)
entries: The mephit exhales a 15-foot cone of scalding steam. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw, taking 4 ({@dice 1d8}) ateş damage on a failed save, yada half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Variant: Summon Mephits (1/Gün)
entries: The mephit has a {@chance 25|25 percent|25% summoning chance} chance of summoning {@dice 1d4} mephits of its kind. A summoned mephit appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other mephits. It remains for 1 minute, until it yada its summoner dies, yada until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (1/Gün)
headerEntries: The mephit can innately cast {@spell blur}, requiring no material components. Its innate spellcasting ability is Charisma.

action.name: Kan Emmek
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +5} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek varlık. Vurunca: 5 ({@dice 1d4+3}) delme hasarı, ve stirge hedefe tutunur. Tutunurken, stirge saldıramaz. Yerine, her stirge'nin sırasında, hedef kan kaybından 5 ({@dice 1d4+3}) HP kaybeder.

Stirge 5 feet hareket ederek kendini ayırabilir. Bunu 10 hit puanı emdikten sonra yada hedef öldüğü zaman yapar. Hedef dahil olmak üzere bir varlık eylemini kullanarak bir stirge'yi hedeften ayırabilir.

trait.name: Stone Camouflage
entries: The giant has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The giant makes two greatclub attacks.

action.name: Greatclub
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +9} vurmak için, erişim 15 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 19 ({@dice 3d8+6}) ezme hasarı.

action.name: Rock
entries: Menzilli Silah Saldırısı: {@hit +9} vurmak için, menzil 60/240 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 28 ({@dice 4d10+6}) ezme hasarı. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 17 Strength saving throw yada be knocked prone.

reaction.name: Rock Catching
entries: If a rock yada similar object is hurled at the giant, the giant can, with a successful DC 10 Dexterity saving throw, catch the missile and take no ezme hasarı from it.

variant.name: New Dev Options
entries: Some adult stone giants like to grab enemies and fling them through the air. They can also roll boulders across the ground, striking multiple enemies in a line. These abilities are represented by the following action options.

entries.name: Fling
entries: The giant tries to throw a Small yada Medium creature within 10 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw yada be hurled up to 60 feet horizontally in a direction of the giant's choice. and land prone, taking 1d6 ezme hasarı for every 10 feet it was thrown.

entries.name: Rolling Rock
entries: The giant sends a rock tumbling along the ground in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (3d10+6) ezme hasarı and falling prone on a failed save

monster.name: Stone Golem

immune.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

monster.languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The golem is immune to any spell yada effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The golem's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The golem makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +10} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 19 ({@dice 3d8+6}) ezme hasarı.

action.name: Slow (Recharge 5—6)
entries: The golem targets one yada more creatures it can see within 10 ft. of it. Each target must make a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw against this magic. On a failed save, a target can't use reactions, its speed is halved, and it can't make more than one attack on its turn. In addition, the target can take either an action yada a bonus action on its turn, not both. These effects last for 1 minute. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The giant can breathe air and water.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The giant makes two greatsword attacks.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +14} vurmak için, erişim 10 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 30 ({@dice 6d6+9}) kesme hasarı.

action.name: Rock
entries: Menzilli Silah Saldırısı: {@hit +14} vurmak için, menzil 60/240 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 35 ({@dice 4d12+9}) ezme hasarı.

action.name: Lightning Strike (Recharge 5—6)
entries: The giant hurls a magical yıldırım bolt at a point it can see within 500 feet of it. Each creature within 10 feet of that point must make a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw, taking 54 ({@dice 12d8}) yıldırım damage on a failed save, yada half as much damage on a successful one.

variant.name: New Dev Options
entries: Some adult storm giants can channel thunderous power through their bodies and release it with a deafening stomp. This ability is represented by the following ac­ tion option.

entries.name: Thunderous Stomp (Recharge 6)
entries: The storm giant stomps the ground, triggering a thunderclap. All other creatures within 15 feet of the giant must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw yada take 33 (6d10) ses damage and be deafened until the start of the giant's next turn. On a successful save, a crea­ture takes half as much damage and isn't deafened. The thun­derclap can be heard out to a menzil of 1,200 feet.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The giant's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell kurtulma zarı DC'si 17). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Telepathic Bond
entries: The fiend ignores the menzil restriction on its Telepati when communicating with a creature it has charmed. The two don't even need to be on the same plane of existence.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The fiend can use its action to polymorph into a Small yada Medium insansı, yada back into its true form. Without wings, the fiend loses its flying speed. Other than its size and speed, its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing yada carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

action.name: Pençe (Fiend Form Only)
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +5} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 6 ({@dice 1d6+3}) kesme hasarı.

action.name: Charm
entries: One insansı the fiend can see within 30 feet of it must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw yada be magically charmed for 1 Gün. The charmed target obeys the fiend's verbal yada telepathic commands. If the target suffers any harm yada receives a suicidal command, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on a success. If the target successfully saves against the effect, yada if the effect on it ends, the target is immune to this fiend's Charm for the next 24 hours.
The fiend can have only tek hedef charmed at a time. If it charms another, the effect on the previous target ends.

action.name: Draining Kiss
entries: The fiend kisses a creature charmed by it yada a willing creature. The target must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw against this magic, taking 32 ({@dice 5d10+5}) psişik damage on a failed save, yada half as much damage on a successful one. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

action.name: Etherealness
entries: The fiend magically enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, yada vice versa.

trait.name: Telepathic Bond
entries: The fiend ignores the menzil restriction on its Telepati when communicating with a creature it has charmed. The two don't even need to be on the same plane of existence.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The fiend can use its action to polymorph into a Small yada Medium insansı, yada back into its true form. Without wings, the fiend loses its flying speed. Other than its size and speed, its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing yada carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

action.name: Pençe (Fiend Form Only)
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +5} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 6 ({@dice 1d6+3}) kesme hasarı.

action.name: Charm
entries: One insansı the fiend can see within 30 feet of it must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw yada be magically charmed for 1 Gün. The charmed target obeys the fiend's verbal yada telepathic commands. If the target suffers any harm yada receives a suicidal command, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on a success. If the target successfully saves against the effect, yada if the effect on it ends, the target is immune to this fiend's Charm for the next 24 hours.
The fiend can have only tek hedef charmed at a time. If it charms another, the effect on the previous target ends.

action.name: Draining Kiss
entries: The fiend kisses a creature charmed by it yada a willing creature. The target must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw against this magic, taking 32 ({@dice 5d10+5}) psişik damage on a failed save, yada half as much damage on a successful one. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

action.name: Etherealness
entries: The fiend magically enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, yada vice versa.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Gün)
entries: If the tarrasque fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The tarrasque has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Reflective Carapace
entries: Any time the tarrasque is targeted by a magic missile spell, a line spell, yada a spell that requires a ranged attack roll, roll a d6. On a 1 to 5, the tarrasque is unaffected. On a 6, the tarrasque is unaffected, and the effect is reflected back at the caster as though it originated from the tarrasque, turning the caster into the target.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The tarrasque deals double damage to objects and structures.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The tarrasque can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes five attacks: one with its bite, two with its claws, one with its horns, and one with its tail. It can use its Swallow instead of its bite.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +19} vurmak için, erişim 10 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 36 ({@dice 4d12+10}) delme hasarı. If the target is a creature, it is grappled (escape DC 20). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the tarrasque can't bite another target.

action.name: Pençe
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +19} vurmak için, erişim 15 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 28 ({@dice 4d8+10}) kesme hasarı.

action.name: Horns
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +19} vurmak için, erişim 10 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 32 ({@dice 4d10+10}) delme hasarı.

action.name: Tail
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +19} vurmak için, erişim 20 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 24 ({@dice 4d6+10}) ezme hasarı. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 20 Strength saving throw yada be knocked prone.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the tarrasque's choice within 120 feet of it and aware of it must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw yada become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if the tarrasque is within line of sight, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful yada the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the tarrasque's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Swallow
entries: The tarrasque makes one bite attack against a Large yada smaller creature it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target takes the bite's damage, the target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the creature is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the tarrasque, and it takes 56 ({@dice 16d6}) asit damage at the start of each of the tarrasque's turns.

If the tarrasque takes 60 damage yada more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the tarrasque must succeed on a DC 20 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn yada regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within 10 feet of the tarrasque. If the tarrasque dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse by using 30 feet of movement, exiting prone.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The tarrasque makes one claw attack yada tail attack.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The tarrasque moves up to half its speed.

legendary.name: Chomp (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The tarrasque makes one bite attack yada uses its Swallow.

entries: The thri-kreen can change the color of its carapace to match the color and texture of its surroundings. As a result, it has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The thri-kreen's long jump is up to 30 feet and its high jump is up to 15 feet, with yada without a running start.

If the saving throw fails by 5 yada more, the target is also paralyzed while poisoned in this way. The poisoned target can repeat the saving throw on each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Rock
entries: Menzilli Silah Saldırısı: {@hit +10} vurmak için, menzil 60/180 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 28 ({@dice 4d10+6}) ezme hasarı.

action.name: Animate Trees (1/Gün)
entries: The treant magically animates one yada two trees it can see within 60 feet of it. These trees have the same statistics as a treant, except they have Intelligence and Charisma scores of 1, they can't speak, and they have only the Slam action option. An animated tree acts as an ally of the treant. The tree remains animate for 1 Gün yada until it dies; until the treant dies yada is more than 120 feet from the tree; yada until the treant takes a bonus action to turn it back into an inanimate tree. The tree then takes root if possible.

trait.name: Sürü Taktiği
entries: Eğer savaşçının bir dostu düşmanın 5 ft. yanında ise dostu ile saldırı avantajına sahip olur.

action.name: Mızrak

trait.name: Trampling Charge
entries: If the triceratops moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw yada be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the triceratops can make one stomp attack against it as a bonus action.

entries: The tridrone can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its doğa yada its instructions.

entries: The troglodyte has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide.

entries: Any creature other than a troglodyte that starts its turn within 5 ft. of the troglodyte must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw yada be poisoned until the start of the creature's next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the stench of all troglodytes for 1 hour.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the troglodyte has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The troglodyte makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The troll has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The troll regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the troll takes asit yada ateş damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the troll's next turn. The troll dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

variant.name: Loathsome Limbs
entries: Whenever the troll takes at least 15 kesme hasarı at one time, roll a d20 to determine what else happens to it:

items.entry: Nothing else happens.
One leg is severed from the troll if it has any legs left.
One arm is severed from the troll if it has any arms left.
The troll is decapitated, but the troll dies only if it can't regenerate. If it dies, so does the severed head.

entries: If the troll finishes a short yada long rest without reattaching a severed limb yada head, the part regrows. At that point, the severed part dies. Until then, a severed part acts on the troll's initiative and has its own action and movement. A severed part has AC 13, 10 hit points, and the troll's Regeneration trait.
A severed leg is unable to attack and has a speed of 5 feet.

A severed arm has a speed of 5 feet and can make one claw attack on its turn, with disadvantage on the attack roll unless the troll can see the arm and its target. Each time the troll loses an arm, it loses a claw attack.

If its head is severed, the troll loses its bite attack and its body is blinded unless the head can see it. The severed head has a speed of 0 feet and the troll's Keen Smell trait. It can make a bite attack but only against a target in its space.

The troll's speed is halved if it's missing a leg. If it loses both legs, it falls prone. If it has both arms, it can crawl. With only one arm, it can still crawl, but its speed is halved. With no arms yada legs, its speed is 0, and it can't benefit from bonuses to speed.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The troll makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Isırma

entries: The ultroloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

entries: The ultroloth's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Hypnotic Gaze
entries: The ultroloth's eyes sparkle with opalescent light as it targets tek varlık it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see the ultroloth, the target must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw against this magic yada be charmed until the end of the ultroloth's next turn. The charmed target is stunned. If the target's saving throw is successful, the target is immune to the ultroloth's gaze for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Teleport
entries: The ultroloth magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing yada carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

variant.name: Yugoloth Summoning
entries: Some yugoloths have an action option that allows them to summon other yugoloths.

entries.name: Summon Yugoloth (1/Gün)
entries: The yugoloth chooses what to summon and attempts a magical summoning.
An ultroloth has a {@chance 50|50 percent|50% summoning chance} chance of summoning 1d6 {@creature mezzoloth}s, 1d4 {@creature nycaloth}s, yada one ultroloth.

A summoned yugoloth appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner, does as it pleases, and can't summon other yugoloths. The summoned yugoloth remains for 1 minute, until it yada its summoner dies, yada until its summoner takes a bonus action to dismiss it.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The ultroloth's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell kurtulma zarı DC'si 17). The ultroloth can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Confusing Gaze
entries: When a creature starts its turn within 30 feet of the umber hulk and is able to see the umber hulk's eyes, the umber hulk can magically force it to make a DC 15 Charisma saving throw, unless the umber hulk is incapacitated.

On a failed saving throw, the creature can't take reactions until the start of its next turn and rolls a d8 to determine what it does during that turn. On a 1 to 4, the creature does nothing. On a 5 yada 6, the creature takes no action but uses all its movement to move in a random direction. On a 7 yada 8, the creature makes one melee attack against a random creature, yada it does nothing if no creature is within erişim.

Unless surprised, a creature can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If the creature does so, it can't see the umber hulk until the start of its next turn, when it can avert its eyes again. If the creature looks at the umber hulk in the meantime, it must immediately make the save.

trait.name: Tunneler
entries: The umber hulk can kazma through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and leaves a 5 foot-wide, 8-foot-high tunnel in its wake.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The umber hulk makes three attacks: two with its claws and one with its mandibles.

action.name: Pençe
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +8} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 9 ({@dice 1d8+5}) kesme hasarı.

action.name: Mandibles
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +8} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 14 ({@dice 2d8+5}) kesme hasarı.

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the unicorn moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a horn attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 ({@dice 2d8}) delme hasarı. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw yada be knocked prone.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The unicorn has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The unicorn's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The unicorn makes two attacks: one with its hooves and one with its horn.

action.name: Hooves
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +7} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 11 ({@dice 2d6+4}) ezme hasarı.

action.name: Horn
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +7} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 8 ({@dice 1d8+4}) delme hasarı.

action.name: Healing Touch (3/Gün)
entries: The unicorn touches another creature with its horn. The target magically regains 11 ({@dice 2d8+2}) hit points. In addition, the touch removes all diseases and neutralizes all poisons afflicting the target.

action.name: Teleport (1/Gün)
entries: The unicorn magically teleports itself and up to three willing creatures it can see within 5 ft. of it, along with any equipment they are wearing yada carrying, to a location the unicorn is familiar with, up to 1 mile away.

legendary.name: Hooves
entries: The unicorn makes one attack with its hooves.

legendary.name: Shimmering Shield (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The unicorn creates a shimmering, magical field around itself yada another creature it can see within 60 ft. of it. The target gains a +2 bonus to AC until the end of the unicorn's next turn.

legendary.name: Heal Self (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The unicorn magically regains 11 ({@dice 2d8+2}) hit points.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The unicorn's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell kurtulma zarı DC'si 14). The unicorn can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

monster.name: Vampire
monster.languages: the languages it knew in life

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: If the vampire isn't in sun light yada running water, it can use its action to polymorph into a Tiny bat yada a Medium cloud of mist, yada back into its true form.

While in bat form, the vampire can't speak, its walking speed is 5 feet, and it has a flying speed of 30 feet. Its statistics, other than its size and speed, are unchanged. Anything it is wearing transforms with it, but nothing it is carrying does. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

While in mist form, the vampire can't take any actions, speak, yada manipulate objects. It is weightless, has a flying speed of 20 feet, can hover, and can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. In addition, if air can pass through a space, the mist can do so without squeezing, and it can't pass through water. It has advantage on Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution saving throws, and it is immune to all nonmagical damage, except the damage it takes from sunlight.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Gün)
entries: If the vampire fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Misty Escape
entries: When it drops to 0 hit points outside its resting place, the vampire transforms into a cloud of mist (as in the Shapechanger trait) instead of falling unconscious, provided that it isn't in sunlight yada running water. If it can't transform, it is destroyed.

While it has 0 hit points in mist form, it can't revert to its vampire form, and it must erişim its resting place within 2 hours yada be destroyed. Once in its resting place, it reverts to its vampire form. It is then paralyzed until it regains at least 1 hit point. After spending 1 hour in its resting place with 0 hit points, it regains 1 hit point.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The vampire regains 20 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point and isn't in sunlight yada running water. If the vampire takes radyant damage yada damage from holy water, this trait doesn't function at the start of the vampire's next turn.

trait.name: Örümcek Climb
entries: The vampire can tırmanma difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Vampire Weaknesses
entries: The vampire has the following flaws:
{@i Forbiddance.} The vampire can't enter a residence without an invitation from one of the occupants.
{@i Harmed by Running Water.} The vampire takes 20 asit damage if it ends its turn in running water.

{@i Stake to the Heart.} If a delme weapon made of wood is driven into the vampire's heart while the vampire is incapacitated in its resting place, the vampire is paralyzed until the stake is removed.
{@i Sunlight Hypersensitivity.} The vampire takes 20 radyant damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı (Vampire Form Only)
entries: The vampire makes two attacks, only one of which can be a bite attack.

action.name: Unarmed Strike (Vampire Form Only)
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +9} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek varlık. Vurunca: 8 ({@dice 1d8+4}) ezme hasarı. Instead of dealing damage, the vampire can grapple the target (escape DC 18).

action.name: Isırma (Bat yada Vampire Form Only)
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +9} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., one willing creature, yada a creature that is grappled by the vampire, incapacitated, yada restrained. Vurunca: 7 ({@dice 1d6+4}) delme hasarı artı 10 ({@dice 3d6}) nekrotik damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the nekrotik damage taken, and the vampire regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0. A insansı slain in this way and then buried in the ground rises the following night as a vampire spawn under the vampire's control.

action.name: Charm
entries: The vampire targets one insansı it can see within 30 ft. of it. If the target can see the vampire, the target must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw against this magic yada be charmed by the vampire. The charmed target regards the vampire as a trusted friend to be heeded and protected. Although the target isn't under the vampire's control, it takes the vampire's requests yada actions in the most favorable way it can, and it is a willing target for the vampire's bit attack.

Each time the vampire yada the vampire's companions do anything harmful to the target, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. Otherwise, the effect lasts 24 hours yada until the vampire is destroyed, is on a different plane of existence than the target, yada takes a bonus action to end the effect.

action.name: Children of the Night (1/Gün)
entries: The vampire magically calls {@dice 2d4} swarms of {@creature swarm of bats|mm|bats} yada {@creature swarm of rats|mm|rats}, provided that the sun isn't up. While outdoors, the vampire can call {@dice 3d6} {@creature wolf|mm|wolves} instead. The called creatures arrive in {@dice 1d4} rounds, acting as allies of the vampire and obeying its spoken commands. The hayvans remain for 1 hour, until the vampire dies, yada until the vampire dismisses them as a bonus action.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The vampire moves up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: The vampire makes one unarmed strike.

legendary.name: Isırma (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The vampire makes one bite attack.

entries: The veteran makes two longsword attacks. If it has a shortsword drawn, it can also make a shortsword attack.

action.name: Longsword
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +5} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 7 ({@dice 1d8+3}) kesme hasarı, yada 8 ({@dice 1d10+3}) kesme hasarı eğer iki el ile kullanıldıysa.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +5} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 6 ({@dice 1d6+3}) delme hasarı.

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries: Menzilli Silah Saldırısı: {@hit +3} vurmak için, menzil 100/400 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 6 ({@dice 1d10+1}) delme hasarı.

monster.name: Vine Blight
monster.senses: kör görüş 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius)

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the blight remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a tangle of vines.

action.name: Constrict
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +4} vurmak için, erişim 10 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 9 ({@dice 2d6+2}) ezme hasarı, and a Large yada smaller target is grappled (escape DC 12). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the blight can't constrict another target.

action.name: Entangling Plants (Recharge 5—6)
entries: Grasping roots and vines sprout in a 15-foot radius centered on the blight, withering away after 1 minute. For the duration, that area is difficult terrain for nonplant creatures. In addition, each creature of the blight's choice in that area when the plants appear must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw yada become restrained. A creature can use its action to make a DC 12 Strength check, freeing it self yada another entangled creature within erişim on a success.

monster.name: Violet Fungus
monster.senses: kör görüş 30 ft. (blind beyond this radius)

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the violet fungus remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary fungus.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The fungus makes {@dice 1d4} Rotting Touch attacks.

action.name: Rotting Touch
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +2} vurmak için, erişim 10 ft., tek varlık. Vurunca: 4 ({@dice 1d8}) nekrotik damage.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The vrock has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The vrock makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its talons.

action.name: Pençeler
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +6} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 14 ({@dice 2d10+3}) kesme hasarı.

action.name: Spores (Recharge 6)
entries: A 15-foot-radius cloud of toxic spores extends out from the vrock. The spores spread around corners. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw yada become poisoned. While poisoned in this way, a target takes 5 ({@dice 1d10}) zehir damage at the start of each of its turns. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. Emptying a vial of holy water on the target also ends the effect on it.

action.name: Stunning Screech (1/Gün)
entries: The vrock emits a horrific screech. Each creature within 20 feet of it that can hear it and that isn't a demon must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw yada be stunned until the end of the vrock's next turn.

action.name: Variant: Summon Demon (1/Gün)
entries: The demon chooses what to summon and attempts a magical summoning.
A vrock has a {@chance 30|30 percent|30% summoning chance} chance of summoning {@dice 2d4} {@creature dretch}es yada one vrock.

trait.name: Keskin Görme ve Koklama
entries: Akbaba görüş ve koku duyularına bağlı Akıl (Algılama) zarlarında avantajlıdır.

trait.name: Sürü Taktiği
entries: Eğer akbabanın bir dostu düşmanın 5 ft. yanında ise dostu ile saldırı avantajına sahip olur.

action.name: Gaga
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +2} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 2 ({@dice 1d4}) delme hasarı.

trait.name: Trampling Charge
entries: If the horse moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a creature and then hits it with a hooves attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw yada be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the horse can make another attack with its hooves against it as a bonus action.

action.name: Hooves
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +6} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 11 ({@dice 2d6+4}) ezme hasarı.

action.name: Hooves
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +6} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 11 ({@dice 2d6+4}) ezme hasarı.

trait.name: Water Form
entries: The elemental can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Freeze
entries: If the elemental takes soğuk damage, it partially freezes; its speed is reduced by 20 ft. until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The elemental makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +7} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 13 ({@dice 2d8+4}) ezme hasarı.

action.name: Whelm (Recharge 4—6)
entries: Each creature in the elemental's space must make a DC 15 Strength saving throw. On a failure, a target takes 13 ({@dice 2d8+4}) ezme hasarı. If it is Large yada smaller, it is also grappled (escape DC 14). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained and unable to breathe unless it can breathe water. If the saving throw is successful, the target is pushed out of the elemental's space.

The elemental can grapple one Large creature yada up to two Medium yada smaller creatures at one time. At the start of each of the elemental's turns, each target grappled by it takes 13 ({@dice 2d8+4}) ezme hasarı. A creature within 5 feet of the elemental can pull a creature yada object out of it by taking an action to make a DC 14 Strength and succeeding.

trait.name: Invisible in Water
entries: The water weird is invisible while fully immersed in water.

trait.name: Water Bound
entries: The water weird dies if it leaves the water to which it is bound yada if that water is destroyed.

action.name: Constrict
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +5} vurmak için, erişim 10 ft., tek varlık. Vurunca: 13 ({@dice 3d6+3}) ezme hasarı. If the target is Medium yada smaller, it is grappled (escape DC 13) and pulled 5 ft. toward the water weird. Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, the water weird tries to drown it, and the water weird can't constrict another target.

trait.name: Keskin Duyma ve Koklama
entries: Gelincik duyma ve koklama duyularına bağlı Akıl (Algılama) zarlarında avantajlıdır.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +5} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek varlık. Vurunca: 1 delme hasarı.

monster.name: Werebear
monster.ac: 10 (in insansı form, 11 in bear and hybrid forms)

walk.condition: (40 ft. tırmanma 30 ft. in bear yada hybrid form)

immune.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The werebear can use its action to polymorph into a Large bear-insansı hybrid yada into a Large bear, yada back into its true form, which is insansı. Its statistics, other than its size and AC, are the same in each form. Any equipment it. is wearing yada carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The werebear has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: In bear form, the werebear makes two claw attacks. In insansı form, it makes two greataxe attacks. In hybrid form, it can attack like a bear yada a insansı.

action.name: Isırma (Bear yada Hybrid Form Only)
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +7} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 15 ({@dice 2d10+4}) delme hasarı. If the target is a insansı, it must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw yada be cursed with were bear lycanthropy.

action.name: Pençe (Bear yada Hybrid Form Only)
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +7} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 13 ({@dice 2d8+4}) kesme hasarı.

action.name: Greataxe (insansı yada Hybrid Form Only)
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +7} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 10 ({@dice 1d12+4}) kesme hasarı.

entries: The wereboar can use its action to polymorph into a boar-insansı hybrid yada into a boar, yada back into its true form, which is insansı. Its statistics, other than its AC, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing yada carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Charge (Boar yada Hybrid Form Only)
entries: If the wereboar moves at least 15 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with its tusks on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) kesme hasarı. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw yada be knocked prone.

trait.name: Relentless (Recharges after a Short yada Long Rest)
entries: If the wereboar takes 14 damage yada less that would reduce it to 0 hit points, it is reduced to 1 hit point instead.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı (insansı yada Hybrid Form Only)
entries: The wereboar makes two attacks, only one of which can be with its tusks.

action.name: Maul (insansı yada Hybrid Form Only)
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +5} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 10 ({@dice 2d6+3}) ezme hasarı.

action.name: Tusks (Boar yada Hybrid Form Only)
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +5} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 10 ({@dice 2d6+3}) kesme hasarı. If the target is a insansı, it must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw yada be cursed with wereboar lycanthropy.

immune.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The wererat can use its action to polymorph into a rat-insansı hybrid yada into a giant rat, yada back into its true form, which is insansı. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing yada carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The wererat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı (insansı yada Hybrid Form Only)
entries: The wererat makes two attacks, only one of which can be a bite.

action.name: Isırma (Rat yada Hybrid Form Only).
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +4} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 4 ({@dice 1d4+2}) delme hasarı. If the target is a insansı, it must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw yada be cursed with wererat lycanthropy.

action.name: Shortsword (insansı yada Hybrid Form Only)
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +4} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 5 ({@dice 1d6+2}) delme hasarı.

action.name: Hand Crossbow (insansı yada Hybrid Form Only)
entries: Menzilli Silah Saldırısı: {@hit +4} vurmak için, menzil 30/120 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 5 ({@dice 1d6+2}) delme hasarı.

immune.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The weretiger can use its action to polymorph into a tiger-insansı hybrid yada into a tiger, yada back into its true form, which is insansı. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing yada carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The weretiger has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing yada smell.

trait.name: Pounce (Tiger yada Hybrid Form Only)
entries: If the weretiger moves at least 15 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw yada be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the weretiger can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı (insansı yada Hybrid Form Only)
entries: In insansı form, the weretiger makes two scimitar attacks yada two longbow attacks. In hybrid form, it can attack like a insansı yada make two claw attacks.

action.name: Isırma (Tiger yada Hybrid Form Only)
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +5} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 8 ({@dice 1d10+3}) delme hasarı. If the target is a insansı, it must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw yada be cursed with weretiger lycanthropy.

action.name: Pençe (Tiger yada Hybrid Form Only)
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +5} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 7 ({@dice 1d8+3}) kesme hasarı.

action.name: Scimitar (insansı yada Hybrid Form Only)
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +5} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 6 ({@dice 1d6+3}) kesme hasarı.

action.name: Longbow (insansı yada Hybrid Form Only)
entries: Menzilli Silah Saldırısı: {@hit +4} vurmak için, menzil 150/600 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 6 ({@dice 1d8+2}) delme hasarı.

monster.ac: 11 (in insansı form, 12 in wolf yada hybrid form)

immune.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

entries: The werewolf can use its action to polymorph into a wolf-insansı hybrid yada into a wolf, yada back into its true form, which is insansı. Its statistics, other than its AC, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing yada carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The werewolf has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing yada smell.

action.name: Isırma (Wolf yada Hybrid Form Only)
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +4} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 6 ({@dice 1d8+2}) delme hasarı. If the target is a insansı, it must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw yada be cursed with werewolf lycanthropy.

action.name: Pençeler (Hybrid Form Only)
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +4} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek varlık. Vurunca: 7 ({@dice 2d4+2}) kesme hasarı.

action.name: Spear (insansı Form Only)
entries: Yakın Dövüş yada Menzilli Silah Saldırısı: {@hit +4} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft. yada menzil 20/60 ft., tek varlık. Vurunca: 5 ({@dice 1d6+2}) delme hasarı, yada 6 ({@dice 1d8+2}) delme hasarı eğer iki el ile kullanıldıysa to make a melee attack.

monster.name: White Dragon Wyrmling
monster.senses: kör görüş 10 ft., gece görüşü 60 ft.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +4} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 7 ({@dice 1d10+2}) delme hasarı artı 2 ({@dice 1d4}) soğuk damage.

action.name: Cold Breath (Recharge 5—6)
entries: The dragon exhales an icy blast of hail in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw, taking 22 ({@dice 5d8}) soğuk damage on a failed save, yada half as much damage on a successful one.

monster.name: Wight

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

monster.languages: the languages it knew in life

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the wight has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The wight makes two longsword attacks yada two longbow attacks. It can use its Life Drain in place of one longsword attack.

action.name: Life Drain
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +4} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek varlık. Vurunca: 5 ({@dice 1d6+2}) nekrotik damage. The target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw yada its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

A insansı slain by this attack rises 24 hours later as a zombie under the wight's control, unless the insansı is restored to life yada its body is destroyed. The wight can have no more than twelve zombies under its control at one time.

action.name: Longsword
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +4} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 6 ({@dice 1d8+2}) kesme hasarı, yada 7 ({@dice 1d10+2}) kesme hasarı eğer iki el ile kullanıldıysa.

action.name: Longbow
entries: Menzilli Silah Saldırısı: {@hit +4} vurmak için, menzil 150/600 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 6 ({@dice 1d8+2}) delme hasarı.

monster.name: Will-o'-Wisp
monster.languages: the languages it knew in life

trait.name: Consume Life
entries: As a bonus action, the will-o'-wisp can target tek varlık it can see within 5 ft. of it that has 0 hit points and is still alive. The target must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw against this magic yada die. If the target dies, the will-o'-wisp regains 10 ({@dice 3d6}) hit points.

trait.name: Ephemeral
entries: The will-o'-wisp can't wear yada carry anything.

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The will-o'-wisp can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 ({@dice 1d10}) güç hasarı if it ends its turn inside an object.

trait.name: Variable Illumination
entries: The will-o'-wisp sheds bright light in a 5- to 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional number of ft. equal to the chosen radius. The will-o'-wisp can alter the radius as a bonus action.

action.name: Shock
entries: Melee Spell Attack: {@hit +4} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek varlık. Vurunca: 9 ({@dice 2d8}) yıldırım damage.

action.name: Invisibility
entries: The will-o'-wisp and its light magically become invisible until it attacks yada uses its Consume Life, yada until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell).

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the kobold has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Sürü Taktiği
entries: The kobold has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kobold's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

action.name: Dagger
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +5} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 5 ({@dice 1d4+3}) delme hasarı.

action.name: Dropped Rock
entries: Menzilli Silah Saldırısı: {@hit +5} vurmak için, tek hedef directly below the kobold. Vurunca: 6 ({@dice 1d6+3}) ezme hasarı.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The wolf has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing yada smell.

trait.name: Sürü Taktiği
entries: The wolf has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the wolf's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

trait.name: Snow Camouflage
entries: The wolf has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in snowy terrain.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +6} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 11 ({@dice 2d6+4}) delme hasarı. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw yada be knocked prone.

action.name: Cold Breath (Recharge 5—6)
entries: The wolf exhales a blast of freezing wind in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 ({@dice 4d8}) soğuk damage on a failed save, yada half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The wolf has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing yada smell.

trait.name: Sürü Taktiği
entries: The wolf has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the wolf's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +4} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 7 ({@dice 2d4+2}) delme hasarı. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 11 Strength saving throw yada be knocked prone.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The worg has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing yada smell.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +5} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 10 ({@dice 2d6+3}) delme hasarı. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw yada be knocked prone.

monster.languages: the languages it knew in life
