entries: The wraith can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 ({@dice 1d10}) güç hasarı if it ends its turn inside an object.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the wraith has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Life Drain
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +6} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek varlık. Vurunca: 21 ({@dice 4d8+3}) nekrotik damage. The target must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw yada its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

action.name: Create Specter
entries: The wraith targets a insansı within 10 feet of it that has been dead for no longer than 1 minute and died violently. The target's spirit rises as a specter in the space of its corpse yada in the nearest unoccupied space. The specter is under the wraith's control. The wraith can have no more than seven specters under its control at one time.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The wyvern makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its stinger. While flying, it can use its claws in place of one other attack.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +7} vurmak için, erişim 10 ft., tek varlık. Vurunca: 11 ({@dice 2d6+4}) delme hasarı.

action.name: Pençeler
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +7} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 13 ({@dice 2d8+4}) kesme hasarı.

action.name: Stinger
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +7} vurmak için, erişim 10 ft., tek varlık. Vurunca: 11 ({@dice 2d6+4}) delme hasarı. The target must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 24 ({@dice 7d6}) zehir damage on a failed save, yada half as much damage on a successful one.

resist.note: and kesme from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

trait.name: Earth Glide
entries: The xorn can kazma through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone. While doing so, the xorn doesn't disturb the material it moves through.

trait.name: Stone Camouflage
entries: The xorn has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

trait.name: Treasure Sense
entries: The xorn can pinpoint, by scent, the location of precious metals and stones, such as coins and gems, within 60 ft. of it.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The xorn makes three claw attacks and one bite attack.

action.name: Isırma
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +6} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 13 ({@dice 3d6+3}) delme hasarı.

action.name: Pençe
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +6} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 6 ({@dice 1d6+3}) kesme hasarı.

trait.name: Fear of Fire
entries: If the yeti takes ateş damage, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The yeti has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Snow Camouflage
entries: The yeti has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in snowy terrain.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The yeti can use its Chilling Gaze and makes two claw attacks.

action.name: Pençe
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +6} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft., tek hedef. Vurunca: 7 ({@dice 1d6+4}) kesme hasarı artı 3 ({@dice 1d6}) soğuk damage.

action.name: Chilling Gaze
entries: The yeti targets tek varlık it can see within 30 ft. of it. If the target can see the yeti, the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw against this magic yada take 10 ({@dice 3d6}) soğuk damage and then be paralyzed for 1 minute, unless it is immune to soğuk damage. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If the target's saving throw is successful, yada if the effect ends on it, the target is immune to the Chilling Gaze of all yetis (but not abominable yetis) for 1 hour.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The yochlol can use its action to polymorph into a form that resembles a female drow yada giant Örümcek, yada back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing yada carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The yochlol has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Örümcek Climb
entries: The yochlol can tırmanma difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Web Walker
entries: The yochlol ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı
entries: The yochlol makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Slam (Isırma in Örümcek Form)
entries: Yakın Dövüş Silahı Saldırısı: {@hit +6} vurmak için, erişim 5 ft. (10 ft. in demon form), tek hedef. Vurunca: 5 ({@dice 1d6+2}) ezme (delme in Örümcek form) damage artı 21 ({@dice 6d6}) zehir damage.

action.name: Mist Form
entries: The yochlol transforms into toxic mist yada reverts to its true form. Any equipment it is wearing yada carrying is also transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

While in mist form, the yochlol is incapacitated and can't speak. It has a flying speed of 30 feet, can hover, and can pass through any space that isn't airtight. It has advantage on Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution saving throws, and it is immune to nonmagical damage.

While in mist form, the yochlol can enter a creature's space and stop there. Each time that creature starts its turn with the yochlol in its space, the creature must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw yada be poisoned until the start of its next turn. While poisoned in this way, the target is incapacitated.

action.name: Variant: Summon Demon (1/Gün)
entries: The demon chooses what to summon and attempts a magical summoning.
A yochlol has a {@chance 50|50 percent|50% summoning chance} chance of summoning one yochlol.

A summoned demon appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other demons. It remains for 1 minute, until it yada its summoner dies, yada until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The yochlol's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell kurtulma zarı DC'si 14). The yochlol can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

monster.name: Young Black Dragon
monster.senses: kör görüş 30 ft., gece görüşü 120 ft.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The dragon can breathe air and water.

action.name: Çoklu Saldırı

items.entry: The dragon exhales gas in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature can't use reactions, its speed is halved, and it can't make more than one attack on its turn. In addition, the creature can use either an action yada a bonus action on its turn, but not both. These effects last for 1 minute. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself with a successful save.

entries: The yuan-ti can use its action to polymorph into a Large snake, yada back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing yada carrying isn't transformed. It doesn't change form if it dies.

entries: The yuan-ti has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
